story:
Hi, we are a group of mums who believe that Scotland can be a better place for our families and future generations but, in order to improve our society, we need the powers of independence for Scotland.

We have had a huge response from mums across the country looking to hear about why a Yes vote is best for us and our families. In the last short weeks leading to the referendum, we want to be able to produce masses of leaflets, flyers and materials and hold events to get the Yes message out to mums across the country. 

Surplus funds will go to the Maryhill food bank.

Any support is really appreciated and please share this page where you can. If you would like to join us or help out some other way, we'd love to hear from you, just email: join@mumsforchange.com

story:
** Update ** You can still get the Closing Disclosure Fillable Forms Today! Buy here or Go to our new website for other Closing forms, like the Seller only and Refinance form.  www.WeDoForms.net

Attention Real Estate Professionals. The HUD-1 Settlement Statement is being Replaced by a new form called the, Closing Disclosure, on 8-1-15.

My name is Mike Shackelford and I am the creator of www.hud1generator.com . Those who fund this campaign will receive a discount on the New required form, “Closing Disclosure”.

Why am I running this campaign?  I created the www.hud1generator.com back in 2007.  Many of my customers ask me if I was going to provide the Replacement form.  It will cost a fair amount to get everything done right, so I decided to try crowd funding. I thought crowd funding was interesting concept.  So, this my first campaign. Once we hit the target goal, I will start creating the form and deliver as promised.

What do I get? 

1-  New form “Closing Disclosure” (with formulas).
2- PDF converting software. 
3- Discounted price from this campaign. Price after the campaign will be 20-50% higher, $49 Single and $99 Business, or higher.
4- Updates and improved versions for 1 year. 
5- Unlimited use, for the 1 time fee.

New Form will look like the government forms and will be High Quality, Editable, Professional, Printable, Easy to use, have formulas to do the math.  

Form will be an excel file which you can use with MS Excel or www.openoffice.org , which is free.

Pdf software allows you to convert these files (and any other normal files) into Pdf files, so you can easily email them.

Click Here for Government info about New Form.

Who will be required to use the new forms? All people involved in Real Estate closings,Title Companies, Real estate agents, mortgage people, closing attorneys, investors, landlords, home buyers and sellers, real estate lenders, etc.

Why are these forms needed?  Firstly, they are mandatory as of 8-1-15. Secondly, The government has decided the new closing forms will make it better, more clear and will result in less problems for all real estate transactions in the USA.  :)

High quality professional forms. They will look good printed and pdf version for emailing. They will look like the government version.  But they will have formulas in certain cells that will calculate the math.  The quality will be equal or better than my old version of the hud1, found at www.hud1generator.com , which I have sold since 2007 and have many happy customers.

When?  Target deadline for the new form Delivery is 7-20-15 or sooner.

Single License – You can install on 1 computer.  

Business License – You can install on unlimited computers. For offices, companies, partners, assistants, etc.

Now what do I do?

1- Pick the License that is best for you, and click the button to fund and secure your copy at the discounted price.

2- Share, Share, Share - Why is it important to share this page?

Sharing is caring. Your friends can get a discount. If you know of people in the real estate business, they will have to use the new form as of 8-1-15.  They save money, if they know about it and act now. This is only available for a few days.  

Share with your real estate friends on Facebook, Facebook real estate related groups, email list, twitter, linked in, etc.  Its Super easy - use the share buttons on this page. They will be Thankful they saved money.

Share because, Your friends might not know about the new form Deadline.

Also, we need as many people as possible to reach the funding goal, so everyone can get the new form at the discounted price. 

This is an all or nothing Campaign. If campaign does not reach the goal, No one will get the new form, and everyone will get an automatic refund, no action required.

Lets make this happen together.

Thank you,
Mike

story:
The X-Kit is the combination of a powerful 5-in-1 USB hub that connects to all the devices you need to boost productivity and an ultra-lightweight ergonomic laptop/tablet stand with four adjustable angles designed for maximum mobility.

 

Video by 9to5Mac

Our project has officially moved from the mass production phase to shipment. We’ve started shipping from now ‘til we fulfill all backers’ orders. The first batch of the UGREEN X-Kit was shipped from Shenzhen on Saturday, December 20.

Please note, the first batch shipment is on a first-come-first-serve basis acquired from the order of the payment. 

It all started with our product designer when he began #WFH this year. Beyond the great opportunities, like many of us, he found challenges in building a healthy and productive workplace at home.

 

Most modern laptops today aren't equipped with enough ports to support all the supplementary devices we need to replicate a comprehensive "second office." Fear of insufficient ports and an unhealthy work posture was his motivation for creating the perfect work-at-home essential.

 

Several factors can affect your work productivity, such as improper posture, excessive movements, forces, pressure points, static loads, and much more. 

 

 

With the UGREEN X-Kit, you can personalize your workspace and create an atmosphere tailored to your physical needs and increase productivity.

 

Feature Highlights

The UGREEN X-Kit integrates all the necessary ports for easier connections to all your devices for a high-performance workstation at home. Working from home is now more convenient than ever before.

 

 

The 5-in-1 USB-C hub functionality provides 2*USB-A 3.0 ports, 1* 4K 3D HDMI port, 1*SD and 1*TF card reader, and 1*USB-C data delivery to connect your laptop or tablet with the X-Kit.

 

 

You can quickly transfer files, photos, and videos from your phone, memory cards, and hard drives while connecting to external devices such as the keyboard, mouse, or graphic tablet simultaneously, without a mess.

 

Sitting all day is harmful to your health, but we will always find a better solution when this has already covered most of the working time.

 

Find your best ergonomic posture with 4 adjustable angles whether you want to read, type, take notes, draw, or use external keyboards with laptops and tablets. The X-Kit provides optimal comfort without the fatigue of your neck, arms, wrists, or eyes.

 

Less Phubbing, More Comfort

Any idea how long you spend sitting?

An average person sits for about 10 hours a day.
Occupy 60% of waking hours.
30 years of a fleeting life.

 

Enjoy a high-quality display with the X-Kit’s ultra-high-definition HDMI port with 3D support—no image tearing, stuttering, or jerkiness, as well as fine audio and display synchronization.

 

 

Work Pro, Play Cool

Present your proud project and presentations, or share your favorite movies in exceptional quality with low latency. Use it at home, at conferences, or even during outdoor activities 1. 

 

Transferring a 1GB movie in 5 seconds? Copying images from a 32GB memory card in 5 minutes? With the high-speed transmission of up to 5Gbps from the two USB-A 3.0 ports and 104 MB/s from the SD/TF card slots, the X-Kit nailed it.

Open and fold-up in a split second; you can set up your office space anytime, anywhere with the X-Kit. 

 

It fits easily in your backpack, tote bag, or even a briefcase.

 

 

Empowered by optimal design and materials, no more worries about the overheating issue of your USB hub.  

 

Superheat Dissipation

The lab temperature rise test shows that after 2 hours of full-load working, the maximum product surface temperature is about 41.9℃ (107.42℉) and 10℃ (50℉) lower than the average hubs on the market 2 . 

 

Multi-Safety Protection

 

The built-in short-circuit and over-current protection keeps your devices safe.

 

Durable Companion

 

By going through thousands of plug tests for all ports, and temperature tests from cold to hot procedures, the X-Kit will be your ultra-reliable and durable companion in various environments.

 

  Highlight Details

The X-Kit perfectly supports all your USB-C based devices, from the latest MacBook lineup and iPads to all the flagship Android and Windows-based tablets. For size compatibility, it fits all laptops from 11”-17” in size 3. 

 

Driving productivity to the fullest, the X-Kit is far more than just your average laptop stand or a simple USB-C hub. It is a combination of work, health, and creativity in life.

 

 

With our minimalist X-shaped structure consisting of double triangles, your laptop can breathe freely while staying stable at work. 

 

The skeleton made of premium aircraft-grade aluminum alloy is 65% lighter yet 25% harder than the average, lightweight, and stable. Less, but more.

 

The silky-touch sandblasting-oxidation processed surface, slip, and crush-proof silicone bands gently embrace the practical aesthetics that flows in our veins.

 

 

 

Redefine your space for an efficient and healthy working environment, whether it’s at home, at a cafe, or the outdoors, basically, anywhere you go.

 

From the product materials to its packaging, the X-Kit is fully recyclable with RoHS compliance. Additionally, it saves energy by lowering power consumption than a 1W LED lamp with a working HDMI port (≈333mA).

 

 

Expect 11 hours of playtime on a MacBook with keyboard and mouse set connected; 17% longer than an average USB hub.

Thanks to the smart combination of materials, the X-Kit applies leading aircraft-grade 6063 T5 aluminum alloy + PC/ABS materials.

 

 

Weighing only 0.62lb (9.98oz), the X-Kit comes 2 ounces lighter than a Starbucks tall, the smallest Starbucks coffee on the regular menu.

Say goodbye to insufficient ports, office syndrome, unstable connections, messy home office set up... 

 

And work different with the UGREEN X-Kit from now on!

 

The UGREEN team has spent months working on an integrated design with the lightest and most durable material to enhance your work experience. With the small details developed to perfection, the X-Kit is all you need to boost productivity.

 

The UGREEN X-Kit is already in production, so you don't have to worry about those long crowdfunding waits. Our priority is to meet our commitments to you and provide our backers with the highest level of value, premium quality, and service.

 

At UGREEN, we believe there’s an optimal combination of value and innovation. Since our foundation in 2012, we've been dedicated to building consumer electronic devices and accessories with leading technological innovations and making them accessible to our everyday consumers. The user-centered philosophy runs in our blood and through our R&D, design, manufacturing, sales, and marketing, as well as customer service.

UGREEN has steadily grown into a brand trusted by over 40 million users in more than 100 countries around the world. Our award-winning product portfolio ranges from charging devices, mobile phones, and computer accessories to home and automobile accessories. With an extensive channel network both online and offline, UGREEN is committed to providing maximum value backed by high-quality products and premium service to our customers.

 

Unavailable shipping countries and regions list:

Dear backers and fellas, we are happy to provide free shipping to most countries and regions worldwide. However, the global reduction of flights is expected to increase due to the COVID-19 situation. Therefore, we are sorry to announce that we are not able to ship the product to the countries and regions on the list below. If you placed an order from one of the following countries and regions, we will issue a refund. Much appreciated your understanding!

story:
We are Mercator, a design studio in London.  Inspired by SpaceX, we wanted to create something to celebrate this amazing, new dawn in space exploration.

Building rockets is hard!  And, we’re not rocket engineers… but, we do know how to make a Pen!

So, we decided to create NOMINAL – the most complex writing instrument we’ve designed to date.  A precision-engineered desk pen with a playful mechanical movement.  Made in Stainless Steel.

It has four retractable landing legs, similar to those on the Falcon 9 Rocket.  A magnetic detachable crew capsule, ready for splashdown.  And, just in case you’re on the next mission, each is fitted with a Schmidt P950M pressurised refill, capable of writing in zero-gravity.  But, if you find you are more land-based, we have designed a simple screw mechanism into the base so it can use most other standard refills.

We felt Indiegogo was the best platform to launch NOMINAL to share our passion for science and space with like-minded people.

Help us to make this launch… NOMINAL. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We call it NOMINAL – the term used during launch when everything is running smoothly and according to plan.

  • Made of 34 individual components, most of which are CNC-machined to precision in 316L stainless steel and aircraft grade aluminium.
  • Four retracting legs operated by simply twisting the body of the pen – allowing for a soft landing on your desk.
  • A magnetic Crew Cabin Capsule slides off to reveal a Black Mother of Pearl end cap. Should you wish, this end cap can be engraved with your own Monogram for a small fee (refer to Personalisation section below).
  • A Schmidt P950M Medium Black pressurised refill was carefully selected for its very smooth ink flow and easy writing experience at any angle.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

There are 2 rewards from which you can choose:

  • NOMINAL Steel

  • NOMINAL Steel | Dark Gunmetal

All supplied with cardboard gift box and pre-assembled Schmidt refill.

 

 

(Octo-stand sold separately)

 

Materials / Finish:

  • Brushed Stainless Steel with Ionic Plating
  • Anodized Satin Black Aluminium
  • Black Mother of Pearl end cap insert

Weight:

  • 64g

 

 

 

(Octo-stand sold separately)

Materials / Finish:

  • Brushed Stainless Steel with Dark Gunmetal Ionic Plating
  • Anodized Satin Black Aluminium
  • Black Mother of Pearl end cap insert

Weight:

  • 64g

 

 

 

For that personal touch, we offer a monogramming service of up to 3 initials engraved onto the Black Mother of Pearl end cap insert.

The cost for monogramming is £7 ($9).

Should you wish to add a monogram - once you've backed this project, the monogram add-on will be available in the pre-checkout page (listed under 'Perks you may also like').

We will confirm the 3 initials in the fulfilment survey sent at the end of the campaign.

 

(3 letter monogram)

 

 

 

 

 

We are offering a range of accessories to accompany your NOMINAL Pen.

Once you’ve backed this project, you can add additional accessories.  

After selecting a perk, you will be taken to the pre-checkout page, where all the accessories will be listed (under 'Perks you may also like').  You can then easily select your accessories, and add them to your pledge.

Alternatively, when the campaign ends, you will be sent a fulfilment survey and can add the accessories then.

 

 

  • Black Anodised Aluminium with Mother of Pearl end cap insert

 

(Please note: to ensure secure fit for travel, the case is only compatible with the Crew Capsule as pictured, not the longer Cargo Capsule below)

 

 

 

  • Black Anodised Aluminium desk stand
  • Stand can be used with retracting legs in open or closed positions

 

 

 

 

  • Supplied in either Steel or Dark Gunmetal finish
  • This also helps to extend the pen body for those who prefer a longer pen 

 

 

 

 

 

The production of our Nominal Pen is all setup and ready to go!

We have undergone several rounds of testing, and manufactured a small production run of pens to resolve and eliminate any foreseeable problems in large-scale production.

This will ensure a smooth transition, and reduce any possible delays in fulfilling your orders. 

We are aiming to dispatch first customers orders in February 2021, and the remainder in March 2021.

 

 

 

 

Mercator was founded back in 2009, but together we have over 20 years’ experience designing well-engineered accessories for Luxury, European clients.

Sundeep and Peter are based at the London design studio, Mark oversees manufacturing operations at the factory.

 

 

 

 

It's been quite a journey to get to Indiegogo.  Just like the SpaceX rocket landings we, too, had a few attempts and lost parts out at sea.  But that’s part of the process, and we’ve had fun (and lots of late nights) along the way.

It’s taken us about six months to develop Nominal from first sketch through to the fully resolved prototype.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For journalists and bloggers, we have a Press Kit.

You can email us directly at info@mercator.london, or get in touch via social media.

Or, by clicking the FAQ, then following the relevant links.

 

 

 

Thanks for taking the time to view our NOMINAL pen.

We really value your support and hope together we can make the campaign a success!

Please back us, and help to share our campaign with friends and family.

Follow us:

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The main risks and challenges on this project stem from the unfortunate COVID-19 pandemic, which may cause delays in the supply of raw materials and in shipping customer orders. Although our suppliers and fulfilment team are almost back to full capacity, if there are any unfortunate delays, we will be sure to stay in regular communication with our backers. Our factory has successfully been manufacturing pens and accessories for European clients for over 15 years. They are capable of handling large scale orders and there should be little risk of delays. However, we can never rule them out completely and do acknowledge that there could be unexpected and unforeseen manufacturing issues that arise. If any do arise that will impact the delivery dates in anyway, we will communicate this to our backers as soon as we know of them.

Anodized Satin Black Aluminium
Black Mother of Pearl end cap insert
Weight:64g   For that personal touch, we offer a monogramming service of up to 3 initials engraved onto the Black Mother of Pearl end cap insert.The cost for monogramming is £7 ($9).Should you wish to add a monogram - once you've backed this project, the monogram add-on will be available in the pre-checkout page (listed under 'Perks you may also like').We will confirm the 3 initials in the fulfilment survey sent at the end of the campaign. (3 letter monogram)     We are offering a range of accessories to accompany your NOMINAL Pen.Once you’ve backed this project, you can add additional accessories.  After selecting a perk, you will be taken to the pre-checkout page, where all the accessories will be listed (under 'Perks you may also like').  You can then easily select your accessories, and add them to your pledge.Alternatively, when the campaign ends, you will be sent a fulfilment survey and can add the accessories then.  Black Anodised Aluminium with Mother of Pearl end cap insert (Please note: to ensure secure fit for travel, the case is only compatible with the Crew Capsule as pictured, not the longer Cargo Capsule below)   
Black Anodised Aluminium desk stand
Stand can be used with retracting legs in open or closed positions
    
Supplied in either Steel or Dark Gunmetal finish
This also helps to extend the pen body for those who prefer a longer pen 
     The production of our Nominal Pen is all setup and ready to go!We have undergone several rounds of testing, and manufactured a small production run of pens to resolve and eliminate any foreseeable problems in large-scale production.This will ensure a smooth transition, and reduce any possible delays in fulfilling your orders. We are aiming to dispatch first customers orders in February 2021, and the remainder in March 2021.    Mercator was founded back in 2009, but together we have over 20 years’ experience designing well-engineered accessories for Luxury, European clients.Sundeep and Peter are based at the London design studio, Mark oversees manufacturing operations at the factory.    It's been quite a journey to get to Indiegogo.  Just like the SpaceX rocket landings we, too, had a few attempts and lost parts out at sea.  But that’s part of the process, and we’ve had fun (and lots of late nights) along the way.It’s taken us about six months to develop Nominal from first sketch through to the fully resolved prototype.        For journalists and bloggers, we have a Press Kit.You can email us directly at info@mercator.london, or get in touch via social media.Or, by clicking the FAQ, then following the relevant links.   Thanks for taking the time to view our NOMINAL pen.We really value your support and hope together we can make the campaign a success!Please back us, and help to share our campaign with friends and family.Follow us:   Risks & ChallengesThe main risks and challenges on this project stem from the unfortunate COVID-19 pandemic, which may cause delays in the supply of raw materials and in shipping customer orders. Although our suppliers and fulfilment team are almost back to full capacity, if there are any unfortunate delays, we will be sure to stay in regular communication with our backers. Our factory has successfully been manufacturing pens and accessories for European clients for over 15 years. They are capable of handling large scale orders and there should be little risk of delays. However, we can never rule them out completely and do acknowledge that there could be unexpected and unforeseen manufacturing issues that arise. If any do arise that will impact the delivery dates in anyway, we will communicate this to our backers as soon as we know of them.

story:
Are you struggling with productivity and efficiency, especially when working from home or remote working？

MagEasy™ is the ultimate organizing solution which greatly helps you boost your output at work by keeping your stuff in one place instead of scattering around, turning any desktop into a personalized and private workspace, so you can easily stay organized and focused.

MagEasy™ is an organization hack that helps you stay organized and get out the door fast in today's hectic world.

It adopts a fully-customizable and expandable magnetic modular design which allows you to utilize every square inch of it to store and arrange your items of daily use.

 

 

 

The Board, the Folio, and the magnetic modules work together seamlessly as one unified system to cleverly keep you organized all day.

MagEasy™ is a brilliant way to help you concentrate and boost your productivity and efficiency as a worker or a student. The magnetic modules on the Folio and the Board are easily swappable, enabling you to always stay organized, whether you are sedentary or nomadic.

 

The MagEasy™ Board is an all-in-one desktop organizer that keeps everything in place to save space and help to keep the mess at bay. Everything can be kept neatly in place on the Board in your own manner to eliminate clutter and save space on your desktop.   

 

The magnetic modules can be arbitrarily shared and arranged between the desktop Board and the mobile Folio, allowing you to organize things your way. They work together seamlessly as a synergistic system to keep you organized all day, providing the best-personalized organizing and storage experience you’ll ever have !!

The self-standing MagEasy™ Board instantly removes clutter on your desk by maximizing vertical storage space. All your workspace essentials are kept neat, tidy, and centralized in the most logical manner. And it can be folded into a flat and stowed away within seconds to keep your items safe and private. It also moonlights as a phone/tablet holder and support which props them up at 60° - a perfect viewing angle at a comfortable sight height.  

The portable MagEasy™ Folio securely holds your daily essentials such as keys, pens, headphones, and phones in place while you are on the move, so you will always have what you need ready at hand wherever the road takes you.

 

The MagEasy™ Board is a self-standing desktop organizer that keeps everything in place to save space and help to keep the mess at bay. Everything can be kept neatly in place on the Board in your own manner to eliminate clutter and save space on your desktop.

With the MagEasy™ Board, you will always have a clear view of and easy access to your most needed items, helping keep your mind refreshed and concentrated on the main tasks therefore boost your productivity. 

 

The MagEasy™ Board remains steady and still on its foldable support without sliding around on the desk. Thanks to its Red Dot Award winning-design, any document, note, phone, or tablet will be held at a 60° comfortable and healthy viewing angle.

 

The Board can be easily transformed into an ultra-slim flat in just one second and stowed away in any drawer.

 

With the MagEasy™ Folio’s novel organizing mechanism, your fumbling-for-things-in-your-bag days are behind you. Your keys, cards, pens, flash drive, wallet are all well-organized in the Folio for quick and easy access in case of emergency. MagEasy™ helps you cultivate a modern lifestyle.  

Simplify the out-the-door routine and decrease the chances of losing items by taking just the necessary items and holding them securely in a closed-book.

*The built-in magnets are TSA-approved and allowed on the flight.

 

Each MagEasy™ Folio comes with 40 sheets of A5-size filler paper (only 70gsm) in a wide variety of patterns to best fit your needs. It helps you capture and prioritize ideas, plans, and to-do lists, so nothing falls through the cracks. Working with LHiDS magnetic paper clip, it transforms into a hardcover notebook for you to take notes anywhere, anytime to boost work efficiency and productivity.  

We use quality “Scritta paper” for a smooth writing experience and quick dry time for great handwriting legibility. It is also one of the thinnest and durable papers in the world for people who love traveling.

 

MagEasy™ Folio fits easily in any handbag or backpack so your frequently used items are always right at your fingertips from place to place.

 

 Use it separately as a cable tie, a business card case, or a fridge magnet.

 Collect or bind small items.   

Snap the whole MagEasy™ organizer onto magnetic surfaces.

 

MagEasy’s organizing experience has just got even better with its collaboration with MOFT - an invisible and foldaway magnetic phone stand. When the MOFT is folded, you can easily attach your phone to the Board or Folio for the organization while propping it up for hands-free viewing and calling.

*This co-branded phone stand is solely available as an add-on at $19 in this InDemand campaign. After the campaign is over, it will no longer be sold on any platform.

 

Magnetically stuck to the Folio, MagEasy’s slim passport case makes a perfect companion for the minimalist traveler. Not only does it securely hold and offer RFID protection to your passport, but it also features multiple interior card slots for easy access to credit cards, ID, and money.

In the beginning of 2020, we participated in the 2020 Maison & Objet Paris-International trade fair dedicated to lifestyle fashions and trends.

 

Our team met with great success at the fair this Jan. With our latest MagEasy™ Folio and Board, we received many intentions and requests from buyers all over the world. LHiDS’s creativity stands out, and clients show their love for our designs.

Let’s see what they are talking about MagEasy™!

 

 

Hi, InDemand fans:

We are delighted to introduce our first project, MagEasy™ - the brand-new organizing solution. We are honored and proud to announce that we have just won the Red Dot Award 2020 this March.

Since 2018, we have made countless samples and exhausted all the tests in order to offer you the best products.

The core concept of MagEasy™’s highly customizable design conveys the spirit that we are eager to tell you, -- Be yourself!!

From the various colors to the modules, MagEasy™ is created to fit your needs and roles. We think thoughtfully for each occupation and occasion, therefore, you can create your own MagEasy™ and lifestyle with different combinations.

LHiDS - Leads a Modern Lifestyle.

"LHiDS Creative" is an innovative design studio focused on smart consumer tech & lifestyle products. We aim to offer creative designs which cannot be found in the market.

Our team is made up of talented designers, videographers, photographers, prototypers along with a dedicated support partners for our IP Legal needs, logistics and more.  Although we are young, we have years of experience in design, and we’ve been collaborated with other million-dollar crowdfunding projects in the past two years.

We love and value design and life, and love the creativeness and creations of Indiegogo , and hope to share our unlimited creativity with the loyal backers.

LHiDS keeps pushing the boundaries of design and creating products which make life easier and simpler by defying the conventional complexity and stereotype in life and imagination.

We had already made the first shipment  for backers before number 123. After backer number 123 to 171,  we will collected your info and your MagEasy will be sent in next shipment schedule around October.  The rest after number 171 we will make the arrangement ASAP. The shipping details will be in the next updates.    
The mark "MagEasy™" is intended to be used as a trademark in the contents of this website.

story:
A peel and stick whiteboard, powered by the futuristic Rocketbook app. Unleash your creativity with the utility of the cloud. ​

The Think Board X functions like a traditional whiteboard, but connects to the power of digital with the Rocketbook mobile app. That means before you erase your notes, they can be scanned to online destinations like Google Drive, Dropbox, and Evernote — perfectly organized. Now, your ideas can live forever, even after they are erased!

  • Organize your quick notes and tasks 
  • Share brainstorms and updates with your team 
  • Capture your next million dollar idea

The Think Board X works with Rocketbook's cloud organization system. Using the Rocketbook app, you assign 7 shortcut “symbols” to a destination of your choice. 

  • Save: Store files and documents to any folder in Dropbox, Google Drive, OneNote, OneDrive, Box, Trello, or Evernote. 
  • Execute: Send files straight to Trello, Slack, or email.

After you have completed scanning, simply select the destination symbol(s) you would like to send your notes. The Rocketbook app instantly files your notes in the right place. Your notes, ideas and to-do lists will be more organized than ever before!

*After the campaign ends you will receive a Backerkit survey where you will have an opportunity to make additions to your order and confirm your shipping address.

The Think Board X naturally works best on walls and desks, but also works great on other fun surfaces such as: windows, refrigerators, tables, laptops, binders, notebooks, mirrors, chalkboards, whiteboards, old whiteboards, or whiteboard paint.

Unlike traditional whiteboards, the Think Board X erases clean every time because it is built with a proprietary polyester composite that is made to last. Our favorite markers are Expo Low Odor, but feel free to use any other dry erase markers found online or in-stores.

Whether you put your Think Board X on painted drywall, a wooden desk, or a stainless steel refrigerator, our micro-bead adhesive is specifically designed to not damage your surface or leave any residue behind.

The magic of the Rocketbook System starts after you write on your Think Board X. Fire up the app and use the patent-pending image scan-and-enhance technology to accurately and quickly capture all of your notes and brainstorms. Then, beam them all to you favorite cloud services! 

With optical character recognition (OCR) you can name your scans by adding double hashtags on each side of your title on the Think Board X. Then scan the page to transcribe the text between the double hashtags. (ex: ## Team Meeting ## will automatically label your scan to "Team Meeting")

Whether analyzing trends in your personal habits, tracking company goals, or creating alternative methods for student assessments, the Think Board X will allow you to review incremental change and stay on track!

In an instant, the Rocketbook app crops and enhances each page so your digital notes are more crisp and vibrant than the real thing.

Step 1: Find smooth surface and wipe it clean of any dust 

(For super smooth surfaces like glass, mist the surface with water prior to installing to ensure a bubble-free install)

Step 2: Peel Think Board X off of the liner with the help of a friend

Step 3: Stick to surface and smooth into place with a microfiber cloth (included)

We've already begun production for our Kickstarter campaign! We are producing extra units to start to build up an inventory of the product. InDemand customers will have first access to the first batch of non-Kickstarter inventory we produce! Since we anticipate fulfilling the Kickstarter in early November, you can expect to recieve your Think Board X products around mid-late November! 

"It all started in my Babson College dorm room. I needed a space to write down business ideas and stay organized from week to week. However, I couldn't drill holes into the wall to set up a massive whiteboard or paint my walls with whiteboard paint. That's when Think Board was born - a dry erase film that was easy to install and remove, looked beautiful, and worked like a charm. I stuck the first version of our product to my dorm room wall to write down OTHER business ideas. After about 50 or more bad ideas, enough friends had come into my room saying "Hanson, your other ideas aren't that great... but THIS thing... this is cool. Where can I get one?

.... we launched our first Kickstarter in 2014 and Think Board was born!" - Hanson Grant

Once shipped, you should receive a tracking number (please allow at least 24 hours for the tracking number to update). We plan to ship via USPS, DHL or UPS. For international customers, your order will be handled by USPS or DHL up to the entry of your country. Once your order enters your country your order will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. International shipments will take 14-21 days. US orders will arrive within 5 business days.

If the package is returned because you're not at the location, entered in the wrong address, or moved locations without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. Please keep an eye on the tracking number when it arrives in your email inbox.

We cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this. Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes. As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo. Check out this handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency: http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a... As many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and is converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs. Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars: http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-e...

story:
We believe that in a world filled with distractions, all of us find it increasingly difficult to focus on the things and the people that really matter. We miss out on the most critical tasks that lay the foundations of our future. We fail to stay in touch with family and friends, and we forget to allocate time to our life-long desires and passions.

Don’t let your pursuit of success come in the way of your happiness.

We built the Elevate Planner from the ground up to provide you with the tools employed by the most successful people. It will help you visualize and define your goals, enhance your productivity through effective organization, live a well-rounded and balanced life, improve your health, and develop deeper relationships.

 

UPDATE: Perforated Pages have been removed in the final production due to failure rate based on pre-shipment sample user feedback.

 

Writing helps you to better articulate your goals, and to build a sense of accountability towards yourself. Writing and journaling also help you cut through the clutter and give you clarity.

With the ubiquity of connected devices, the idea of journaling and taking notes by hand may feel slow and regressive. However, there are various studies that have proven the benefits of putting pen to paper.

“Writing about achieving future goals and dreams can make people happier and healthier”

- The Health Benefits of Writing about Life Goals, Laura King

“The practice of writing can enhance the brain's intake, processing, retaining, and retrieving of information.”

- The Brain-Based Benefits of Writing for Math and Science Learning, Judy Willis MD

“Even when laptops are used solely to take notes, they may still be impairing learning because their use results in shallower processing”

- The Pen is Mightier Than the Keyboard, Pam A. Mueller, Daniel M. Oppenheimer

“When the children composed text by hand, they not only consistently produced more words more quickly than they did on a keyboard, but expressed more ideas.”

- Department of Educational Psychology, University of Washington

“Writing about stressful or traumatic events is related to improvements in self-reported health, psychological well-being, physiological functioning, and general functioning.”

- Journaling About Stressful Events, Philip M. Ullrich & Susan K. Lutgendorf

 

Your Vision Board

Visualize your plans and subsequently break them down into specific, measurable tasks with time-bound actions.

 

Your Month's Dashboard

View your entire month at a glance and navigate through the most critical tasks with ease.

 

Your Week's Dashboard

Be organized and creative, productive and expressive.

 

Your Month's Overview

Evaluate your past month and outline how to improve in the next.

 

Notes - 72 Pages

Choose among a selection of blank, dotted, gridded or ruled pages.

 

Keep-it-Clean Stickers (Indiegogo Special!)

Scribbling over mistakes is now a thing of the past!

 

Eternal Black

Mojito Mint

Uptown Tan

Stone Gray

Olympic Gold

Rose Gold

Banana Split Yellow

Fiery Red

Periwinkle Purple

Ocean Blue

Flamingo Pink

 

10% of the sales from the Freedom Collection will be donated to The Humsafar Trust, an NGO working towards advancing health and human rights for the LGBTQ community in India.

 

 

 

 

When will I receive my Elevate Planner & Notebook?

As mentioned in the timeline section, you should receive your planner & notebook by Christmas, 2017. However, we are working around the clock to get it to you as soon as we can. We will keep you updated on this as the project goes along. We want you to bring in 2018 with your Elevate Planner in hand!

Where does the Elevate Planner & Notebook ship?

We offer worldwide shipping! Wherever you are, our planner & notebook can meet you there.

How do I specify the color I want for the cover?

Shortly after the campaign ends, we will send out a survey where you can choose your color.

I have purchased multiple planners/notebooks. Can I choose different colors for each?

Absolutely! You get the option to choose different colors for each of your planners/notebooks.

Is the Elevate Planner for 6 months or 12 months?

Your planner will be your companion throughout the year! :)

Can I order more planners or notebooks than what are available in the Perks?

Absolutely! Email us at bulk@elevateplanner.com and we will set you up with as many planners & notebooks as you need. Bulk orders can also be personalized with your company logo, name, etc. for an additional fee.

How is the planner structured?

The sectional breakdown for the planner is as below:

  • Planner - 160 Pages
  • Notes - 72 Pages, including 12 Perforated Pages (perforated pages have been removed in the final production run due to failure rate.)
  • Whiteboard - 2 Sheets

Can I claim more than one perk?

Absolutely! However as per Indiegogo rules, there is no feature for you to be able to add multiple perks in a single transaction. As such, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

Have any other questions you wish to ask us?

Drop us an email at hello@elevateplanner.com and we will get back to you at the earliest.

There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

The biggest risks with a product crowdfunding campaign are manufacturing & shipping.

We will be working around the clock to get your planners & notebooks to you by Christmas 2017. We will keep you updated on this as the project goes along. Delay at Customs in your country is out of our control and any issue arising at customs must be handled by you at your end.

During the campaign and during production, we pledge to be open and transparent. Issues may come up, and you'll hear about them from us. You'll also hear about how we're going to resolve these issues to make sure your planner reaches you in time.

We want you to bring in 2018 with your Elevate Planner in hand and we're committed to make that happen!
story_txt:
We believe that in a world filled with distractions, all of us find it increasingly difficult to focus on the things and the people that really matter. We miss out on the most critical tasks that lay the foundations of our future. We fail to stay in touch with family and friends, and we forget to allocate time to our life-long desires and passions.
Don’t let your pursuit of success come in the way of your happiness.
We built the Elevate Planner from the ground up to provide you with the tools employed by the most successful people. It will help you visualize and define your goals, enhance your productivity through effective organization, live a well-rounded and balanced life, improve your health, and develop deeper relationships.
 

UPDATE: Perforated Pages have been removed in the final production due to failure rate based on pre-shipment sample user feedback.


 



Writing helps you to better articulate your goals, and to build a sense of accountability towards yourself. Writing and journaling also help you cut through the clutter and give you clarity.
With the ubiquity of connected devices, the idea of journaling and taking notes by hand may feel slow and regressive. However, there are various studies that have proven the benefits of putting pen to paper.
“Writing about achieving future goals and dreams can make people happier and healthier”
- The Health Benefits of Writing about Life Goals, Laura King
“The practice of writing can enhance the brain's intake, processing, retaining, and retrieving of information.”
- The Brain-Based Benefits of Writing for Math and Science Learning, Judy Willis MD
“Even when laptops are used solely to take notes, they may still be impairing learning because their use results in shallower processing”
- The Pen is Mightier Than the Keyboard, Pam A. Mueller, Daniel M. Oppenheimer
“When the children composed text by hand, they not only consistently produced more words more quickly than they did on a keyboard, but expressed more ideas.”
- Department of Educational Psychology, University of Washington
“Writing about stressful or traumatic events is related to improvements in self-reported health, psychological well-being, physiological functioning, and general functioning.”
- Journaling About Stressful Events, Philip M. Ullrich & Susan K. Lutgendorf

 


Your Vision Board

Visualize your plans and subsequently break them down into specific, measurable tasks with time-bound actions.

 
Your Month's Dashboard

View your entire month at a glance and navigate through the most critical tasks with ease.

 
Your Week's Dashboard

Be organized and creative, productive and expressive.

 
Your Month's Overview

Evaluate your past month and outline how to improve in the next.

 
Notes - 72 Pages

Choose among a selection of blank, dotted, gridded or ruled pages.
 
Keep-it-Clean Stickers (Indiegogo Special!)

Scribbling over mistakes is now a thing of the past!
 



Eternal Black

Mojito Mint

Uptown Tan

Stone Gray

Olympic Gold

Rose Gold

Banana Split Yellow

Fiery Red

Periwinkle Purple

Ocean Blue

Flamingo Pink
 


10% of the sales from the Freedom Collection will be donated to The Humsafar Trust, an NGO working towards advancing health and human rights for the LGBTQ community in India.

 





 

 

 

When will I receive my Elevate Planner & Notebook?
As mentioned in the timeline section, you should receive your planner & notebook by Christmas, 2017. However, we are working around the clock to get it to you as soon as we can. We will keep you updated on this as the project goes along. We want you to bring in 2018 with your Elevate Planner in hand!
Where does the Elevate Planner & Notebook ship?
We offer worldwide shipping! Wherever you are, our planner & notebook can meet you there.
How do I specify the color I want for the cover?
Shortly after the campaign ends, we will send out a survey where you can choose your color.
I have purchased multiple planners/notebooks. Can I choose different colors for each?
Absolutely! You get the option to choose different colors for each of your planners/notebooks.
Is the Elevate Planner for 6 months or 12 months?
Your planner will be your companion throughout the year! :)
Can I order more planners or notebooks than what are available in the Perks?
Absolutely! Email us at bulk@elevateplanner.com and we will set you up with as many planners & notebooks as you need. Bulk orders can also be personalized with your company logo, name, etc. for an additional fee.
How is the planner structured?
The sectional breakdown for the planner is as below:

Planner - 160 Pages
Notes - 72 Pages, including 12 Perforated Pages (perforated pages have been removed in the final production run due to failure rate.)
Whiteboard - 2 Sheets

Can I claim more than one perk?
Absolutely! However as per Indiegogo rules, there is no feature for you to be able to add multiple perks in a single transaction. As such, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.
Have any other questions you wish to ask us?
Drop us an email at hello@elevateplanner.com and we will get back to you at the earliest.
There was an error with my contribution. What happened?
Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

The biggest risks with a product crowdfunding campaign are manufacturing & shipping.
We will be working around the clock to get your planners & notebooks to you by Christmas 2017. We will keep you updated on this as the project goes along. Delay at Customs in your country is out of our control and any issue arising at customs must be handled by you at your end.
During the campaign and during production, we pledge to be open and transparent. Issues may come up, and you'll hear about them from us. You'll also hear about how we're going to resolve these issues to make sure your planner reaches you in time.
We want you to bring in 2018 with your Elevate Planner in hand and we're committed to make that happen!

story:
★ Update - (Oct 14):

Here are the designs for our Fashionista Perk

If your donation included this t-shirt, we will contact you after the campaign is over, to see which design and color you want delivered to you.

FASHIONISTA PERK - Free Shipping to Mexico has been added!

★ Update - (Oct 13):

Promote the project or social cause you believe in. talely invites everyone to participate in their facebook contest (http://on.fb.me/16axfl1) to win a digital interactive tale. The top two with the most likes will be the winners.

These tales can be published and embedded everywhere (facebook page, website, blog, etc.) at the same time. The contest itself is the best example of what a digital tale can do.

This contest will run from Sunday, Oct 13 to Sunday, Oct 27th and we will deliver the tale on Wednesday, Oct 30th.

We only ask that you share our campaign page (http://igg.me/at/talely/x/4909614) in facebook, twitter and google+. Please use #talely when you share.

Thanks!


Build engaging stories with text, video, audio, animations and interactions in minutes!



Presenting talely's ecosystem

A complete storytelling ecosystem that allows users with no programming skills to create, publish and share interactive digital stories. It's as easy and fast to use as Powerpoint but incredibly more powerful and completely free and online!

Talely's ecosystem components

  1. Tale Editor      90% completed - Release: Feb 2014
  2. Tale HUB          50% completed - Release: Feb 2014
  3. Block Editor   50% completed - Beta Release: June 2014
  4. Mobile Apps  Beta Release: June 2014
  5. Marketplace   Beta Release June 2014

Our HTML5 platform allows users to publish their tales everywhere (facebook, blogs, websites) and can be viewed in all devices (computers, tablets, smartphones).

check our FAQ or Contact Us

1. Tale Editor 90% completed - Release: Feb 2014       Menu

You can create

  • Digital Storytelling
  • Facebook Pages & Apps
  • Presentations
  • Banners
  • Microsites

Check out a video of how to create a tale in 5 minutes:

And here's the tale that was produced: http://bit.ly/12WO3NA

2. Tale HUB 90% completed - Release: Feb 2014       Menu

The hub is the place where all tales will be saved and you will be able to browse and rate them so that the most relevant ones can be easily found.

You will also have your own personal page with statistics and you will be able to create as many channels as you need for your interests. And if everyone thinks that your creations are great, you will earn special badges so that you will receive the recognition you deserve!

3. Block Editor 50% completed - Beta Release: Jun 2014       Menu

Our platform is based on blocks that contain custom functionality and we already have the initial ones (video, audio, images, etc.) but we know everyone has different needs. This is the reason we also built for you, developers of the world, our block editor, a web based Integrated Development Environment that with a very simple interface, greatly simplifies the creation of new blocks with any functionality you desire, avoiding the complexities of configuring web components and programming.

Using our API, the integration with other systems and new technologies will be seamless, hence you will be able to extend the capabilities of talers beyond what we can currently imagine.

Here's quick video overview of the Block Editor:

4. Mobile Apps Beta Release: Jun 2014       Menu

The world is becoming more and more mobile, therefore talely will have the app you need to take it on the run! These apps will be available for the main mobile platforms in the market (iOS, Android and Firefox OS).

5. Marketplace Beta Release: Jun 2014       Menu

We want our ecosystem to be self sustainable for our users, so we designed a marketplace where storytellers, developers and creatives will be able to present their tales, functionality blocks and templates and decide if they want to charge for their creations or allow talers to use them for free.

This will also promote a continuous evolution of talely so that everyone is assured of the future of the platform.

FAQ Menu

THE BASICS

What is a digital tale?

Any kind of interactive digital experience that integrates videos, photos, images, sound and text and that includes animations and user interactions.

Why is talely different?

Talely has 5 main components and is the only solution that truly enables the creation, publication, hosting, sharing and display of these digital tales without any technical skill from the user. And not only that, we really think that we all can create an amazing tale repository where all the stories that are relevant in the world can be stored and shared, so we can ultimately build a knowledge hub. We want to democratize digital engagement!

Do I need programming skills to create and publish tales using talely?

Our goal is that anyone can create and communicate their ideas in the most engaging digital way. At this moment, this would take a team of designers, developers and a technical infrastructure that cost a lot of money and takes a long time to achieve. This is why we created our ecosystem that eliminates all these barriers.

Can I create and publish all the tales that I want?

Yes, there will be no limits to the number of tales you can create with talely.

Can I use any browser to work on talely?

Our tales can be seen in all HTML5 browsers and for creating your tales, since our editor uses the most advanced capabilities available, we highly recommend using the latest versions of Chrome or Firefox.

How long does it take to learn how to use the platform?

If you have used presentation tools in the past, learning our platform will take no more than one hour. We have seen cases where users are proficient almost immediately. Once you know how to use it, you can fully exploit itâ€™s potential and become a talely master in a couple of days.

Can I say goodbye to Powerpoint, Keynotes or Prezi?

Hey, we love and also use those tools! We think every tool is unique and depends on what are you using it for, so please don't erase them from your computer. In the case of talely, we are not only specialized in presentations and we think you can make most of the things you do with these tools and much more with the benefits that tales are web-based and that they can be viewed immediately by almost any device without the need of downloading software.

Will you have premium accounts?

Well, who doesn’t! Joking aside, we think that eventually we will have premium accounts that will be specifically for users or companies that will profit from the use of talely. What we won’t do is “water down” the free version... you will always be able to create the best possible tales. And also, if you get one of our perks, you will always be premium to us!

OUR COMPONENTS

What is a block?

Blocks are the basic building elements of our tales and the user can place them in the tale’s page and can easily configure its functionality without any programming. Some examples are: video, audio, text, images and iframes blocks, which by the way, we have already developed.

Will I be able to create new blocks and will you provide tools?

Yes, because we know there are millions of incredible developers in the world and we want them to help us evolve the platform for the benefit of all our users. We are finishing an online Integrated Development Environment (IDE) that, with a very simple interface, will greatly simplify the creation of new blocks and functionalities.
We will also publish our API, so that the integration with other systems and new technologies will be possible and seamless.

What is a template?

A template is a wizard that helps users create new tales step by step and can be categorized into all kinds of themes (e.g., trips, hobbies, projects, social causes, resumes, etc.). They contain the narrative, structure and art needed to help users create engaging tales. Once we finish this development, anyone will be able to create new templates and offer them to the community. Right now you can create a tale and duplicate it as many times you need so you can use it as a template.

What is an editor plugin?

When we designed the editor, we knew it had to be easy to extend in functionality so we developed it to be completely modular. For example, the alignment tools you use in our editor to align your blocks is a simple plugin. The plugin documentation will be open so you can create your own and help evolve the platform and even connect it with any service you like (e.g., developers will be able to create a plugin that connects to their favorite image hosting service, expanding the functionalities of the current media manager).

Can I design something in another tool (let’s say Adobe Illustrator) and export it directly?

Yes, you will eventually be able to paste the clipboard into our editor and right now we are working in the current technological limitations because it doesn't work all the time as expected. Until we finish this process you need to export your images and import them to our tool from your file system or drag and drop them directly into the editor canvas.

Can I save a tale as pdf?

Because our tool allows you to create animated and interactive tales, saving them as a PDF is probably not the best way to deliver them, so it hasn’t been a priority. But hey, nothing is impossible, so if this is a MUST please let us know and we will see what we can do.

Can I have a branded company channel?

This is definitely a feature in our roadmap, so YES, you will be able to have a branded channel. Until now, we have not focused in developing this but if you want to change this status, there's the Game Changer perk that will enable us to finish it when we launch in February 2014!

You mention a “marketplace”, how is it going to work?

In this marketplace, storytellers, creatives and developers will be able to sell their work (tales, templates and blocks) within our platform. We have not yet defined in detail the economics of how this will work but it will be very similar to current 'app' stores.

Can I work with others at the same time while creating a story?

Right now you can but it’s a bit tricky since you have to work in different pages. We do have an alpha version of this feature and when it’s finished, you'll be able to fully collaborate LIVE and efficiently while creating a story.

OUR TECHNOLOGY

What technology is behind talely?

We love new technologies, so everything we do is based on the latest and most efficient stuff out there (of course using stable versions!). Our infrastructures is almost entirely designed and implemented over Amazon AWS except for some backup, development and deployment tools that we use inside our offices. Our backend mostly uses node.js, redis, mongodb and memcache and it is designed to be completely scalable. As for the frontend, we heavily use coffescript almost in every bit of our product. Our hub, which we are creating as we write this, is being developed using tools like can.js, brunch, stylus and handlebars, having initially used steal and jquerymx for the editor and player. So, we are always choosing the most efficient technologies after a careful assessment and risk analysis. Even when we are already using something, it may be replaced by something better the next time we can!

Does the platform allow the editing of pictures and videos?

Our image block is connected to a great service called aviary (http://www.aviary.com) that allows the editing of pictures. Our video block is not currently connected to any service of this kind so if you know a good one, please share it with us and we will integrate it with our platform.

How do I know that my stories will be always available?

We take very seriously the availability of the tales published in our platform and we have taken extreme measures to assure it. Every tale you publish is literally an optimized copy of the original and it’s hosted in one of the most powerful and widely available Content Delivery Network, or CDN. This CDN brings 2 great benefits:
  1. It replicates the tale all over the world so that it will be available in a server near the user that wants to view it, eliminating the latency and assuring the fastest possible delivery speed.
  2. It guarantees that your tale will be available no matter how much traffic it receives.

Could I develop a game with the developer tools in talely?

Yes, in fact, we planned our ecosystem to be able to grow into whatever you might think (well, not really everything... but it can certainly do a lot of things!).

ABOUT TALELY

After launching talely, how much will it cost to use it?

Nothing, that's why we need the funds so we can make talely available for free. In the future we are planning on charging certain functionalities that will enable our users to make profit using the platform. So, as long as you use talely for your tales and non-profit activities, we won't charge a dime!

How do I know the development status of talely?

Right now we have an alpha version of the tale editor and hub. As soon as this campaign ends, we will publish a roadmap with the status of how the things you helped us to develop are going. Also, if you contributed as an early bird taler, you will have early access to the editor and you will be a witness of the progress as you use the tool because we have a very active schedule for releasing new functionalities and bug fixes (usually a week or two).

How many people work in talely?

A team of 10 totally committed (and a bit crazy) talers, from all kind of different backgrounds: developers, designers, creatives, consultants and more...

How have you funded the development of talely?

We have funded the development until now from the profits of other projects and with the support and understanding of family and friends, investing everything we have into making talely a reality.

Can I go to your office and have a cup of coffee with all of you?

Sure, anytime! But please bring a mug (we are short on those right now!).

Why are you asking for $50,000 dollars?

For two reasons, the first being that we still need to finish the platform and all 2013 we have focused exclusively in this development, declining any other projects that were not directly related to it. On the other hand, one of the main threats to a startup such as ours is success, so if we do get a lot of users, we need funds to pay for servers, and they don't come cheap!

Contact Us Menu

If you have any other questions, comments or jokes that you want to share with us, please write us at indiegogo@talely.com and we'll get back to you asap!


THANKS FOR YOUR HELP
MAKING TALELY A REALITY!

Our image block is connected to a great service called aviary (http://www.aviary.com) that allows the editing of pictures.  Our video block is not currently connected to any service of this kind so if you know a good one, please share it with us and we will integrate it with our platform.
How do I know that my stories will be always available?
We take very seriously the availability of the tales published in our platform and we have taken extreme measures to assure it.  Every tale you publish is literally an optimized copy of the original and it’s hosted in one of the most powerful and widely available Content Delivery Network, or CDN.  This CDN brings 2 great benefits:
			
It replicates the tale all over the world so that it will be available in a server near the user that wants to view it, eliminating the latency and assuring the fastest possible delivery speed.
It guarantees that your tale will be available no matter how much traffic it receives.


Could I develop a game with the developer tools in talely?
Yes, in fact, we planned our ecosystem to be able to grow into whatever you might think (well, not really everything... but it can certainly do a lot of things!).
ABOUT TALELY
After launching talely, how much will it cost to use it?
Nothing, that's why we need the funds so we can make talely available for free.  In the future we are planning on charging certain functionalities that will enable our users to make profit using the platform.  So, as long as you use talely for your tales and non-profit activities, we won't charge a dime!
How do I know the development status of talely?
Right now we have an alpha version of the tale editor and hub.  As soon as this campaign ends, we will publish a roadmap with the status of how the things you helped us to develop are going.  Also, if you contributed as an early bird taler, you will have early access to the editor and you will be a witness of the progress as you use the tool because we have a very active schedule for releasing new functionalities and bug fixes (usually a week or two).
How many people work in talely?
A team of 10 totally committed (and a bit crazy) talers, from all kind of different backgrounds: developers, designers, creatives, consultants and more...
How have you funded the development of talely?
We have funded the development until now from the profits of other projects and with the support and understanding of family and friends, investing everything we have into making talely a reality.
Can I go to your office and have a cup of coffee with all of you?
Sure, anytime!  But please bring a mug (we are short on those right now!).
Why are you asking for $50,000 dollars?
For two reasons, the first being that we still need to finish the platform and all 2013 we have focused exclusively in this development, declining any other projects that were not directly related to it.  On the other hand, one of the main threats to a startup such as ours is success, so if we do get a lot of users, we need funds to pay for servers, and they don't come cheap!


Contact Us Menu


If you have any other questions, comments or jokes that you want to share with us, please write us at indiegogo@talely.com and we'll get back to you asap!
THANKS FOR YOUR HELPMAKING TALELY A REALITY!

story:
The Vinpok Taptek is an ultra-slim (16 mm), RGB backlit,  wireless mechanical keyboard with low profile blue switches. Though wireless, it can be connected via wired as well. The Taptek keyboard comes with a Mac layout and can connect with up to three devices at the same time.

Compatible With All Devices

Taptek is compatible with almost all devices. The Taptek keyboard works with Mac, iOS, Windows, and Android operating systems. This unique cross-device function allows you to switch between the various operating systems on your devices with just a slide of a button on the side on Taptek.

Increased Typing Productivity

A mechanical keyboard best for daily use, and the Taptek is designed for productivity and portability. After testing of more than 40 keyboard models, we’re giving users all their favorite features in a single keyboard; an ultra-thin body and switches for a great tactile feel.

19 Types Of RGB Backlits

Taptek comes with 4-level of adjustable RGB backlights with 19 different color effects that you can adjust to best cater to your needs. With all these choices, customize the Taptek keyboard to your personal taste and environment.

Wireless And Wired Modes

Imagine a world free of cables and restrictions. The Taptek keyboard can connect to your computer via USB-C or wirelessly via Bluetooth. It is compatible with iOS, Mac, Windows, Android, Linux, and any mobile devices.  

 
 
 

Founded in 2017, Vinpok is formed by a team of dynamic, creative designers and entrepreneurs who fond of the minimalist aesthetic, such passion and belief bring them together. Vinpok strives to offer customers the highest quality Apple peripheral accessories and solutions, and make their everyday life more convenient in a fast-paced world.

We love minimalist design, high-quality products, and this idea is not only reflected in the Taptek wireless mechanical keyboard, but all products in the brand portfolio. Vinpok is committed to offering customers the most innovative products, and the highest quality in every detail through advanced technology.

Time is always the most challenging part when trying to bring a product to life as there are so many procedures that must be managed. However, with this being our third Indiegogo campaign, we can confidently say that we are already familiar with the Crowdfunding process. Most importantly, the electronic product design and production are no strangers to us. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. And will strive for excellence from project planning, production to order shipping. If there’s any obstacle, we will definitely keep you in the loop. Thanks for believing in us!

story:
Introducing L-CHEAPO

Got a 3D printer? Want to work with something you can't melt? Burn through it! With a friggin' laser. L-CHEAPO is a low cost laser cutter that can cut 3/16" wood and plastic, and engrave most nonmetallic materials. It lives on top of a 3D printer or CNC mill, and does not get in the way of using the tool normally -- you can switch from laser to printer mode and vice versa in less than two minutes with no tools. Any hobby grade 3D printer will work, as will most CNC mills. The diode operates at 445nm so protection equipment is readily available - I will provide a pair of protection goggles on request if you do not have them already.



What We Need & What You Get


  • THIS IS ALREADY A WORKING SYSTEM. No vaporware. I've already sold a few to friends.
  • OPEN SOURCE! We've reached our goal, so  the working drawings and schematics are published at http://robots-everywhere.com/re_wiki/index.php?n=Main.LCheapo If you want to buy one but didn't make the funding window, my contact information is mailto:mkb@robots-everywhere.com
  • You will not need an extra power supply, or even new software - just create a special extrusion profile for the software you already use (Slic3r / skeinforge /etc). Any 3D printer will work, if it doesn't, I'm going to design a custom unit just for yours.
  • If I have enough pre-orders, I will put the schematics, wiring diagrams, and mechanical drawings on my website and open the design under a noncommercial open license.
  • If I reach the goal early, I will ship early: this is a finished and tested design already! UPDATE: The goal has been reached, so I've started shipping. This will happen on a first-ordered-first-get basis, unless you have an emergency. If you do, email me.
  • You can get a laser cutter module from me, or have me use it to engrave or cut something for you, so you can see how well it works.
  • Once this succeeds, there will be bigger lasers...

The Impact

Laser cutting requires a significant initial investment, but opens up a lot of making possibilities -- laser-cut parts are tougher than 3D printer parts, for example. With this device, the initial dollar investment goes from thousands to hundreds. The module also requires very little space.

I hope that this allows high school shop classes, small universities and local hackerspaces to be able to work with a wider variety of materials and techniques.

Other Ways You Can Help

Show this to people who may have a use for it! (Remember to never look into laser aperture with remaining eye).

About Me

I have been building autonomous drones, data loggers, and telemetry equipment since 2007. The L-CHEAPO is my first foray into directed energy devices - you can decide for yourself whether I'm building an army of laser robots or not. I do, however, have a laser shark.

story:
www.verzauberte-weihnachten.at


For the story in english, please scroll down.

Wie kam es eigentlich zu dieser Idee?

Projektkoordinatorin Ulli:
"Vor über 30 Jahren haben meine Eltern das Läuten eines kleinen Glöckchens mit 2-minütiger Vorlaufzeit auf Kassette aufgenommen. Jedes Jahr am Heiligen Abend wurde diese Kassette heimlich aus der Weihnachtskiste hervorgeholt und in den Kassettenrecorder eingelegt. In einem unauffälligen Augenblick zündete mein Vaterheimlich die Kerzen am Christbaum an, öffnete das Fenster (damit das Christkind wieder hinausfliegen kann :-), und drückte am Kassettenrecorder auf Play.

Als dann exakt zwei Minuten später das Christkind läutete, waren alle anwesend – Mama, Papa, mein Bruder und ich… und wer soll sonst geläutet haben wenn nicht das Christkind?

Weihnachten war für mich und meinen Bruder jedes Jahr verzaubert und ein wunderschönes Erlebnis!  

Da sich die Technologien weiter entwickelt haben, wurden diese 2-Minuten-Vorlaufzeit und das anschliessende Christkind-Glockerl-Klingeln für meine Kinder von der Kassette auf CD gebrannt. Nun gehen wir noch einen Schritt weiter und entwickeln für genau dieses über 30 Jahre alte Klingeln eine APP :-)"

Für die Umsetzung der App sind aber noch einige finanzielle Mittel notwendig und dafür suchen wir Unterstützung!


Lasst uns Weihnachten verzaubern und Kinderaugen zum Strahlen bringen!

Mit unserer Weihnachtszauber-App bringen wir das "echte" Christkind nach Hause, erleichtern den Eltern den Ablauf des heiligen Abends - wir verzaubern Weihnachten.

Mit dem Reinerlös aus dem APP-Verkauf werden wir die Make-A-Wish Foundation® unterstützen und damit den einen oder sogar mehrere Herzenswünsche erfüllen können.

Unsere Ziele:

  • Verzauberte Weihnachten für die Kinder, die das echte Christkind läuten hören.
  • Verzauberte Weihnachten für die Eltern, die die leuchtenden Kinderaugen sehen.
  • Verzauberte Weihnachten für die Kinder und Eltern, die durch unsere Weihnachtszauber-App und die Spenden einen Herzenswunsch erfüllt bekommen.
  • Verzauberte Weihnachten für alle, die uns geholfen haben und gespendet haben.
  • Und verzauberte Weihnachten auch für uns, weil wir etwas Wunderschönes für andere und uns selber umgesetzt haben.

Wie man das Weihnachtsfest verzaubert:

  1. Kurz vor Weihnachten die App im Apple Appstore oder Google Play Store downloaden - der Reinerlös wird für die Make-A-Wish Foundation® gespendet.
  2. Vorlaufzeit einstellen (zb. 2 oder 3 Minuten), ein Klingeln aus verschiedenen, authentischen Glöckchentönen auswählen, Glöckchen-Klingel-Dauer einstellen, Kindersicherung aktivieren und Handy in der Nähe des Christbaumes platzieren, Kerzen anzünden, Fenster öffnen (damit das Christkind wieder rausfliegen kann :-)) und sich wieder unauffällig zu seiner Familie gesellen. Gemeinsam mit den Kindern wartet man nun bis das Christkind klingelt. Und wer soll sonst geläutet haben, wenn nicht das echte Christkind?!
  3. Das Strahlen in den Kinderaugen genießen  und sich verzaubern lassen :)

Wir brauchen eure Unterstützung!

Die App-Programmierung übernimmt ein professioneller Programmierer. Das ist mit einigen Kosten verbunden - um diese aufzubringen, brauchen wir eure HIlfe! Wir freuen uns über eure finanzielle Unterstützung hier auf indiegogo.com.

Die Projektorganisatorinnen

Wir sind eine Grafikerin und eine Interior Designerin mit PR-Background  und haben insgesamt fünf Kinder, die jedes Jahr sehnsüchtig aufs Christkind warten - und noch daran glauben. 

Wie kann man uns noch helfen?

Verbreitet unsere Kampagne auf Facebook, Twitter, über E-mail und über alle Kanäle, die euch noch einfallen - nutzt dafür auch das Tool von indiegogo!

Lets make Christmas magical again and fulfill children's wishes.

The Magical Christmas-App brings the real Christkind (the european equivalent of Santa Claus) back into the houses and makes the Christmas Day easier for parents - we make Christmas magical again.

We support the Make-A-Wish Foundation®  with the net profits of the App-Sale and fulfill as many wishes of sick children as possible.

Our goals:

  • Magical Christmas for the kids that hear the real Christkind's bell
  • Magical Christmas for the parents who see their childrens' eyes beam with joy
  • Magical Christmas for those children and their parents whose wish gets fulfilled with the donations of the Sales of the Magical Christmas-App
  • Magical Christmas for all who helped us finance the App, bought the App or donated for the children
  • And magical Christmas for us, because we made something special for others and us, too. 

How to make Christmas magical again:

  1. Download the App via Apple's Appstore or Google Play on Christmas Eve- the net profits will be donated to the Make-A-Wish Foundation® 
  2. Decide, when the App will ring the Christkind-Bell (i.e. in 2 or 3 minutes) and choose an authentic bell. Activate the child safety and place the mobile phone in the vicinity of the Christmas tree, light the candles, open the window (the Christkind needs to leave again, right?) and join your family inconspiciously. Now wait with your children for the ringing of the Christkind bell - who else rang the bell than the Christkind, since everyone is in the room?!
  3. Enjoy your children beaming with joy and your magical Christmas!

We need YOUR support!!

The App is programmed by a professional App-Programmer - that costs money and we need your support to raise that money. Thank you so much for your help! Every help counts!!

Who are we?

We are a graphic designer and an interior designer with a PR background with five children who still believe in the Christkind and wait every year longingly for the it to come and bring some presents.

Other ways of helping us

Share our campaign on facebook, twitter, google +, via e-mail and every other way you can think of - and please use the tools of indiegogo for it!
