story:
Introducing THEDATESAFE .ch

Inspired by our customers and by news headlines, carefully chosen "open source" components assembled in a unique way to provide state of the art secured services with PRIVACY as keystone

OPTIMAL secured storage in Switzerland, for the SIMPLE sharing and synchronization of your data.

THEDATASAFE.ch is a new service based in Switzerland with end-to-end encryption for data sync and share.
We have specifically customized the environment where data is hosted with emphasis on privacy, security, access control, and encryption. Your data is stored in Switzerland, which offers data privacy laws stricter than many other countries in the world.

For media inquiries please contact Laurence Blazianu at media@thedatasafe.ch (EN-FR)

Why the need for an optimal secured storage service?

“The need for THEDATASAFE.ch has been inspired by my clients and the recent sensitive issues around data storage and sharing I saw emerging with widely used cloud services.” Olivier Cochard, founder of THEDATASAFE.ch.

At THEDATASAFE.ch, we are concerned about the privacy and safety of our clients’ data, generated by their personal and professional life. Data is often essential to the running of your activities and shall be treated as an extremely precious asset.  Currently, widely used cloud solutions such as DropBoxTM , BoxTM or GoogleDriveTM, rely on US based servers with all the legal implications that make the headlines. Those solutions induce uncontrolled access to data, sometime resulting in unsolicited advertisement, and potentially invisible surveillance.

The key dilemma for end-users is the following: “My data shall belong to my person or my company, and therefore shall be completely secured even when I share it. Between my holiday pictures, customers contact details, or company’s contracts, those data must be only accessible to the sole people I choose to share it with, and not within a system I have no control over. On the technical aspect, I expect an easy and simple access to data at anytime, from anywhere, and on any device.”

To answer this need, we have designed state of the art services that provides ”drop box like"", end-to-end encryption, synchronization and sharing capabilities without compromising the confidentiality and security of data. Our goal is to offer an optimal data safe like a safe in a private bank! Data is encrypted physically on the servers. Even administrators at THEDATASAFE.ch can’t access clients' data content.

FEATURES
Swiss based
  • Swiss data privacy protection.
Zero access
  • For you eyes only.
Easy to use
  • Sync and Share.
Anywhere, anytime
  • Your data whenever you want.
Cross Platform
  • With desktop and mobile apps.
Manage your team
  • Collaborate and share securely.
Why do we need funding of USD 145’000?
In order to bring this service to anyone seeking Internet privacy, we need to finance the first 18 months of our business plan for our Stage 2 infrastructure. More importantlsy, we are doing this campaign on Indiegogo in order to stay independent.

Those funds are split between:

- The one off investment costs for the Stage 2 servers and redundant storage, including their setup;

- The hosting, the development, the manpower, and the marketing; and

- The costs to build the prototype of THEDATASAFE.ch Appliance; and

- The costs for the licenses of the different components of our solution

What do we offer contributors?

Our Beta service is going very well and has become the template for our Stage 2 environment. Your contribution will enable us to bring data privacy to more people and companies more rapidly.

As contributors, you have a chance to use our services now, in Beta, you will find perks that will give you access to the few slots available including free migration to the new environment when it becomes available.

Otherwise, if you can wait, you can directly reserve your slot on the Stage 2 environment and your contribution will help us reach that goal sooner.

About us
We are a team of privacy advocates with enterprise IT services background. Moreover, we are entrepreneurs passionate about new technologies with the experience of running a business. Olivier Cochard founded OCIM in Switzerland back in 2010, after more than 20 years in various IT positions at Hewlett-Packard from development, services management and consulting, to managing worldwide IT projects and programs.

with widely used cloud services.” Olivier Cochard, founder of THEDATASAFE.ch.
At THEDATASAFE.ch, we
are concerned about the privacy and safety of our clients’ data, generated by
their personal and professional life. Data is often essential to the running of
your activities and shall be treated as an extremely precious asset.  Currently, widely used cloud solutions such
as DropBoxTM , BoxTM or GoogleDriveTM, rely on US based servers with all the legal implications that
make the headlines. Those solutions induce uncontrolled access to data,
sometime resulting in unsolicited advertisement, and potentially invisible surveillance.

The key dilemma for end-users is the following: “My
data shall belong to my person or my company, and therefore shall be completely
secured even when I share it. Between my holiday pictures, customers contact
details, or company’s contracts, those data must be only accessible to the sole
people I choose to share it with, and not within a system I have no control
over. On the technical aspect, I expect an easy and simple access to data at
anytime, from anywhere, and on any device.” 
To answer this need, we
have designed state of the art services that provides ”drop box
like"", end-to-end encryption, synchronization and sharing
capabilities without compromising the confidentiality and security of data. Our
goal is to offer an optimal data safe like a safe in a private bank! Data is encrypted physically on
the servers. Even administrators at THEDATASAFE.ch can’t access clients' data content. FEATURESSwiss basedSwiss data privacy protection.Zero accessFor you eyes only. Easy to use Sync and Share. Anywhere, anytimeYour data whenever you want.Cross PlatformWith desktop and mobile apps.Manage your team Collaborate and share securely.Why do we need funding of USD 145’000?In order to bring this service to anyone seeking Internet
     privacy, we need to finance the first 18 months of our business plan for our Stage 2 infrastructure. More importantlsy, we are doing this campaign on Indiegogo in order to stay independent.Those funds are split between:- The one off investment costs for the Stage 2 servers and redundant storage, including their
setup;
- The hosting, the development, the manpower, and the marketing;
and- The costs to build the prototype of THEDATASAFE.ch Appliance;
and- The costs for the licenses of the different components of our solutionWhat do we offer contributors?
Our Beta service is going very well and
has become the template for our Stage 2 environment. Your contribution will enable us to bring data privacy
to more people and companies more rapidly. 
As contributors, you have a chance to use our services now, in Beta, you will find perks that will give you access to the few slots
available including free migration to the new environment when it becomes
available. 
Otherwise, if you can wait, you can
directly reserve your slot on the Stage 2 environment and your contribution will help us reach that goal
sooner.
About usWe are a team of privacy advocates with
     enterprise IT services background. Moreover, we are entrepreneurs
     passionate about new technologies with the experience of running a
     business. Olivier Cochard founded OCIM in Switzerland back in 2010, after
     more than 20 years in various IT positions at Hewlett-Packard from development, services
     management and consulting, to managing worldwide IT projects and programs.

story:
After Hurricane María hit in 2017, my hometown of Puerto Rico was devastated. As you can imagine, humans were not the only ones that felt the wrath. Animal homelessness, an already huge problem, was exacerbated and magnified. Animal sanctuaries across the island lost their abilities to provide shelter and thousands were left on the street. I remember running errands one afternoon and having to swerve around three dead bodies thinking: "someone has to DO something about this", only to realize I was someone.

So in the middle of the night in complete darkness (Puerto Rico remained without power for more than a year), I lit a candle, whipped out a pen and a pad and started coming up with ideas on how to put an end to this epidemic. I landed on an app and called it Petmosphere. My main goal is and always will be to take these animals off the street and provide homes by educating the masses on how to properly care for these creatures; psychology is at the root of this problem not just here in my backyard but around the world.

I'd like to take this opportunity and let you know the idea that started it all. Let's say you're walking down the street and stumble across a cat or dog that seems friendly, doesn't have a collar and is in some sort of need. You whip out the app and snap a picture. Using the GPS on your phone, you'll upload him/her while describing them to the best of your abilities. Once you hit "post", that'll generate a notification to all the rescuers, volunteers, foster parents and shelters around an established perimeter so that they can take immediate action and assist in getting that animal out of harm's way.

Since then, my main focus has been to provide animal shelters with tools that they'll  need to operate more efficiently and effectively. We've added the Carousel, a matchmaking adoption platform that allows you to browse hundreds of potential pets looking for forever homes. We've eased the adoption process itself so that a right swipe will privately contact the shelter and initiate a possible interview and visit; sanctuaries will also be notified of all interest through an internal notification as well as be accompanied by an email.

Although doing away with animal homelessness will forever be the goal, we're now thinking bigger and aim to become your go-to app for everything pet related. We established a timeline on which to share your most creative pet pictures, the most popular of which gets rewarded at the end of every month for content creation purposes. In addition, we're constantly working behind the scenes to:

Make Petmosphere multilingual so that more and more people can use it worldwide.

Work alongside local authorities to report abuse and negligence on the spot.

Incorporate the ability to post videos for further engagement.

Establish a recurrent donation plan for shelters.

Help pet business owners operate conveniently through our app.

Set up an online store whose proceeds go to helping animal shelters thrive.

Our latest update includes some key features, an active website and the ability to download our app internationally. Check out our trailers & download the app!  We have outlined more than 25 potential releases that will make the Petmosphere truly unique but we can't do it alone. We need your help to make that happen.

Risks and challenges

We're aware we are up against major players in the industry and, although it may seem as though we're trying to reinvent the wheel in this market, we have a plan of action the likes of which nobody seems to be doing. It has been outlined and is detail oriented. Right now our main concern is the speed with which we bring Petmosphere to its maximum glory; manpower is required since we're currently two people working on the app.

story:
The Approach notebook system not only provides a flawless user experience, but also allows users to customize the products’ appearance and functionality to suit their needs.

 

 

We create tools for thinkers, who are involved in work that requires a significant amount of thinking, such as strategy consultants, artists, designers, entrepreneurs, and engineers. For them, there is no need for fancy and complicated functions or designs, nor do they need impressive theories or frameworks. They need a tool which was designed from the perspective of the user and which can support their thought process.

Despite the overflow of notebooks on the market, these professionals have always found it difficult to find a product which suits their needs. Therefore, we decided to create a product to meet those needs.Through our effort to create the most suitable product for these thinkers, we completed the “Approach Notebook System” and we are excited to finally introduce our product here on Kickstarter.

 

 

1. Lite Notebook

 The Lite Notebook was created to complement digital devices. These days, most work is done through digital devices. However, for work which requires the freedom to think visually, some still rely on notebooks. The Lite Notebook is a tool which has been optimized to enable the users to think visually.

 

 

 

 

2. Professional Notebook

 The Professional Notebook is a tool for those who predominately use notebooks as their main thinking and note-taking tools.These are users who use notebooks at all times, wherever they are. With its high level of completeness in design and durability, the Professional Notebook provides an outstanding user experience through its clean and simple page design.

 

 

 

 

3. Add-ons

 Approach offers four types of add-ons that we have designed to resolve various problem areas that users may experience when using notebooks. These add-ons have been designed to complement the Approach notebook user experience.

 

 

 

 

4. Compare Notebooks

> Click below link to see layout details

  • Lite Notebook: ruled / grid / blank
  • Professional Notebook : ruled / grid / blank / monthly planner / monthly&weekly planner

 

5. Approach Notebook FULL Kit 

  • 'Approach FULL Kit' is comprised of notebooks and add-ons in one gift box
  • 'Lite Notebook FULL Kit' consists of 3 lite notebooks and 4 add-on packs.
  • 'Professional Notebook FULL Kit' consists of 1 professional notebook and 4 add-on packs.
  • We will send survey emails to all backers, after the campaign ends, so backers can choose their notebook type and color. 
  • The add-ons will go along with your choice of notebook (color and types) automatically in the FULL kit. CLICK HERE to see what you will get.

 

6. Perk

  • We offer the Approach Notebook System at a discounted price exclusively on our Kickstarter campaign 
  • Backers can choose either 'Approach Notebook Full Kit' or the individual notebook as a perk. 
  • We will send survey e-mails to all backers after the campaign ends, by which the backers can choose notebook color and notebook type.
  • We will deliver adequate add-ons following by your notebook choice(notebook color and type) in FULL kit.

story:
UnBias AI for Decision Makers

"Quite frankly this is the best bit of communication in this area I have ever seen.
It is the perfect complement to the UnBias Fairness Toolkit. Together they can be adopted by any organisation in business, charity, education, healthcare etc etc.
Especially in the light of recent events I just wish that every member of the Government and the Civil Service had a set! 
I know how difficult it is to refine the language so that it really gets through. You have done a superb job."

Lord Clement-Jones CBE
Chair of the House of Lords Select Committee on Artificial Intelligence (2017–2018)

AI4DM is a suite of critical thinking tools enabling cross-organisational stakeholders to implement transdisciplinary ethical and governance assessments of planned or existing AI and automated decision-making systems.
It naturally fosters participation, bringing people together to map AI systems, existing and proposed, against the organisation's own mission, vision, values and ethics.
It uses a whole systems approach to analyse organisational structures and operations, illuminating to participants the breadth of issues beyond their individual responsibilities.

The tools are intuitive, practical and can be used for:

  • revealing where and how a system is either in alignment, and where it is (or could be) misaligned with the organisation's mission, vision, values and ethics;
  • enabling different stakeholders to appreciate where and how their obligations and responsibilities intersect with those of others. 
  • emphasising the collective nature of lawful and ethical responsibilities across the whole organisation
  • providing a mechanism for a deep analysis of complex challenges.

Watch our Animations on using the toolkit

 

What We Need & What You Get

Proboscis is fundraising to manufacture a print-run of at least 500 copies of the AI4DM Toolkit (card deck and handbook). This economy of scale will make the toolkit affordable for many (and much cheaper than ordering the deck only from our existing print-on-demand option). Included in the perk will be professionally printed copies of the handbook.

We are also offering the original UnBias Fairness Toolkit as a perk, including professionally printed copies of both its own Handbook and the Facilitator Booklet. This toolkit is designed to build awareness in young people and other non-experts of what algorithmic bias is and how it may be affecting them and their communities.

Furthermore, we are offering a Facilitation Training Package of one-to-one online video training sessions with Giles Lane, the creator/designer of both the UnBias Fairness and the AI4DM Toolkits. Two sessions each to plan and evaluate using the AI4DM toolkit, as well as to advise on combining it with the Fairness toolkit. A personalised "AI4DM Facilitator's Guide" will only be available to backers of this perk.


Read the AI4DM Handbook online

 

Test the Toolkit Now

The AI4DM and UnBias Fairness toolkits are already available in free DIY downloadable versions for you to print at home using standard office stationery. 

In 2018/19 over 650 manufactured sets of the Fairness toolkit were printed and distributed – these have been used extensively in education and community settings and widely praised.  By raising funds to manufacture a similar number of the AI4DM toolkit we hope to deliver a similar pragmatic and practical impact on the increasing use of AI and automated decision making systems – giving both public and private organisations an immediately useful framework.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The toolkits and additional materials (handbooks and facilitator's guides etc) are all production-ready: DIY print-at-home versions are already available for those who wish to try them out.

If we do not reach our goal, we will use the funds collected to print as many card sets as we can afford. The Handbooks will remain accessible as online and downloadable versions on bookleteer.com (Proboscis' unique self-publishing platform). Backers of the training perk will also receive their sessions.

Our key risk is not reaching our goal to achieve the economy of scale that a run of 500 will bring. Given the previous success of (and continuing demand for) the manufactured version of the UnBias Fairness Toolkit, we are confident that enough demand will emerge for the AI4DM toolkit.

Conversely, should the campaign be more successful than anticipated, we will face a challenge in delivering a larger number of perks within the timeframe (we are a very small team working from home), however we will endeavour to fulfil all perks as quickly as possible.

 

About Us

Proboscis is a non-profit, artist-led creative studio based in London, UK since 1994. We have created multiple pioneering and ground-breaking projects that fuse social and cultural issues with emerging and traditional technologies. Our collaborations with research partners span many universities in the UK and abroad, and we also work closely with grassroots communities, industry, civil society and public sector organisations.

In 2018 we launched the UnBias Fairness Toolkit to promote awareness of bias, trust and fairness in algorithmic and automated decision making systems. It was designed for non-experts (i.e. the general public) to get to grips with the nature of bias and how it may affect them. It was part of the larger UnBias research project funded by the EPSRC and led by the Horizon Institute at the University of Nottingham with the Universities of Oxford and Edinburgh and Proboscis.

In 2020 we were invited by Ansgar Koene (a Senior Research Fellow at Horizon and Global AI Ethics and Regulation Lead for EY Global Services) to develop a companion toolkit on ethics and governance for those in public and private organisations who are planning, developing, designing, deploying or evaluating Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning systems for automated decision making. AI4DM is the result.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can or feels comfortable contributing to campaigns like this. By making the free DIY versions immediately accessible we hope everyone who is interested in exploring and using it will be able to, and those who would like to have a professionally produced version will be able to support us.

  • If you like and approve of the toolkit, do please help us get the word out – either on social media or otherwise by email or word of mouth. 
  • If you prefer to make a smaller contribution we will be very grateful for any support.

story:
Why we're on Indiegogo:

Hi! I'm Robb Moore, the founder and inventor of ioSafe. We make fireproof and waterproof data storage devices - like an aircraft black box but for your vital data.

We're releasing the first disaster proof private cloud in January 2013. This product will allow anyone to create, secure, access and protect their vital data on their own private cloud. It's fireproof, waterproof and bolts to the floor. It'll store terabytes of data that you'll be able to access quickly from home but is still easily accessible when you're not. Any smartphone, tablet, PC, Mac or Linux device can access and share pictures, files, videos and music.  

If you surf around the internet, you'll see ioSafe products everywhere - both in the news and for sale. You might think we don't need Indiegogo but we do.

We've developed awesome technology that combines computers with safes. We do outrageous demos to get attention. We build hard-core storage products and protect our customers with unprecedented support.  Despite all our successes, the fact of the matter is we’re a small 20-person company up against billion-dollar competitors – we’re a modern-day “David versus Goliath.”

We've been growing quickly over the last four years which is, for the most part, fantastic. The downside is that growth can be painful if you're paying for next month's growth with sales from 4 months ago while doubling every year.

We need the help from our community to take ioSafe to the next level. We're very excited to introduce the ioSafe N2 to you - it's our greatest work to date.

The ioSafe N2 that you see in the video is a real, working prototype. We need your support to show us that you're as excited as we are about this project. It can cost hundreds of thousands of dollars to bring a product to market but we need the signal from our fans to let us know there's a real need.

<><><><><>  UPDATE 9/20  <><><><><>

Interest for this product outside of Indiegogo is growing fast. This is project is happening regardless of the amount raised. The rewards here at Indiegogo are the best deals going for all our early adopters and fans. Thank you so much.

<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>

Your contribution will help fund:

- High volume production tooling 
- Large component orders
- Emissions and testing certification

The more we raise, the more you win. Our rewards are set up so you get automatic upgrades to either storage capacity or our Data Recovery Service/Warranty the more popular the campaign becomes. Please help us spread the word on your social networks!

Thanks!

-Robb

 

ioSafe N2 : Disaster-Proof Private Cloud  - like an aircraft black box for personal or business data.

The ioSafe N2 is a fireproof and waterproof, network connected, multi-drive NAS/RAID storage device for terabytes of your precious personal or business data. 

Designed to be the center of your private cloud, the ioSafe N2 is powered by a Synology DSM motherboard and operating system. It allows for fast access on your local network and remote access from nearly any device connected to the internet - all secured and protected by you.

The ioSafe N2 is designed and assembled by ioSafe in California - a data storage company with a vision to protect the world's photos, videos and business data.

Press on the ioSafe N2:

Wired - "I'm itching to get one" 

CNET - "Best of both worlds"

AnandTech - "Exciting"

Small Business Trends - "Gives businesses control of their data"

DVICE - "Definitely worth a look"

 

It's all about you. Your data. Your stuff. All of it.

The ioSafe N2 is the first disaster-proof private cloud device of it's kind. Like an aircraft black box for your data, the N2 is designed to protect and secure terabytes of the most precious data on the planet - your data. 

The Cloud Problem: Slow, Pricy and Insecure

If you have a 20-30 GB to protect, the public cloud is an option. If you have terabytes to store, the traditional public cloud breaks down quickly.

Speed: Moving a terabyte online can take months. Three or four terabytes? Fuggedaboutit! Months to upload and months to download. It's faster to ship a hard drive across the country than to try to stream the data across the internet. The situation is only getting worse as data growth will continue to exceed bandwidth over the foreseeable future. It's the equivalent of pushing the Pacific Ocean through a garden hose.

Cost: To store a couple of terabytes on Amazon's S3 Storage over three years will cost over $8000. Granted Mozy, Carbonite or Backblaze combined with Dropbox can be a fantastic setup if (1) you don't have terabytes of data and (2) you don't have them on a NAS and (3) you don't care about disaster recovery for all your programs or OS in addition to your data.

Security: No one in the public cloud cares as much about your data as you do. Information gets hacked, deleted and compromised in the public cloud as the biggest databases represent the juiciest targets for hackers. Staying in control of how your local data is stored, accessed and managed is an excellent way to avoid risks of the public cloud.

Private Cloud: The private cloud (aka NAS with cloud-like applications: picture sharing, music streaming and file syncing) can help solve the speed and security issues associated with the public cloud. It's fast when you're local and accessible when you're remote. The security is set by you and only you: simply pull the plug out of the wall if you want to completely lock out all external access to your data. Once your data is out in the public cloud, you lose control over how or where your data is stored. It will invariably get replicated across the internet and can never be made completely secure again.

Disaster Recovery (DR) for the private cloud? Streaming your data offsite for disaster protection is slow and is fraught with unknown risks regarding your service provider's policies and employees. Trying to replicate onsite and then physically move the data offsite for DR is a daily hassle and expense. You risk losing the data through human error, an unlocked car, disgruntled employee, etc. - bad things happen. Streaming or syncing terabytes online leads straight back to the public cloud's cost and bandwidth issues.

Solution: ioSafe protects from natural disaster by wrapping its patented protection technology around vulnerable private cloud data - onsite. You get fast local access, redundant hard drives, security, nearly unlimited storage, cloud convenience, access to the data with virtually any device and onsite protection against natural disasters. It's a beautiful thing - digital Nirvana.

You can use our solution alone or in conjunction with your existing backup and DR practices if you have any already in place. Every situation is special and this technology is meant as a tool for you to use to reduce your vulnerability. There is simply no other another single solution available with all the advantages of the ioSafe N2 for speed, flexibility, cost and disaster recovery.

ioSafe Technology:

Fire Protection
Protects data from loss up to 1550°F for 1/2 hour per ASTM E119
DataCast endothermic fire insulation technology protects your data from extreme heat. The DataCast formulation forms a chemical bond with water molecules that, at temperatures above 160°F, releases water vapor to limit the internal temperature of the unit during a fire.

Water Protection

Protects data from loss up to 10ft for 72 hours.
HydroSafe water barrier technology is designed to protect data loss from fresh or salt water damage, including full immersion. While keeping your data dry, the HydroSafe technology still allows heat to dissipate during normal operation.

Active Airflow Cooling
For optimum operating temperature, FloSafe active airflow cooling technology provides cooling airflow through the enclosure and across the disk drives during normal operating conditions. If destructive heat levels are sensed, such as in a fire, the FloSafe vent is designed to limit and protect your data from the extreme heat.

Theft Protection

First - be creative. You can make this device a part of your wireless network and hide it anywhere inside your house or workplace. Hide it as you might a small safe. Additionally, a Kensington lock slot is standard. An Optional Floor Mount / Padlock Kit (shipping in January 2013) will enable the N2 to bolt down to any surface or be secured with a cable & padlock. Securing the drive also prevents the drive from moving during a disaster.

Data Recovery Service
The ultimate safety net for the ultimate NAS, the ioSafe Data Recovery Service (DRS) provides a multi-use, no questions asked data and hardware recovery service. For any loss, no matter the reason, ioSafe will ship, attempt recovery, spend up to $2500 per terabyte on forensic recovery if required and send data back on replacement product. First use of DRS has no deductible. DRS Pro is intended for our Pro-sumer and Business Users by covering the ioSafe device + the connected server or PC with limits up to $5000 per TB. See our website for terms and conditions.

 

World Class Apps!

Apps make all the difference. We teamed with Synology to bring you world class DSM apps and operating system. Apps for backup, management, multimedia, productivity and surveillance. In addition to the list below, many more features of the Synology DSM community can be found here.

  • File Station makes sharing and managing files easier and safer than ever. You can create folders, copy and delete files in between your PC and ioSafe N2; when you accidentally delete a file it can be easily restored in the recycle bin. For businesses, File Station can boost productivity with support for Google Docs, Windows ACL, speed limit for individual users, and many more.
 

  • Media Server can easily connect those devices such as TV sets and stereo systems to your home network, and stream multimedia files stored on DiskStation to the devices to enjoy music, photos, and videos.

  • Photo Station is an online photo album integrated with a blog for you to easily share photos with friends and family.

  • Cloud Station is a file sharing service that specializes in file syncing between the ioSafe N2, PCs and Macs. Works like Dropbox but with none of the monthly fees or limitations.

  • Antivirus Essential is a free application to protect your ioSafe N2 from potential virus threats.

  • Audio Station is a web-based audio application, allowing you to access the music library on your N2 either at home or remotely.
 

  • Directory Server provides LDAP service with centralized access control, authentication for our business users.

  • Download Station is a web-based download application, allowing you to post and allow co-workers to download large files from the N2. 

  • iTunes Server allows you to share the music and videos on your ioSafe N2 with iPhones, Macs, PC's, iPad or any other iTunes client.

  • Mail Station provides a webmail service for you to access emails stored on your ioSafe N2.
 

  • Surveillance Station is a web-based application that can manage IP cameras to safeguard your home or business.

  • Time Backup is an innovative backup solution that backs up ioSafe N2 data in multiple versions.

  • Video Station lets you browse and organize all video contents stored in your  ioSafe N2.

  • VPN Server turns your ioSafe N2 into a Virtual Private Network server

In addition to the list above, more applications available on the ioSafe N2 powered by Synology DSM can be found here.

How does it work?

The ioSafe N2 connects to your home or business network, preferable at the main router or switch. A network drive (or "share") can be created that allows everyone on the local area network (LAN) with proper permissions to "see" the common drive and share the data. The data can also be made available to the wide area network (WAN - aka the Internet) by allow applications and data to be "forwarded" to the NAS at your router.

If you've never setup a network, get an experienced friend or call us - we're happy to help.

Hardware

  • DUAL DRIVE RAID 1 REDUNDANCY: Drives are hot swappable and  automatically synchronize data between drives to protect against data loss due to hard drive failure.
  • FIRE: Protects against data loss in a fire, up to 1550°F for 30 minutes per ASTM E119
  • WATER: Protects against data loss from water, full immersion, 3 days, 10 feet in fresh water or salt water.
  • THEFT: Kensington® Lock Slot. Optional floor mount / padlock kit coming Q1 2013.
  • CPU Frequency : 2.0 GHz
  • Memory : DDR3 512 MB 
  • Max Internal Capacity : 8 TB (2 X 4 TB 3.5" SATA HDD) (Effective Usable Capacity of 8TB RAID 1 is 4TB)
  • External HDD Interface : USB 3.0 X 2, USB 2.0 X 1, SD Card X 1
  • Size (HxWxD) : 6" x 9" x 12"
  • Weight : 28 lbs
  • LAN : Gigabit X 1
  • Wake on LAN/WAN
  • Standard Warranty : 1 Year
  • Data Recovery Service (DRS): DRS for Diskless version is sold separately during registration standard. 1 year DRS included for all ioSafe N2 products loaded with disks from the factory.
  • DRS and Warranty upgradable to a maximum of 5 years at ioSafe.com during DRS activation.

Data Recovery Service + No-Hassle Warranty

Data Recover Service (DRS) is a bit like insurance for the one thing insurance can't get back - your data. DRS effectively spreads the high cost of forensic data recovery across tens of thousands of users in order to minimize financial impact during times of data loss emergencies. When DRS is used in conjunction with disaster proof hardware, ioSafe has been better than 99.99% successful in retaining our customers' data.

  • Data Recovery Service (DRS) - Includes international shipping, data recovery of up to $2500 per TB for forensic recovery fees for product if required and replacement product. Can be extended with Warranty for $.99 per TB per month for up to 5 years. Learn more about the DRS terms and conditions.
  • Data Recovery Service Pro (DRS Pro) - Includes international shipping, advanced replacement, data recovery of up to $5000 per TB for forensic recovery fees for product plus attached server or PC if required and replacement product. Can be extended with Warranty for $2.99 per TB per month for up to 5 years. Learn more about the DRS terms and conditions.
  • No-Hassle Warranty - Repair or replace of product if it stops working for any reason during the term of the warranty. Yes, even if you break it on purpose.
  • N2 Diskless - 1 year No-Hassle Warranty Standard. Upgradeable to 5 years of Data Recovery Service + Warranty upon DRS activation at ioSafe.com
  • N2 (loaded with drives) - 1 year DRS + 1 year No-Hassle Warranty Standard. Upgradeable to 5 years of Data Recovery Service + Warranty upon DRS activation at ioSafe.com
  • N2 Enterprise (loaded with enterprise drives) - 1 year DRS Pro + 1 year No-Hassle Warranty Standard. Upgradeable to 5 years of Data Recovery Service Pro + Warranty upon DRS activation at ioSafe.com

Applications

  • File Station
  • Virtual Drive
  • Remote Folder
  • Backup Solutions
  • Network Backup
  • Local Backup
  • Desktop Backup (Window: Synology Data Replicator 3, Mac: Apple Time Machine backup application)
  • Shared Folder Sync - Max task number : 2
  • USBCopy
  • SDCopy
  • Configuraiton Backup
  • Mail Server
  • Supported Protocols : POP3, SMTP, IMAP
  • FTP Server
  • Bandwidth Control, Custom FTP Passive Port Range, Anonymous FTP, Transfer Log
  • Web Station
  • Virtual Host (up to 30 websites)
  • PHP/MySQL
  • 3rd-Party Applications Support

Fast for home or business use.

ioSafe N2 delivers an average 108 MB/sec reading speed under RAID 1 configuration in a Windows® environment, and 65 MB/sec writing (performance can vary in different environments). ioSafe N2 offers unprecedented physical protections combined with providing a reliable solution for data sharing with an easy to use interface, and comprehensive office applications, including a complete backup solution making it an incredible value considering the importance of your data.

Available with USB 3.0 support, the ioSafe N2 can interface with today's fast USB drives for NAS backup or additional storage.

Effective Backup Solutions

ioSafe N2 offers a centralized backup target to consolidate fragmented and unstructured data across a network. PC users can back up their data to ioSafe N2 using any commercially available PC software today and Mac OS X® users enjoy native Apple® Time Machine® integration. In addition, users can back up and restore DiskStation shared folders in multiple versions using Synology Time Backup package.

You can have your own cloud by using Cloud Station to freely access and sync file across different computers. Cloud Station keep multiple versions of a document in case of accidentally delete or upon any change.

Rich Office Applications

The ioSafe N2 runs on the renowned multitasking operating system, the Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM). Offering a comprehensive list of business applications, the N2 can be customized to run multiple applications of your choice to fulfill the requirement of your business environment. The N2 replaces several pieces of traditional network hardware with rich features designed specifically for workgroups and offices such as antivirus, video surveillance, webmail, VPN, and LDAP directory services.

Applications are managed in the Package Center, an application portal that hosts applications as ready-to-use packages; to ensure high software integration as well as one-click-installation to eliminate guess work during installation. Additional approved 3rd party PHP web application such as content management, customer relationship management & e-commerce system can be hosted on N2 by using Web Station with support for PHP/MySQL® web content.

Virtualization Support and iSCSI

The ioSafe N2 powered by Synology DSM supports all major visualization solutions including VMware vSphere 5 and VAAI hardware acceleration support as well as iSCSI.

Hassle-free System Installation

Web Assistant is a web-based utility to makes every ioSafe N2 as easy to install as possible. Installation is done inside your existing web browser by setting up all vital system components in few simple steps. Combined with a quick-start widget, users can simultaneously tour the DSM operating system and set it up to use immediately.



Peace of Mind with Data Encryption

The ioSafe N2 is equipped with an encryption engine which offloads the encryption calculation task away from the main CPU, helping to improve file transfer speeds of the N2.

Data protection is an important matter for businesses of all sizes. High-end features previously available only on enterprise level hardware are now accessible via ioSafe N2 to small and medium-sized businesses. N2 provides share-level AES 256-bit encryption to aid in the prevention of unauthorized access attempts to the hard drives.

Energy Efficient with Cool and Quiet Design

ioSafe N2 is designed with energy efficiency in mind. Not only does it provide a 92x92 mm fan and the smart airflow to keep the system running cool 24/7, its noise dampening design makes it really quiet compared to PC counterparts. The support of Wake on LAN/WAN, multiple scheduled power on/off and hard drive hibernation can further reduce power consumption and operation cost.

Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Shipping anywhere in the USA is included. Add $10 for shipping to Canada.
  • $49, $99 and $249 Reward: Along with updates and a T-shirt, you'll also get a great discount on an existing ioSafe product. Thanks for helping us! Sorry – no overseas shipping. Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Free US shipping in the US (add $25 for Canada) for the Rugged Portable. Please add $25 for HI and AK ($50 for Canada) for SoloPRO shipments.
  • $499 Extreme Early Bird (limited to 100):  You get it. You understand that ioSafe represents the path to the digital promise land. We need you to help us spread the word. You are the disciples. As more people buy in, your rewards get the sweetest the fastest with free capacity upgrades for your N2 Diskless of 2TB for every $250K raised at Indiegogo up to 6TB maximum (2 X 3TB drives). That's right, if we hit $750K, you'll get a 6TB N2 for $499 but you'll need to help us spread the word. Use your network. 1 year DRS & Warranty comes standard with this reward.  DRS and Warranty are not upgraded for this reward. Sorry – no overseas shipping. Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Free US shipping except please add $25 for HI and AK.  Add $50 for shipping to Canada.(Up to $1700 Value).
  • $499 N2 Diskless Standard Reward:  With this reward, you'll receive a one N2 Diskless system. You can load it with whatever capacity drives you'd like after you receive it. For every $250K raised, you'll get 1 free year of DRS as an upgrade as more people join in. The system comes standard with 1 year Warranty only. As the DRS is upgraded, the Warranty is upgraded to match the duration (i.e. if we raise $1M dollars on Indiegogo, you'll get 4 years of DRS and 4 years of Warranty) up to 5 years of DRS maximum. The hard drives that you supply are not a part of this warranty by ioSafe. Sorry – no overseas shipping. Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Free US shipping except please add $25 for HI and AK.  Add $50 for shipping to Canada.
  • $999 (4TB) N2 Rewards: With these rewards, you'll receive a one N2 system loaded with two drives that have a total capacity of your reward (i.e. the 6TB capacity has 2X 3TB drives loaded).  For every $250K raised, you'll get 1 additional free year of DRS as an upgrade as more people join in up to a maximum of 5 years of DRS if the total raised is $1M or above. The system comes standard with 1 year DRS and 1 year Warranty. The hard drives that are included in this award are covered under the ioSafe Warranty. Sorry – no overseas shipping. Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Free US shipping except please add $25 for HI and AK.  Add $50 for shipping to Canada.
  • Platinum Sponsor: This was created for the few individuals that want the ultimate ioSafe setup, face time with the CEO, factory tour. You'll learn about the company, where we've been, where we're headed. With the added bonus of a couple days in beautiful Auburn and Lake Tahoe, California. Promising good times! If you live outside the USA, we'll pay for a portion of your flight. All USA flights (for 2 people) are included in this award. Shipping our product for you anywhere in the world is included with this reward.

FAQ

Q. How does the N2 stay cool if it's surrounded by fireproof insulation?    A. ioSafe's patented FloSafe Vent technology allows cooling airflow to pass through the enclosure during normal operation. In a fire, steam is created in the internal cavity with flows outward from all vent holes - effectively creating a positive pressure room inside the device. The action of the outward flow of water vapor prohibits the hot fire energy from invading the drives held within. 

Q. The N2 has holes. How is it waterproof?    A. While the outer enclosure has holes, the hard drives on the inside are hermetically sealed in a heat conductive yet waterproof extrusion. Also known as our HydroSafe technology, heat generated from the drives is allowed to pass through the waterproof barrier and cooled off with the airflow. In a flood, the outer casing may get wet or even destroyed but the data stays safe on the drives as they never get wet.

Q. Can the 512MB of RAM be upgraded?    A. No. The memory is not user serviceable.

Q. How fast is the N2?    A. Using RAID 1, 108MB/s Read and 65MB/s write speeds are possible on a Windows environment.  (performance can vary in different environments)

Why we're on Indiegogo:
Hi! I'm Robb Moore, the founder and inventor of ioSafe. We make fireproof and waterproof data storage devices - like an aircraft black box but for your vital data.
We're releasing the first disaster proof private cloud in January 2013. This product will allow anyone to create, secure, access and protect their vital data on their own private cloud. It's fireproof, waterproof and bolts to the floor. It'll store terabytes of data that you'll be able to access quickly from home but is still easily accessible when you're not. Any smartphone, tablet, PC, Mac or Linux device can access and share pictures, files, videos and music.  
If you surf around the internet, you'll see ioSafe products everywhere - both in the news and for sale. You might think we don't need Indiegogo but we do.
We've developed awesome technology that combines computers with safes. We do outrageous demos to get attention. We build hard-core storage products and protect our customers with unprecedented support.  Despite all our successes, the fact of the matter is we’re a small 20-person company up against billion-dollar competitors – we’re a modern-day “David versus Goliath.”
We've been growing quickly over the last four years which is, for the most part, fantastic. The downside is that growth can be painful if you're paying for next month's growth with sales from 4 months ago while doubling every year.
We need the help from our community to take ioSafe to the next level. We're very excited to introduce the ioSafe N2 to you - it's our greatest work to date.
The ioSafe N2 that you see in the video is a real, working prototype. We need your support to show us that you're as excited as we are about this project. It can cost hundreds of thousands of dollars to bring a product to market but we need the signal from our fans to let us know there's a real need.
<><><><><>  UPDATE 9/20  <><><><><>
Interest for this product outside of Indiegogo is growing fast. This is project is happening regardless of the amount raised. The rewards here at Indiegogo are the best deals going for all our early adopters and fans. Thank you so much.
<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>
Your contribution will help fund:
- High volume production tooling - Large component orders- Emissions and testing certification
The more we raise, the more you win. Our rewards are set up so you get automatic upgrades to either storage capacity or our Data Recovery Service/Warranty the more popular the campaign becomes. Please help us spread the word on your social networks!
Thanks!
-Robb

The ioSafe N2 is a fireproof and waterproof, network connected, multi-drive NAS/RAID storage device for terabytes of your precious personal or business data. 
Designed to be the center of your private cloud, the ioSafe N2 is powered by a Synology DSM motherboard and operating system. It allows for fast access on your local network and remote access from nearly any device connected to the internet - all secured and protected by you.

The ioSafe N2 is designed and assembled by ioSafe in California - a data storage company with a vision to protect the world's photos, videos and business data.

It's faster to ship a hard drive across the country than to try to stream the data across the internet. The situation is only getting worse as data growth will continue to exceed bandwidth over the foreseeable future. It's the equivalent of pushing the Pacific Ocean through a garden hose.
Cost: To store a couple of terabytes on Amazon's S3 Storage over three years will cost over $8000. Granted Mozy, Carbonite or Backblaze combined with Dropbox can be a fantastic setup if (1) you don't have terabytes of data and (2) you don't have them on a NAS and (3) you don't care about disaster recovery for all your programs or OS in addition to your data.

Data Recovery Service + No-Hassle Warranty
Data Recover Service (DRS) is a bit like insurance for the one thing insurance can't get back - your data. DRS effectively spreads the high cost of forensic data recovery across tens of thousands of users in order to minimize financial impact during times of data loss emergencies. When DRS is used in conjunction with disaster proof hardware, ioSafe has been better than 99.99% successful in retaining our customers' data.



Data Recovery Service (DRS) - Includes international shipping, data recovery of up to $2500 per TB for forensic recovery fees for product if required and replacement product. Can be extended with Warranty for $.99 per TB per month for up to 5 years. Learn more about the DRS terms and conditions.

Data Recovery Service Pro (DRS Pro) - Includes international shipping, advanced replacement, data recovery of up to $5000 per TB for forensic recovery fees for product plus attached server or PC if required and replacement product. Can be extended with Warranty for $2.99 per TB per month for up to 5 years. Learn more about the DRS terms and conditions.

No-Hassle Warranty - Repair or replace of product if it stops working for any reason during the term of the warranty. Yes, even if you break it on purpose.

N2 Diskless - 1 year No-Hassle Warranty Standard. Upgradeable to 5 years of Data Recovery Service + Warranty upon DRS activation at ioSafe.com

N2 (loaded with drives) - 1 year DRS + 1 year No-Hassle Warranty Standard. Upgradeable to 5 years of Data Recovery Service + Warranty upon DRS activation at ioSafe.com

N2 Enterprise (loaded with enterprise drives) - 1 year DRS Pro + 1 year No-Hassle Warranty Standard. Upgradeable to 5 years of Data Recovery Service Pro + Warranty upon DRS activation at ioSafe.com


Applications


File Station
Virtual Drive
Remote Folder
Backup Solutions
Network Backup
Local Backup
Desktop Backup (Window: Synology Data Replicator 3, Mac: Apple Time Machine backup application)
Shared Folder Sync - Max task number : 2
USBCopy
SDCopy
Configuraiton Backup
Mail Server
Supported Protocols : POP3, SMTP, IMAP
FTP Server
Bandwidth Control, Custom FTP Passive Port Range, Anonymous FTP, Transfer Log
Web Station
Virtual Host (up to 30 websites)
PHP/MySQL
3rd-Party Applications Support



Fast for home or business use.
ioSafe N2 delivers an average 108 MB/sec reading speed under RAID 1 configuration in a Windows® environment, and 65 MB/sec writing (performance can vary in different environments). ioSafe N2 offers unprecedented physical protections combined with providing a reliable solution for data sharing with an easy to use interface, and comprehensive office applications, including a complete backup solution making it an incredible value considering the importance of your data.
Available with USB 3.0 support, the ioSafe N2 can interface with today's fast USB drives for NAS backup or additional storage.
Effective Backup Solutions
ioSafe N2 offers a centralized backup target to consolidate fragmented and unstructured data across a network. PC users can back up their data to ioSafe N2 using any commercially available PC software today and Mac OS X® users enjoy native Apple® Time Machine® integration. In addition, users can back up and restore DiskStation shared folders in multiple versions using Synology Time Backup package.
You can have your own cloud by using Cloud Station to freely access and sync file across different computers. Cloud Station keep multiple versions of a document in case of accidentally delete or upon any change.
Rich Office Applications
The ioSafe N2 runs on the renowned multitasking operating system, the Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM). Offering a comprehensive list of business applications, the N2 can be customized to run multiple applications of your choice to fulfill the requirement of your business environment. The N2 replaces several pieces of traditional network hardware with rich features designed specifically for workgroups and offices such as antivirus, video surveillance, webmail, VPN, and LDAP directory services.
Applications are managed in the Package Center, an application portal that hosts applications as ready-to-use packages; to ensure high software integration as well as one-click-installation to eliminate guess work during installation. Additional approved 3rd party PHP web application such as content management, customer relationship management & e-commerce system can be hosted on N2 by using Web Station with support for PHP/MySQL® web content.
Virtualization Support and iSCSI
The ioSafe N2 powered by Synology DSM supports all major visualization solutions including VMware vSphere 5 and VAAI hardware acceleration support as well as iSCSI.

Hassle-free System Installation

Web Assistant is a web-based utility to makes every ioSafe N2 as easy to install as possible. Installation is done inside your existing web browser by setting up all vital system components in few simple steps. Combined with a quick-start widget, users can simultaneously tour the DSM operating system and set it up to use immediately.
Peace of Mind with Data Encryption
The ioSafe N2 is equipped with an encryption engine which offloads the encryption calculation task away from the main CPU, helping to improve file transfer speeds of the N2.
Data protection is an important matter for businesses of all sizes. High-end features previously available only on enterprise level hardware are now accessible via ioSafe N2 to small and medium-sized businesses. N2 provides share-level AES 256-bit encryption to aid in the prevention of unauthorized access attempts to the hard drives.
Energy Efficient with Cool and Quiet Design
ioSafe N2 is designed with energy efficiency in mind. Not only does it provide a 92x92 mm fan and the smart airflow to keep the system running cool 24/7, its noise dampening design makes it really quiet compared to PC counterparts. The support of Wake on LAN/WAN, multiple scheduled power on/off and hard drive hibernation can further reduce power consumption and operation cost.
REWARD DETAILS (Terms & Conditions)

The rewards are generally setup so that as more people contibute, the rewards get better. By sharing, liking and linking your friends to us - everyone wins. Please help spread the word.


$1 Reward: You'll be updated as we make progress and given the first chance to purchase just before we officially launch to the public.

$25 Reward: Along with updates, you're going to get a really cool ioSafe T-shirt based on the results of our T-shirt Contest. Taking votes between “Does my NAS look big in these jeans?” or “The public cloud can kiss my NAS” or suggest something. Sorry – no overseas shipping. Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Shipping anywhere in the USA is included. Add $10 for shipping to Canada.

$49, $99 and $249 Reward: Along with updates and a T-shirt, you'll also get a great discount on an existing ioSafe product. Thanks for helping us! Sorry – no overseas shipping. Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Free US shipping in the US (add $25 for Canada) for the Rugged Portable. Please add $25 for HI and AK ($50 for Canada) for SoloPRO shipments.

$499 Extreme Early Bird (limited to 100):  You get it. You understand that ioSafe represents the path to the digital promise land. We need you to help us spread the word. You are the disciples. As more people buy in, your rewards get the sweetest the fastest with free capacity upgrades for your N2 Diskless of 2TB for every $250K raised at Indiegogo up to 6TB maximum (2 X 3TB drives). That's right, if we hit $750K, you'll get a 6TB N2 for $499 but you'll need to help us spread the word. Use your network. 1 year DRS & Warranty comes standard with this reward.  DRS and Warranty are not upgraded for this reward. Sorry – no overseas shipping. Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Free US shipping except please add $25 for HI and AK.  Add $50 for shipping to Canada.(Up to $1700 Value).

$499 N2 Diskless Standard Reward:  With this reward, you'll receive a one N2 Diskless system. You can load it with whatever capacity drives you'd like after you receive it. For every $250K raised, you'll get 1 free year of DRS as an upgrade as more people join in. The system comes standard with 1 year Warranty only. As the DRS is upgraded, the Warranty is upgraded to match the duration (i.e. if we raise $1M dollars on Indiegogo, you'll get 4 years of DRS and 4 years of Warranty) up to 5 years of DRS maximum. The hard drives that you supply are not a part of this warranty by ioSafe. Sorry – no overseas shipping. Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Free US shipping except please add $25 for HI and AK.  Add $50 for shipping to Canada.

$999 (4TB) N2 Rewards: With these rewards, you'll receive a one N2 system loaded with two drives that have a total capacity of your reward (i.e. the 6TB capacity has 2X 3TB drives loaded).  For every $250K raised, you'll get 1 additional free year of DRS as an upgrade as more people join in up to a maximum of 5 years of DRS if the total raised is $1M or above. The system comes standard with 1 year DRS and 1 year Warranty. As the DRS is upgraded, the Warranty is upgraded to match the duration (i.e. if we raise $1M dollars on Indiegogo, you'll get 4 years of DRS and 4 years of Warranty) up to 5 years of DRS maximum. The hard drives that are included in this award are covered under the ioSafe Warranty. Sorry – no overseas shipping. Ship it to a friend and have them forward it. Free US shipping except please add $25 for HI and AK.  Add $50 for shipping to Canada.

Platinum Sponsor: This was created for the few individuals that want the ultimate ioSafe setup, face time with the CEO, factory tour. You'll learn about the company, where we've been, where we're headed. With the added bonus of a couple days in beautiful Auburn and Lake Tahoe, California. Promising good times! If you live outside the USA, we'll pay for a portion of your flight. All USA flights (for 2 people) are included in this award. Shipping our product for you anywhere in the world is included with this reward.

FAQ
Q. How does the N2 stay cool if it's surrounded by fireproof insulation?    A. ioSafe's patented FloSafe Vent technology allows cooling airflow to pass through the enclosure during normal operation. In a fire, steam is created in the internal cavity with flows outward from all vent holes - effectively creating a positive pressure room inside the device. The action of the outward flow of water vapor prohibits the hot fire energy from invading the drives held within. 
Q. The N2 has holes. How is it waterproof?    A. While the outer enclosure has holes, the hard drives on the inside are hermetically sealed in a heat conductive yet waterproof extrusion. Also known as our HydroSafe technology, heat generated from the drives is allowed to pass through the waterproof barrier and cooled off with the airflow. In a flood, the outer casing may get wet or even destroyed but the data stays safe on the drives as they never get wet.
Q. Can the 512MB of RAM be upgraded?    A. No. The memory is not user serviceable.
Q. How fast is the N2?    A. Using RAID 1, 108MB/s Read and 65MB/s write speeds are possible on a Windows environment.  (performance can vary in different environments)
Images of the Prototype N2:

N2 Fire Water
 
 

N2 Proto Front

N2 Proto Disks
 
 

N2 SD Memory Card Slot
 
 
 
 

N2 Ethernet Port

N2 Proto, Front Door Off, Waterproof Door On

story:
YOUR CHANCE TO REGAIN CONTROL OF YOUR DIGITAL IDENTITY

WHAT ABOUT MY IDENTITY?

Imagine you want to store your personal data in a cloud. By doing so, you could face several issues

  • storage space is limited, you need to use more than one provider and lose track of all your accounts
  • lack of transparency what actually happens to your data
  • you don't want anyone to get access to your data, it should always be private

 

THIS IS WHERE SENGI COMES INTO PLAY

How would you like

  • to combine all your available clouds in one simple interface and add up all the storage space?
  • to make your data inaccessible for truly anyone but you and the people you send them to, by splitting your files into fragments and distributing them among all your clouds?

 

COMMUNICATION IS MORE THAN SAFE STORAGE

We are convinced that communication has to be free, secure and anonymous. We couldn’t find a solution delivering all those requirements. This is why we created SENGI. 

A combination of the best features from messaging apps and cloud storage. Sharing, messaging and backing up your data is now simpler than ever before. Focused on an easy, yet exciting user experience SENGI is here to impress you!

We created a foundation for a new Standard of security, transparency and usability and combined it into an all-in-one solution with no compromises. 

 

THE MAIN BENEFITS

 

 SECURITY - NEXT LEVEL DISTRIBUTION

SENGI is the place to link all your existing cloud services. After your data is encrypted with AES256, it is split into tiny chunks and distributed to all cloud services you use. So for the cloud provider and anyone else your data is just a random collection of unreadable data chunks.

 TRANSPARENCY - ZERO-KNOWLEDGE-PRIVACY

Thanks to our strict data policy not even we know what you store where. Only you have the key. However, we play with an open hand with our open source code. We will release the code on GitHub for your inspection and participation.

 USABILITY - EVEN FOR YOUR GRANDMOTHER

SENGI’s easy-to-use-interface and the connection between cloud services and messaging apps puts supreme usability in your hands. You can share all files in your cloud without stressing your data plan. Even your grandmother will find SENGI easy as pie.

 

COMMUNITY - THE GREATEST FEATURE

We encourage you and everyone else to work with us on our source code or other parts of the project, because together we can achieve more. Help us to improve SENGI. Help us making the world a better place. Help us making the internet great again. For you, your friends and everyone else! Possible community projects can be:

·       Translation of the software into different languages

·       Feedback for new features

·       Inspecting the source code on GitHub and giving suggestions

Be safe everywhere you go and download the FREE SENGI app soon

         

 

WHAT CAN WE DO FOR EACH OTHER?

If we reach the funding goal, we will add a developer to the SENGI family. As a result, we will be able to release the open beta this year and implement new features.

 

WHERE THE FUNDS GO

 

BUT WE CAN DO EVEN MORE, IT IS ALL UP TO YOU

with $70.000 we can add

  • Development for Linux - now, every platform is protected
  • Chatbots - making your digital life even easier
  • Research and development of peer-to-peer video & audio communication – best possible quality without the use of any servers. So you can be sure, only you and the people you are talking to are in the conversation.

 

THE CLOUD IS THE LIMIT?

Nope, you should never feel limited using the cloud!
With $100.000 we can add another developer and 

  • Research and development of decentralized storage of your chat history – you have your own server at your home or wherever you want – you get your own unique identification hashtag and can invite your friends to your server.
  • Research and development of the possibilities within an onion network – for more anonymity you can send your messages and files through the onion layers – in a very easy-to-use and not security-contradicting way

 

​NEXT TO ETERNAL GRATITUDE WE CAN OFFER

 

FEATURES FOR YOU IN OUR PREMIUM VERSION

For just $5,99 or 4,99€ per month you will receive

  • Versioning of your cloud data
  • No size-limit for sending data directly
  • Unlimited group size
  • Access protection for individual chats
  • Choice of the redundancy factor (0,1,2) for storing your data
  • Manual control of data synchronization
  • Personalization of your profile
  • Creation of your own stickers: easy as pie, with our sticker-generator
  • Future upgrade: use a decentralized chat server

 

THINGS WORTH MORE THAN MONEY

You don’t necessarily need to open your wallet to support us. Tell your friends about SENGI and spread the word on your social networks. SENGI will be happy and you will help us a great deal.

 

click me

 

PARTNERS


FAQ

Can I use my existing cloud-accounts with SENGI?

Absolutely. You can link all your existing accounts or simply add new ones. However, the data on your existing accounts must be re-uploaded to guarantee full security.

What happens if a cloud provider goes offline, will my data be lost?

No. Thanks to redundant data storage and depending on the number of connected clouds SENGI can compensate the outage of at least one provider.  

How much do I have to pay for SENGI?

SENGI is free. Every user can create a free account and use SENGI as long as he or she wants. There will be premium features but the security on your communication will never be limited.

Is SENGI not just another cloud provider?

Nope. SENGI merely uses the cloud structure for creating a secure communication and data storage eco-system.

Isn't open-source a danger to my data?

You probably know exactly how the six sides of a dice look and how rolling it works. However, you will not be able to say for sure what will be rolled next. You can imagine open-source encryption as a billion-sided dice - super secure.

If I lose my laptop, can I recover my data with SENGI?

Yes. If you have your password in mind and you saved your key-file somewhere you can login from any other device. If you already installed SENGI on multiple devices, your data is automatically synchronized.

When will you release?

There will be a closed beta for our backers this year. We expect the open beta to be released in the beginning of next year.

When will the perks be shipped?

Everything we ship is freshly made for you, so we need a little time. However, your perks should be ready until December and shipped before Christmas, ready to be put under the tree.  

What platforms are supported?

Windows, Windows Phone, OSX/MacOS, iOS, Android and soon Linux.

Why all the fuzz about backdoors?

To lock your door is pointless if another key exists, that can open all doors. That key could get into the wrong hands and make your home as secure as without having a lock at all. We agree with Tim Cook saying: "The only way to get information [...] would be to write a piece of software that we view as sort of the equivalent of cancer."

What is a Sengi?

A Sengi is a tiny mammal, living in the rainforests of Africa. It distributes its food in a vast network of trails and stashes. Because only Sengi knows its network very well, it is protected from predators and food thieves, much like you are protected from data thieves with SENGI.

Despite its looks, it is more related to an elephant than to mice or rats.

 

DON'T PANIC AND SUPPORT US!

story:
It's an app for iOS & Android that allows you to be in many places at the same time. Or at least to make everyone believe that

SelfieApp replaces the background of your selfie automatically with almost human accuracy, doesn't require special skills or backcloth, and uses built-in data to make a flawless Fake Selfie. 

So you can show up at the world’s most beautiful showplaces without leaving home.

Select a popular showplace as a background, take a selfie - hocus pocus - you get a mind-blowing plausible fake and spoof your buddies.

All in 3 clicks!

Why not to watch a short video explaining how SelfieApp works?


Sorry to disappoint, but SelfieApp IS NOT just a concept! It's really real! We've already created a working prototype, that has been tested by a few lucky guys during the public events we attended recently. Here are some pics from there.

SelfieApp aims to make the World perkier. Help us out with bringing it to life and get our gratitude in addition to awesome perks in reward.



PERKS with physical rewards already contain shipment cost included into the price!

SelfieApp is based on our brand new automated face tracking & cutting-out algorithm. This invention is called Binding of the dynamic reconfigurable circuit – tough as hell to pronounce, but no sweat to use. Basically, SelfieApp's Binding is a program that looks like a very intelligent frame.

The operating principle of our algorithm may remind you of the Green Screen - a technology movie makers use to add VFX. Except for one thing - SelfieApp doesn't require you to stand in front of a green rag or a special background of any kind! Indeed, you simply enjoy taking selfies, and Binding does all the dirty work for you!

Whatever is behind you - for instance, a mess in your room - our app will replace it with one of the fancy pics from our collection.

SelfieApp is packed with hundreds of amazing backgrounds, and more are on the way. It’s a collection of hundreds of licensed high-quality smooth photos of the world’s most beautiful showplaces to be set as backgrounds. 

They also make your Fake Selfies plausible.

SelfieApp has everything to make impeccable fake selfies. Still, we give you everything to fulfill your constitutional right of turning Fake Selfies into pure perfection.

Filters, effects, tools, custom backgrounds – there will be so many ways to enhance your shots with SelfieApp!

Let us know what would you like to see in SelfieApp and we’ll discuss the possibility of adding it. 

We believe nothing should stop people from traveling to beautiful places. We think that you are the main attraction on a selfie – and it’s wrong when your photo is ignored online because of a boring background. We are also pretty sure that this world needs more fun. (BTW, you can't spell 'Crowdfunding' without 'fun'!)

With your support we’ll make SelfieApp a reality. That’s what fascinates us in crowdfunding - like-minded people can do something great together and have a lot of fun.


Usually projects have a timeline, which they are regulary failing. We stick to the plan, that’s why we use a timestick. Second reason - it’s hard to take selfies with a line.


Just imagine what you're getting! SelfieApp turns your smartphone into some kind of teleporter! Still to be sure you really need this app, we suggest taking our special SelfieApp Compatibility Test



Before this project we were working in mobile games & software development, video games development and even on TV.

A year ago we teamed up to start a revolution in selfies. With your help we will make this world a bit more funny!

We believe nothing should stop people from traveling to beautiful places. We think that you are the main attraction on a selfie – and it’s wrong when your photo is ignored online because of a boring background. We are also pretty sure that this world needs more fun. (BTW, you can't spell 'Crowdfunding' without 'fun'!)


With your support we’ll make SelfieApp a reality. That’s what fascinates us in crowdfunding - like-minded people can do something great together and have a lot of fun.



Usually projects have a timeline, which they are regulary failing. We stick to the plan, that’s why we use a timestick. Second reason - it’s hard to take selfies with a line.









Just imagine what you're getting! SelfieApp turns your smartphone into some kind of teleporter! Still to be sure you really need this app, we suggest taking our special SelfieApp Compatibility Test








Before this
project we were working in mobile games & software development, video games
development and even on TV.
A year ago we teamed up to start a revolution in selfies. With your help we will make this world a bit more funny!

story:
The fundamental principle underlying our business is access. Those desiring investment opportunities, privacy protection, and financial independence may use Bitcoin as an alternative to the banking industry, but they need access first. Our ATMs not only provide the one-stop instant access, but they educate the public about the benefits of Bitcoin.

Learn more about us and Bitcoin at our website! www.quickbitatm.com 

We're a small group, and our current startup goal is $10,000. If we can reach this, we can bring our first machine to Philadelphia! 

Even if you can't help out, spread the word about our company "QuickBit," and how we're trying to create access to this new technology. 

Check us out on social media! 

https://www.facebook.com/QuickBit-Your-trusted-...

https://twitter.com/QuickBitATM
