story:
Update: 4 Years Later!

Wow, time flies. The Indiegogo campaign ended more than 4 years ago and I never took the time to update its page -- better late than never I guess. The campaign was a great success and without it MailMate wouldn't exist today. The campaign raised enough money to guarantee 9.5 months of development on MailMate. Obviously, it stretched much longer than that and MailMate is still under active development. If you are interested in an overview of the results of the campaign then check out the blog post I wrote back then.

Version numbers have increased very slowly. At the end of the campaign, MailMate was at version 1.7.2 and it's now at version 1.11. But version numbers do not tell the full story. You can see how long it'll take you to read through the release notes of the numerous public releases. You might find it easier to look through the published blog posts which are all available here. In addition, there have been hundreds of minor intermediate updates for MailMate users that like to keep up with cutting edge changes.

Since MailMate is not at version 2.0 then all license keys are still valid and most of them are also going to be valid if I bump the version number to 2.0. You might wonder how I can make a living on MailMate if I don't make money on upgrade fees and that's a very good question. Currently, the development of MailMate relies on new license buyers and the wonderful individuals supporting MailMate as patrons. This is currently “good enough” for me to continue development, but it's also pretty far from the $5000 per month I stated as my stretch goal when I did this Indiegogo campaign.

Once more, thanks to everyone supporting the crowd funding campaign 4 years ago. Without it MailMate would not exist today. I hope many of you are still happy MailMate users. For those who aren't, rest assured that I'm still very grateful for your support 4 years ago.

Update 2: Final Day

At the time of writing there remains 19 hours of this crowd funding campaign. Since the primary goal was reached (see below), almost $15,000 have been contributed ensuring another 3 months of development. Extraordinary!

Only one question remains: Can $40,000 be reached before the deadline?

Update 3: Within a few hours the answer was yes, but don't let that stop you. $42K would be a nice number.

Update: Stretch Goals

On November 16th the primary goal of this campaign was fulfilled. This means that I am guaranteed to be working on MailMate until July 1st 2014. It might be longer if daily sales improve compared to 2013.

The stretch goals of this campaign are simple. For every $5000 funded I am guaranteed to be working on MailMate for at least an additional month. You can also inquire about funding the development of specific features or bundles.

A practical note: Since the goal has been reached, it does not matter if you support through the crowd funding site or the regular store.

The Goal

Hi, my name is Benny Kjær Nielsen. I'm a PhD in computer science and for some years I have been working full time on an IMAP email client for Mac OS X. Version 1.0 was released early 2011 and it has been under active development since then. It is now at version 1.7.1 and you can download it right now if you like.

I want you to help me continue the development of MailMate. In particular, I want you to help me complete and release version 2.0 of MailMate. Email clients are notoriously hard to sell and the current sales of MailMate is not enough to fund future development. At the very least, I need funding for the first 6 months of 2014 which is the primary goal of this campaign. The secondary goal is to fund as many months as possible beyond those 6 months. Don't worry, I have plenty of ideas for MailMate to be working on it for many years and I would love to do so.

Update: If you want to know more about the existing version of MailMate then I recommend the recent post by Macdrifter. Also see what has been written about this campaign at MacStories and AppStorm.

A Personal Project

Creating an email client is a huge project with 40 years of email standards legacy to deal with. It has been done many times before and it might be hard to understand why anyone would want to do it again. Nevertheless, here I am and that might require an explanation.

I'm an academic by heart and to me MailMate is a never ending research project filled with challenging problems. To you I hope MailMate is one hell of a powerful email client — an email client worth paying for. I don't ever expect MailMate to become a golden egg, but I have reached a point where MailMate has to put food on the table.

MailMate is a one-man business. I take care of development, support, homepage, marketing, sales, and now, crowd funding. It's as personal a business as it can be. Supporting MailMate is to support me and my family. If you want to then you can read a bit more about me and the background for this crowd funding campaign.

The Perks

Note that this is a fixed funding campaign. If the goal is not reached then you are not going to pay anything, but to show my appreciation for your attempt to contribute then you'll still receive a (single) license key for version 1.x of MailMate for free.

Most of the perks are personal or site license keys for MailMate 2 (and 1.x) matching the regular price with two exceptions:

  1. The $25 perk is a license key which is only valid for version 1.x and you'll be required to upgrade to version 2.0 for another $25 when it is released.
  2. The $5000 perk includes me working for you for 20 hours on a specialized bundle of commands just for you or your company (more about bundles further below).

MailMate 1.7.1

You can read about the existing version 1.7.1 of MailMate on the homepage which also includes a series of screenshots. Here is the current short description from the homepage:

MailMate is an IMAP email client featuring extensive keyboard control, Markdown supported email composition, advanced search conditions and drill-down search links, equally advanced smart mailboxes, automatic signature handling, cryptographic encryption/signing (OpenPGP and S/MIME), tagging, multiple notification methods, alternative message viewer layouts including a widescreen layout, and much more.

The “much more” is not an exaggeration. Read the manual for more details, for example, read about sending messages later, muting mailing list threads, or custom key bindings.

It's only fair if I also tell you what MailMate cannot do: 1. MailMate does not support POP3 or locally archived messages (essentially the same thing). 2. MailMate does not support rich text editing (HTML) without the use of the plain text Markdown markup language.

MailMate 2.0

Naturally, the features of MailMate 2.0 depend on the time available for its development. The release notes is a good reference for what is possible within a time frame of 6 months or more and in that context it might be better to think of 2.0 as 1.9 (it's just numbers). In other words, don't think of it as a complete rewrite of MailMate.

That said, some 2.0 features are guaranteed since they are already partly implemented as experimental features. You can enable them *right now* in the General preferences of the current version of MailMate. These features include rules and bundles. You probably already know what rules (filters) are, but bundles in MailMate is a new concept which I'll try to describe in more detail.

A bundle can be a set of commands, smart mailboxes, various settings, and anything else which forms a natural group of functionality, for example, anything related to a particular type of emails, a particular application, or some company/organization.

Example 1: Bundles for two applications, OmniFocus and Reminders, are currently included with MailMate. If you hit ⌃⇧A then you'll see the following displayed:

Select your desired action and the corresponding command creates a note based on the currently selected email. Alternatively, you can create a rule which creates an OmniFocus note automatically when a certain type of email arrives.

Example 2: MailMate also includes a very simple command for Lighthouse tickets (a third party support ticket system). When an email notification from Lighthouse is displayed then you can hit ⌃O to open its related web page in your preferred browser. The broader idea is that the same shortcut can be used to do the same for other types of emails (when bundles which recognize the messages have been created for them). This bundle could be extended to provide commands to quickly change the state of a support ticket.

Example 3: The last example is a proof-of-concept bundle (created for a user) to show that it is possible to make MailMate handle the administration of a *small* list of email subscribers. It includes three commands, “Add”, “Remove”, and “Distribute”. The first two commands can be used manually or with rules to handle incoming subscribe and unsubscribe emails. The “Distribute” command can be used to generate emails to everyone on the list based on a draft created in MailMate. (This bundle is not included with the current release of MailMate.)

These are just simple examples. The underlying system is extremely flexible and makes it easy for power users to add functionality to MailMate — functionality which can then easily be shared with other MailMate users.

Q and A

What happens after the funded period if the goal is reached?

Ideally, the regular daily sales of version 2.0 are enough to continue full time development. If not then I might create a new crowd funding campaign.

What happens if the goal is not reached?

This also depends on the daily regular sales. I'll continue to support existing users, but my primary occupation has to be something else than MailMate.

Spread the Word

You don't need to make a contribution to support the development of MailMate. There are other ways to help. Spread the word whenever you can and/or follow me on Twitter or on the blog.

story:
The Revolution

Innovative products from the East African innovation value chain!

 

Hi, my name is Ruth Sebagereka.

 

Do you have Tangles? Breaking Hair? Dry Hair?

 

They're a thing of the past.  I bring to you- The Truthcomb.


The Truthcomb, brings to the grooming system,- A NEW DIMENSION!

There's nothing like it out there.

 

It's the only comb, IN THE WORLD, that grooms the hair by working in successive layers on the cuticles of the hair.

 

Why is this important?

 

Each individual hair has cuticles on it- like the tiles on the roof of a house.

 

These cuticles need to be kept closed and smooth- to allow for more moisture retention- otherwise the moisture in the hair escapes through raised cuticles.

The Truthcomb helps to raise moisture content levels of the hair.  

 

Smooth cuticles mean soft hair.

 

So, Truthcomb means soft, moisturised, healthy, shiny hair.

 

 

Your kids will ACTUALLY comb their hair (a miracle?)

 

A Different Kind of Miracle.

 

The Truthcomb is a product of the system put in place by Dr. Kamau Gachigi and Dr. Isaac Rutenberg- to fasttrack innovative products from East Africa to the market.

 


Marking 50 years since independence,  the University of Nairobi Fablab-and the Centre for Intellectual Property and Information Technology (Strathmore University Law School) reclaim the ethos of Pliny the Elder;

 

"There is always something new out of Africa".(Pliny the Elder 23 AD-79 AD)

 

 

 

It fills me with gratitude to be a part of this process.


And I hope you will be too.

 

 

The First Product!

Truthcomb Lel (Model 001).(3D print prototype in picture)

 

Truthcomb Lel  (Model 001) is designed for very short hair.

 

It combs the hair- through a gentle process of smoothing the cuticles of the hair. 

It is for women, men and children who wear their hair short.

 

It also works for beards!

 

Where did the idea come from?!?

 

The Truthcomb finds it's nascent embodiment in....the comb found on the leg of a bee!

A bee collecting pollen- to make that golden nectar-honey,-  combs the pollen out of it's hair!

It is this comb that serves as the model for the TRUTHCOMB!

 

And as indigenous African hair grows PARALLEL to the scalp - for which this comb,  stacked in parallel layers was originally designed-  THERE REALLY CAN BE no other way of combing it.

 

Yes-but how did you make the connection?

 

P.R.O.V.I.D.E.N.C.E.

 

 

Material the comb will be made out of.

Truthcomb Lel (model 001)  will be made from PA 6.6(anti-static).  This is a very strong plastic.

The bristle size is in some parts 0.7mm.  So we need a strong plastic to offer you a good product that will maintain it's shape.

Furthermore, the anti-static properties of the comb will contribute to further promote the health of the hair.

 

 

Product Use.

(a.) Hold the comb, such that the bristles lie parallel to the scalp.

 

(b.) The comb goes through the hair horizontally.  The smalll gap between the layers allow for compression of the hair between the layers of the comb.

 

(c.) Horizontal passage of the comb, along with the compression of the hair means that the cuticles along individual hair shafts are smoothed down!

 

You will notice- with continued use of the truthcomb- that your hair likes to take on cork screw curls that correspond to the curl on the lash of your eyes!.

 

(Development work has already begun on the next model-Truthcomb Model 002!)

 

The Process (in the Lab)

(Pictures courtesy of the Fablab-University of Nairobi).

The "Shopbot".  An amazing tool that cuts very precise shapes from Computer Aided Drawing.

Next generation minds. The Students have new ways of doing things all the time.

Student presentation at 3D 4D challenge- looking at 3D for development.


The whole point of the Lab is to encourage ideas from the sphere of the mind-to the global sphere. 

 

From the concept to commercialization- can take a very short time with institutions, minds, and movers (such as yourselves), working in concert.

fablab.uonbi.or.ke

 

My Innovation Cycle with Fablab and C.I.P.I.T

Conceptualization.
 
Clay models,
 
Product development (at the University of Nairobi Fablab).  sketching further ideas, materials identification.
 
Prototype development.(for market testing)
 
Idea protection through legal advice (in this case Centre for Intellectual Property and Information Technology- C.I.P.I.T (Strathmore Law School))
 
3D prints.(through Shapeways in the Netherlands)
 
Further development of Intellectual Property Protection. (C.I.P.I.T)

A word on Intellectual Property Management

Intellectual Property management can consist of non-disclosure agreements, patent protection, design protection, licensing, trademark protection- and other things.  It's a highly technical field.  C.I.P.I.T exists to help individuals in East Africa with intellectual property management.  It's a good idea to access their services.

www.cipit.org

 

Funding

(business partner wants to improve the aesthetics).

 

I have a  business partner in Turkey who has improved the aesthetics as above.  His product designer has worked with Porsche- and it shows!

I need $40,000 to begin production with him, on a cost share basis.


The money will go towards

  • 2 injection moulds- one for the head of the product and, one for the handle.  This will allow for detachability of the handle to make the product pocket friendly
  • Production of the combs.
  • Packaging and distribution costs.
  • Travel to Istanbul to kick off production.
 The factory is TUV certified- which to my knowledge, is one of the highest manufacturing certification levels.
 
From the end of the 35 day campaign- we will need 3 months to make the moulds, do production and then get the product out to you from Istanbul.
 
If I don't reach my campaign goal-the money will go towards making the basic model (with no detachable handle).  The colour will be determined through the course of this campaign.
 

 Paying it Forward

It's time to change the narrative in Africa.

With African economies still based on commodities, (coffee, cotton, cashew nut e.t.c), we need to turn on it's head the role of the African intellect in the global economy.

The team at Fablab University of Nairobi, and C.I.P.I.T are doing a great job!

I'm a guinea pig as it were- or a case study.

 

It's a unique product, INCOMPARABLE.

But the process established is made for REPLICATION.


When I succeed- we can go into;

  • Rural and Urban school presentations on innovation, intellectual property management, commercialization.
  • Outreach program- continent wide- 25 innovation units throughout Africa.  spreading out of U.O.N/Strathmore system with aim to replication around the continent for other inventors.
  • International and Africa specific innovation chain news articles (Daily Nation, Standard, the New Vision, Monitor, the  East African, BBC, AFP, New York times, Christian Science Monitor, New African,  e.t.c.)<&

The Process (in the Lab)

(Pictures courtesy of the Fablab-University of Nairobi).

The "Shopbot".  An amazing tool that cuts very precise shapes from Computer Aided Drawing.

Next generation minds. The Students have new ways of doing things all the time.

Student presentation at 3D 4D challenge- looking at 3D for development.
The whole point of the Lab is to encourage ideas from the sphere of the mind-to the global sphere. 
 
From the concept to commercialization- can take a very short time with institutions, minds, and movers (such as yourselves), working in concert.
fablab.uonbi.or.ke
 
My Innovation Cycle with Fablab and C.I.P.I.T
Conceptualization.
 
Clay models,
 
Product development (at the University of Nairobi Fablab).  sketching further ideas, materials identification.
 
Prototype development.(for market testing)
 
Idea protection through legal advice (in this case Centre for Intellectual Property and Information Technology- C.I.P.I.T (Strathmore Law School))
 
3D prints.(through Shapeways in the Netherlands)
 
Further development of Intellectual Property Protection. (C.I.P.I.T)A word on Intellectual Property Management
Intellectual Property management can consist of non-disclosure agreements, patent protection, design protection, licensing, trademark protection- and other things.  It's a highly technical field.  C.I.P.I.T exists to help individuals in East Africa with intellectual property management.  It's a good idea to access their services.
www.cipit.org
 
Funding
(business partner wants to improve the aesthetics).



 
I have a  business partner in Turkey who has improved the aesthetics as above.  His product designer has worked with Porsche- and it shows!

I need $40,000 to begin production with him, on a cost share basis.
The money will go towards

2 injection moulds- one for the head of the product and, one for the handle.  This will allow for detachability of the handle to make the product pocket friendly
Production of the combs.
Packaging and distribution costs.
Travel to Istanbul to kick off production.


 The factory is TUV certified- which to my knowledge, is one of the highest manufacturing certification levels.
 
From the end of the 35 day campaign- we will need 3 months to make the moulds, do production and then get the product out to you from Istanbul.
 
If I don't reach my campaign goal-the money will go towards making the basic model (with no detachable handle).  The colour will be determined through the course of this campaign.
 
 Paying it Forward
It's time to change the narrative in Africa.
With African economies still based on commodities, (coffee, cotton, cashew nut e.t.c), we need to turn on it's head the role of the African intellect in the global economy.
The team at Fablab University of Nairobi, and C.I.P.I.T are doing a great job!
I'm a guinea pig as it were- or a case study.
 
It's a unique product, INCOMPARABLE.
But the process established is made for REPLICATION.

When I succeed- we can go into;


Rural and Urban school presentations on innovation, intellectual property management, commercialization.

Outreach program- continent wide- 25 innovation units throughout Africa.   spreading out of U.O.N/Strathmore system with aim to replication around the continent for other inventors.


International and Africa specific innovation chain news articles (Daily Nation, Standard, the New Vision, Monitor, the  East African, BBC, AFP, New York times, Christian Science Monitor, New African,  e.t.c.)<&

story:
You are out in the city, attend a party in the evening, you might go to a park during the day or a sports ground. That's where you meet great musicians, which are surrounded by many people; DJs shaking up the clubs; dancers showing of their moves; and athletes that pursue their passion. There are so many sensational people, with whom you might have something in common, but who you cannot approach for whatever reason.

How about each and every one of them had something on them, that would allow you to instantly see who that person is and where to find him? Of course, everyone has a name which, - after you find it out - you can look up for hours on Facebook and Google between a variety of namesakes to ultimately give up disappointed.

We want to create an environment which allows you to easily come in contact with people from all over the world and that for free.




We give out a #number (e.g. #1111) to every registered person. This individual number is connected to your passion and to all your social network profiles (e.g. Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, etc.). Hence, it allows you to be found everywhere via your #number, without being approached directly. The #number also offers an easy way to make contact with the person or allows you to simply enjoy their passion. This can take place online via your videos / pictures or even offline through our merchandising products (T-Shirts, Hoddies, etc.).

So you can get additional followers on Instagram, new subscribers on YouTube, new friend requests on Facebook, and this can happen every time someone sees your #number printed onto your T-Shirt.

Your network will grow without great effort or costs. Whether through fans or friends you will be supported and you can support others, who are part of our community. We as well will support you by showing your videos / pictures on our website, our blog and of course on our social networks.




You will be part of a world’s first innovative community, which offers something different to all the other networks. Due to our “low-personal-data-level” we do not require any kind of personal data from you. We combine passion and community, enabling people to connect with each other from all over the world according to their passion. We want to shake up the "offline world" by connecting it with the "online world".

By uniting the social networks we want to show that independence, community and innovation can play a lead role in the world market.

Our goal is to make our community accessible for even more users. Every single cent from this campaign will go into the production of shirts and the creation of an amazing App. If the demand for the first batch is obtained, it will be enough for us to kick-off the project. More importantly, it will show us that this is a product you really want bring to life.



What material are the Shirts / Hoodies made of?

Our brands products are produced by the Fair Wear Foundation, guaranteeing for an ethical trade and fairness for the employees. The sizes can be taken from the gallery.



If you have not heard of I-live-my-passion before, we are an independent company that believes in innovation through collaboration. We have already built an amazingly strong community of Passioners which is growing by the minute.

We are completely different to any other company you will ever support. All of our members can have their say in the direction of our product design. Help us create   "The Community" and then be a part of making it yours.

So, are you with us?




Whether a gig, photos, videos or other actions – as a Passioner you can associate everything with your #number and share your passion with the world. So without any great effort your network will grow by itself!

We of course will also support your network growth by daily presenting and highlight randomly chosen Passioners on our website and our social network channels by sharing their #number, videos and pictures. Furthermore we start off every new week with a new episode of our Passioners.



We know that not everyone can contribute financially.  However, sharing our story with others would be immensely helpful.  

Share and share again! Make some noise about us!
  • Don't just like it, share it with your friends on Facebook!
  • Follow us on Instagram and see daily new Passioners!
  • Dont just Tweet it, shout it out on Twitter!
  • Support us on Google+ with a +1!
  • Look at our videos on YouTube! and subscribe to our channel.
  • Spread our campaign via Skype, Y! Messenger and G-Talk and be part of the movement!
  • If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at info@ilmyp.com.
  • For press inquiries contact press@ilmyp.com.


Q: How can I register on I-live-my-passion.com?

A: Just follow this link here or watch this Video for explanation how it works.

Q: What is ILMYP?

A: ILMYP is the shortcut of "I live my passion".

Q: Do I need a shirt to be a member (Passioner)?

A: No you just can register for free and will receive a number from us and then you can share your #number on all the other social networks.

Q: Do you ship internationally?

A: Yes we ship to all destinations worldwide.

Q: I accidentally ordered the wrong color/ put in the wrong address/ want to upgrade my perk. What do I do?

A: Please e-mail our customer service at support@i-live-my-passion.com with your full name, address, Indiegogo account name, and the details of your issue. We will put you in a special list to make sure you get what you intended to order.

Q: Can i return an article ?

A: No. Every T-Shirt has your individual number on it. Thats why we cannot sell the shirts to other poeple. Please look at our gallery for all the data/sizes.

Q: Did you had any help within the campain?

A: No we have done everything by our own capacity and worked hard for that. Cause of our passion and support we wanted to make this here happen.

Q: I've changed my mind. Can I get a refund?

A: Sorry, Indiegogo's policy is No Refunds. Unfortunately, there's nothing we can do about this. When your contribution is deposited into our PayPal account, it comes from Indiegogo, not from you. So if we were to refund your contribution, it wouldn't make it back to you. Please see Indiegogo's rules here.


***Please feel free to contribute any amount you desire!  The perks to the right are simply suggestions.  

***Please understand that we incur % losses of donations through payment processing, production of your perks and mailing of perks.  

***For International customers, fulfillment of your perk and shipping will take longer.  Thanks for your patience.

***For subtitles in the video you can select directly on Youtube.

story:
About Corn Creek Growers

  Six years ago I started homesteading, hoping to feed my little family as much as possible from our farm. My goals have since changed, and increasing my income has become a larger priority. Over the last couple of years I have been selling produce and eggs along with market totes and other items made from repurposed feed bags, my own pottery and vegetable plants at farmers markets, bringing in a small but growing income. 

The Campaign

  Using the small space I have, I need to get creative to continue to grow my business.

  Since I have been starting my own plants from seed all along, starting more plants with the intent to sell is the next logical step. In addition to the vegetables and fruit that I grow to sell, I will also be starting more plants with an eye toward customers. My market customers, for instance, have expressed interest in things like tomato plants to grow on the patio, indoor herb plants or sustainably grown flowers to plant by the front porch.

  Increasing my ability to start and nurture plants to sell means adding greenhouse space to the very small greenhouse I've been using. If you help me reach my goal of $2,000, I can get a larger greenhouse suitable for the space I have and that is durable enough to keep me growing well into the future. A larger greenhouse also means that some of the space can be used to extend my growing season into colder months so I can have greens and salad mix to take to the market in January.

  If I don't reach the goal I've set, there are less expensive options that will still increase my growing capacity, just not quite as much. Either way, though, my farming business grows. I will greatly appreciate whatever help you can give me.

A larger greenhouse also means that some of the space can be used to extend my growing season into colder months so I can have greens and salad mix to take to the market in January.  If I don't reach the goal I've set, there are less expensive options that will still increase my growing capacity, just not quite as much. story:
Short Summary

I am a teacher on Udemy. One of my most successful courses was called "Mastering Planning" and covered planning at the hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly and yearly levels. Based on the success of this course I'm creating a ​long-term planning course that covers the intervals of 5, 10, 25, 50 and 100 years. 

  • I have over 35,000 students on Udemy, over 50 courses published and over 750 reviews.
  • This campaign is to help raise funds for the course.
  • The original "Mastering Planning" course has a 4.3 average rating and over 700 students.

What I Need & What You Get

  • I will be creating the course whether or not I get any funding.
  • The goal here is to give people who pre-order a  special deal and to experiment with crowdfunding as a way to fund more of my course creation projects.
  • In the future I want to use crowd funding to fund all of my courses and set priorities based on what my students want me to create.

The Impact

  • The online education market is still based on an outdated concept of creating courses and then seeing if people are interested.
  • I want to give students the ability to invest in courses before they are created and influence what their teachers create. 
  • Long term I think this new form of funding for creating online courses will have a big positive effect on the quality of what is created.

Risks & Challenges

  • There are no major risks or challenges. I have created over 50 courses already and have a proven system for creating high quality courses.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Reach out to me with ideas for what you want me to teach about, or resources you think would help make the course better.
  • Share this project on social media.

Thanks for your interest,

Timothy

TimothyKenny.com

story:
PeriKEY – YOUR PERSONAL DATA BODYGUARD

Today’s modern world is run digitally: from websites and logins, to nearly every single transaction. Personal data moves around the web from company to company—often without your explicit consent.

Just think about it: every bank, every shop, every company you have a relationship with—even every hotel you visit—has a digital store with your personal information in it. Thousands upon thousands of pieces of your personal information are floating out in cyberspace, just waiting for someone to hack, use, and abuse.

  • PeriKEY is a secure digital vault application, where every piece of data is encrypted with its own unique digital key--making it nearly impossible to steal.
  • PeriKEY is a password manager that can autofill credentials and payment information on all the major browsers.
  • In PeriKEY, you create data cards in the digital vault – for example, your website passwords, credit cards, passport details, and even social security information. Each data card is securely encrypted with a unique digital key that is stored in an application that resides on your personal devices. PeriKEY itself never has access to those keys— they are yours, and yours alone.
  • PeriKEY allows you to share these data cards safely and securely with people and businesses. When a company wants access to the cards in the vault, they make a request, which pops up on your PeriKEY devices—where you can then control the information they have access to, and exactly how long and for exactly what purpose.
  • When these companies hold on to a request for a period of time, it is held in ESCROW, where they can only access the data in a controlled digital cage.
  • PeriKEY runs on Windows, MacOS, Unix, iPhones, iPads, plus Android Phones and Tablets

WHAT IS PeriKEY

PeriKEY - MORE THAN JUST A PASSWORD MANAGER

Password managers allow you to share a password vault between devices. Which is great, however – it’s not a secure way to share data between DIFFERENT people and businesses. For example, sharing your information checking into a hotel so it does not get leaked, hacked, or shared inappropriately.

PeriKEY is built for personal data and for sharing. Sure, it’s a password manager, but it’s also a secure vault for all your personal information, to keep it safe and secure, AND most importantly SHAREABLE with others (family or businesses) without compromising the security of the data.

PeriKEY is a solution to this problem; we keep your data safe, and allow companies to make specific requests of your data—

all without them having to store and secure it.

WHO WILL BE USING PeriKEY SHARING?

  • Between your own devices. Secured either by password, or two-factor authentication, or biometric – It’s as secure as you want it to be.
  • Between trusted people: Family and people you trust to have some sort of limited access.
  • For access by Employees within a company. Imagine not having to give out passwords to employees to grant access to systems.
  • Between people and businesses: Purpose based data access.

PERIKEY BUSINESS SHARING IN ACTION

Let’s take, for example, a car rental. The rental company needs to know a few things about you before they can rent you a car.

Currently, they take a copy of your driver's license to check you have one and that you are over 25. They need your address just in case something goes wrong, and they need a credit card so they can take a deposit and then charge you at the end.

The rental company doesn’t want to store this information, but at the moment they don’t have a choice, and so another hackable trove of your personal information is created.

With PeriKEY it can work differently. You show the rental company your PeriKEY ID (it’s like a super bar code), and the rental company then invokes a request for purpose to the PeriKEY network: Do you have a current driver's license? Are you over 25? What is your address? What card should be charged? - these are purposes - business defined flows where a company needs access to certain information.

These requests from the rental company are forwarded from the PeriKEY network to your personal devices where it pops up a notification that the rental company is asking for this information, the period of time they are asking for it, and what card(s) to use. A pin code and your fingerprint confirm that you want to use the keys on your device to unlock the data to give the rental company the answers to those questions, NOT THE DATA ITSELF. All these purpose-based accesses are made in a secure digital cage, protecting both the consumer and the vendor.

The answers to those questions are then given to the rental company to complete the transaction. That’s right, the rental company doesn’t have your driver's license data, it doesn’t have your credit card details - these are held in ESCROW within PeriKEY. It just has your name, address and telephone number, the answers to the questions, and the right to access that data in ESCROW for the length of the car rental if it needs it.

WHERE ARE WE IN THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS?

Most of the system is written and has been tested for security and functionality. It uses security practices that are even beyond those used within most government security systems.

It’s a large code base, and currently runs on PC’s, MACs, Apple iPhones and iPads as well as newer Android phones and tablets. It also connects with Google Chrome, Apple Safari and Microsoft Edge browsers for the safe exchange of vault passwords and other data.

WHY PeriKEY?

Companies don’t want the risk of holding consumers’ personal data; however, currently they don’t have a choice. By using PeriKEY, they can mitigate risk without compromising business workflow.

TARGET AUDIENCE

PeriKEY is designed for consumers, software vendors and companies.

PROTECTED IP

Patents have been applied for parts of the system--specifically the ESCROW and purpose-based systems, as well as portions of the time-based encryption keys.

AN EXPERIENCED TEAM

Our team is made up of experienced software engineers and designers that have worked on international banking platforms, highly secure commercial device control networks and government intelligence systems, making us uniquely qualified to build such a secure system.

HOW DOES PeriKEY WORK?

PeriKEY allows you to share vault data in multiple ways, affording a level of security that has not been available outside of government systems. With PeriKEY you can share data:

Between your devices. This is the typical mode where you want to keep your vault in sync between different devices.

Between trusted people. Let’s say you want to share your financial data between yourself and your partner, simply choose to sync with that user – specify which data types and categories and that data will sync with them. 

Between trusted people with conditions. This is great when you want to say, give your kids-controlled access to a credit card or account. You can specify where, for how long, when, and for what purpose it can be used. For instance, you can specify it can be used by Child X to buy from a clothing store, today only, once, and for less than $100. 

Between trusted people with permission. This is a great way to share a credit card with a child that can use it for emergency purposes. Anytime they try to use it, it will ask for permission from one of your devices, with all the details, before it allows access.

With businesses for a purpose. This is a specific business use case. Imagine being able to share data with a company, but they can only access it for specific purposes, can’t store the actual data, and the data is always safe and sound. Plus, you can always see when and why they have accessed this data as a comprehensive history.

WHY ARE WE DOING THIS CAMPAIGN?

As we are rolling out a secure product, it requires a lot of testing, both to make sure it works properly, and to probe its security. Because of that, the money will be spent to:

  • Finish up, pretty up, and test the final application on all the devices.
  • Set up all the cloud infrastructure for the release.
  • Extend the existing patents we have.
  • Perform one or more hackathons where we invite hackers to break the system and offer a reward for the first cracks.
  • Market this both to consumers and businesses.

WHAT IS THE DEVELOPMENT PLAN?

In the first phase, we are concentrating on the vault functionality and the sharing between devices and trusted parties. Phase one goal - $50,000.

The second phase will focus on the business version – so that businesses can share information securely with employees and vendors without compromising the data itself. Phase two goal - $75,000.

The third phase is all about consumer to business sharing – the point is to allow you, the consumer, to control who, when, and for what purpose your sensitive data can be accessed without compromising the security of it. Phase Three goal - $175,000.

ANSWERS TO THE ‘HOW IS IT SECURE’ QUESTIONS

WHAT MEASURES ARE TAKEN TO KEEP THE DATA SECURE?

This system uses best of class encryption - digitally scrambling the data, so that only if you have the key that was used to scramble it, can you unscramble and access the data.

Every separate bit of data is encrypted differently, and those encryption keys, that are required to access the data, are encrypted with your password. We don’t store that password anywhere (so be careful with it) – if you don’t have the password, no one, not even PeriKEY, can access your data.

One of the primary ways hackers get data is to look at the memory of a program as it is running, and to look for things that look like keys, passwords, and data. PeriKEY NEVER stores your data unencrypted, not even in the memory as it's running, making it much harder to hack (and much harder to write).

All data that is transmitted is encrypted using the best methods available on the web, the ones the banks use. We then encrypt it even further – using time dependent keys, and a key from the requestor as well. PeriKEY cannot even read your data, ever.

 

WHAT STOPS SOMEONE FROM CREATING A FAKE IDENTITY?

Things that are identity documents, such as drivers licenses and passports, are required to be validated. This means you will have to take them to someone like a notary or a bank, that will validate them for you – and that data is then digitally signed as valid. Once it's signed, you cannot change it. If you do, then it needs to be re-validated before it can be used as an identity.

 

WHAT PROTECTS THE DATA HELD IN ESCROW?

This was probably the hardest part of the system to work out – and part of the secret sauce. We give requestor keys to the data – but these aren’t the real keys – they are special time-dependent keys – so once the access period has expired – no one – not even the requestor, PeriKEY, or anyone else, can get at your data. There is much more to it than that, but without a week-long explanation, the data is encrypted based on the time-dependent key and the requestors digital signature for that purpose.

 

WHAT STOPS SOMEONE FROM CREATING A FAKE SHARE REQUEST?

All share requests are digitally signed by PeriKEY and the requestor jointly. Unless it's properly signed, it will get rejected and flagged.

 

WHAT STOPS A BUSINESS FROM LEAKING MY DATA, OR CHANGING WHAT THEY DO WITH THE DATA?

All code the requestor runs (such as a business) is submitted and checked by PeriKEY and digitally signed by both parties for a specific purpose. Only digitally signed code can access data for that purpose. We expect all code submitted to be what is known as "zero knowledge proof-based" systems, and as such do not transmit personal data elsewhere.

 

Please get the word out, let’s make this real – and take back our data!

Thank you
story_txt:
PeriKEY – YOUR PERSONAL DATA BODYGUARD
Today’s modern world is run digitally: from websites and logins, to nearly every single transaction. Personal data moves around the web from company to company—often without your explicit consent.
Just think about it: every bank, every shop, every company you have a relationship with—even every hotel you visit—has a digital store with your personal information in it. Thousands upon thousands of pieces of your personal information are floating out in cyberspace, just waiting for someone to hack, use, and abuse.

PeriKEY is a secure digital vault application, where every piece of data is encrypted with its own unique digital key--making it nearly impossible to steal.
PeriKEY is a password manager that can autofill credentials and payment information on all the major browsers.
In PeriKEY, you create data cards in the digital vault – for example, your website passwords, credit cards, passport details, and even social security information. Each data card is securely encrypted with a unique digital key that is stored in an application that resides on your personal devices. PeriKEY itself never has access to those keys— they are yours, and yours alone.
PeriKEY allows you to share these data cards safely and securely with people and businesses. When a company wants access to the cards in the vault, they make a request, which pops up on your PeriKEY devices—where you can then control the information they have access to, and exactly how long and for exactly what purpose.
When these companies hold on to a request for a period of time, it is held in ESCROW, where they can only access the data in a controlled digital cage.
PeriKEY runs on Windows, MacOS, Unix, iPhones, iPads, plus Android Phones and Tablets

WHAT IS PeriKEY
PeriKEY - MORE THAN JUST A PASSWORD MANAGER
Password managers allow you to share a password vault between devices. Which is great, however – it’s not a secure way to share data between DIFFERENT people and businesses. For example, sharing your information checking into a hotel so it does not get leaked, hacked, or shared inappropriately.
PeriKEY is built for personal data and for sharing. Sure, it’s a password manager, but it’s also a secure vault for all your personal information, to keep it safe and secure, AND most importantly SHAREABLE with others (family or businesses) without compromising the security of the data.
PeriKEY is a solution to this problem; we keep your data safe, and allow companies to make specific requests of your data—
all without them having to store and secure it.
WHO WILL BE USING PeriKEY SHARING?

Between your own devices. Secured either by password, or two-factor authentication, or biometric – It’s as secure as you want it to be.
Between trusted people: Family and people you trust to have some sort of limited access.
For access by Employees within a company. Imagine not having to give out passwords to employees to grant access to systems.
Between people and businesses: Purpose based data access.

PERIKEY BUSINESS SHARING IN ACTION
Let’s take, for example, a car rental. The rental company needs to know a few things about you before they can rent you a car.
Currently, they take a copy of your driver's license to check you have one and that you are over 25. They need your address just in case something goes wrong, and they need a credit card so they can take a deposit and then charge you at the end.
The rental company doesn’t want to store this information, but at the moment they don’t have a choice, and so another hackable trove of your personal information is created.
With PeriKEY it can work differently. You show the rental company your PeriKEY ID (it’s like a super bar code), and the rental company then invokes a request for purpose to the PeriKEY network: Do you have a current driver's license? Are you over 25? What is your address? What card should be charged? - these are purposes - business defined flows where a company needs access to certain information.
These requests from the rental company are forwarded from the PeriKEY network to your personal devices where it pops up a notification that the rental company is asking for this information, the period of time they are asking for it, and what card(s) to use. A pin code and your fingerprint confirm that you want to use the keys on your device to unlock the data to give the rental company the answers to those questions, NOT THE DATA ITSELF. All these purpose-based accesses are made in a secure digital cage, protecting both the consumer and the vendor.
The answers to those questions are then given to the rental company to complete the transaction. That’s right, the rental company doesn’t have your driver's license data, it doesn’t have your credit card details - these are held in ESCROW within PeriKEY. It just has your name, address and telephone number, the answers to the questions, and the right to access that data in ESCROW for the length of the car rental if it needs it.
WHERE ARE WE IN THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS?
Most of the system is written and has been tested for security and functionality. It uses security practices that are even beyond those used within most government security systems.
It’s a large code base, and currently runs on PC’s, MACs, Apple iPhones and iPads as well as newer Android phones and tablets. It also connects with Google Chrome, Apple Safari and Microsoft Edge browsers for the safe exchange of vault passwords and other data.

WHY PeriKEY?
Companies don’t want the risk of holding consumers’ personal data; however, currently they don’t have a choice. By using PeriKEY, they can mitigate risk without compromising business workflow.
TARGET AUDIENCE
PeriKEY is designed for consumers, software vendors and companies.
PROTECTED IP
Patents have been applied for parts of the system--specifically the ESCROW and purpose-based systems, as well as portions of the time-based encryption keys.
AN EXPERIENCED TEAM
Our team is made up of experienced software engineers and designers that have worked on international banking platforms, highly secure commercial device control networks and government intelligence systems, making us uniquely qualified to build such a secure system.
HOW DOES PeriKEY WORK?
PeriKEY allows you to share vault data in multiple ways, affording a level of security that has not been available outside of government systems. With PeriKEY you can share data:
Between your devices. This is the typical mode where you want to keep your vault in sync between different devices.

Between trusted people. Let’s say you want to share your financial data between yourself and your partner, simply choose to sync with that user – specify which data types and categories and that data will sync with them. 

Between trusted people with conditions. This is great when you want to say, give your kids-controlled access to a credit card or account. You can specify where, for how long, when, and for what purpose it can be used. For instance, you can specify it can be used by Child X to buy from a clothing store, today only, once, and for less than $100. 

Between trusted people with permission. This is a great way to share a credit card with a child that can use it for emergency purposes. Anytime they try to use it, it will ask for permission from one of your devices, with all the details, before it allows access.

With businesses for a purpose. This is a specific business use case. Imagine being able to share data with a company, but they can only access it for specific purposes, can’t store the actual data, and the data is always safe and sound. Plus, you can always see when and why they have accessed this data as a comprehensive history.

WHY ARE WE DOING THIS CAMPAIGN?
As we are rolling out a secure product, it requires a lot of testing, both to make sure it works properly, and to probe its security. Because of that, the money will be spent to:

Finish up, pretty up, and test the final application on all the devices.
Set up all the cloud infrastructure for the release.
Extend the existing patents we have.
Perform one or more hackathons where we invite hackers to break the system and offer a reward for the first cracks.
Market this both to consumers and businesses.

WHAT IS THE DEVELOPMENT PLAN?
In the first phase, we are concentrating on the vault functionality and the sharing between devices and trusted parties. Phase one goal - $50,000.
The second phase will focus on the business version – so that businesses can share information securely with employees and vendors without compromising the data itself. Phase two goal - $75,000.
The third phase is all about consumer to business sharing – the point is to allow you, the consumer, to control who, when, and for what purpose your sensitive data can be accessed without compromising the security of it. Phase Three goal - $175,000.
ANSWERS TO THE ‘HOW IS IT SECURE’ QUESTIONS
WHAT MEASURES ARE TAKEN TO KEEP THE DATA SECURE?
This system uses best of class encryption - digitally scrambling the data, so that only if you have the key that was used to scramble it, can you unscramble and access the data.
Every separate bit of data is encrypted differently, and those encryption keys, that are required to access the data, are encrypted with your password. We don’t store that password anywhere (so be careful with it) – if you don’t have the password, no one, not even PeriKEY, can access your data.
One of the primary ways hackers get data is to look at the memory of a program as it is running, and to look for things that look like keys, passwords, and data. PeriKEY NEVER stores your data unencrypted, not even in the memory as it's running, making it much harder to hack (and much harder to write).
All data that is transmitted is encrypted using the best methods available on the web, the ones the banks use. We then encrypt it even further – using time dependent keys, and a key from the requestor as well. PeriKEY cannot even read your data, ever. WHAT STOPS SOMEONE FROM CREATING A FAKE IDENTITY?
Things that are identity documents, such as drivers licenses and passports, are required to be validated. This means you will have to take them to someone like a notary or a bank, that will validate them for you – and that data is then digitally signed as valid. Once it's signed, you cannot change it. If you do, then it needs to be re-validated before it can be used as an identity. WHAT PROTECTS THE DATA HELD IN ESCROW?
This was probably the hardest part of the system to work out – and part of the secret sauce. We give requestor keys to the data – but these aren’t the real keys – they are special time-dependent keys – so once the access period has expired – no one – not even the requestor, PeriKEY, or anyone else, can get at your data. There is much more to it than that, but without a week-long explanation, the data is encrypted based on the time-dependent key and the requestors digital signature for that purpose. WHAT STOPS SOMEONE FROM CREATING A FAKE SHARE REQUEST?
All share requests are digitally signed by PeriKEY and the requestor jointly. Unless it's properly signed, it will get rejected and flagged. WHAT STOPS A BUSINESS FROM LEAKING MY DATA, OR CHANGING WHAT THEY DO WITH THE DATA?
All code the requestor runs (such as a business) is submitted and checked by PeriKEY and digitally signed by both parties for a specific purpose. Only digitally signed code can access data for that purpose. We expect all code submitted to be what is known as "zero knowledge proof-based" systems, and as such do not transmit personal data elsewhere. Please get the word out, let’s make this real – and take back our data!
Thank you

story:
The mcSquares Mission

Our passion is making products that inspire creativity and cultivate collaboration in your home, at your office, or in a classroom. We make beautiful, high-quality products that last and last.

What are Stickies?

Stickies are reusable, dry-erase replacements for paper sticky notes. They work on almost any smooth surface including: glass, acrylic, steel, aluminum, smooth walls, cabinets, mirrors, dry-erase boards, and other mcSquares Stickies.

Ideal for creative brainstorming sessions, your desk, classroom, or any collaborative space.

They feature a high quality dry-erase or wet-erase front and an aerospace grade static cling foam on the back.

Should they stop sticking, just wash off the back to clear off any dust and they stick just like new! Under normal use they will last up to 2,000 sticks and erases each!

 

The Impact

50 Billion paper sticky notes are wasted every single year - that equates to roughly 250,000 trees!

Features

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We've delivered successfully on 3 campaigns both on Indiegogo & Kickstarter and mcSquares Stickies are in production now, we have 5,000 in inventory!

The only risk to delivery is if the USPS decides to keep them all for themselves ;)

story:
About

The Luminiser is a compact and durable lantern that uses thermoelectricity to power the LEDs for hours!

By using thermoelectricity, The Luminiser’s patented technology transforms the heat energy from one single tea light candle into a powerful LED light lasting 5-6 hours, providing 15-20 times the light than a candle alone.

No batteries, solar panels or cords required.

Don't take our word for it. Check out all the press buzz!

 

"Luminiser is a revolutionary LED light that is power by one tea candle!" - mikeshouts.com

"Luminiser powers its internal LED lights using a unique form of energy, potentially changing the lives of those who use it." - digitaltrends.com

"ThermTech has created a new powerful indoor and outdoor LED light" - geeky-gadgets.com

"Yes, this light is a camping light using the "thermoelectricity" technology" - techable.jp

 

 

The Luminiser is lightweight, rugged and made from high-quality materials. Use it indoors or outside!

 

 

Today millions of people worldwide suffer the consequences of power outages due to common natural disasters.

In addition, over a billion people around the world do not even have electricity!

By backing our campaign you will be supporting our initiative to provide a brighter future to people without power in third-world countries.

Works in 3 EASY Steps!

  • Light the tea candle.
  • Place the candle in the glass holder and lock it into the lantern.
  • Select your lighting mode and receive light!

 

 

Just click the green button, select a reward, become a backer and help us bring the Luminiser to life!

1. Click Back this Project Above: Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page or click here. Each backer may only make one pledge.

2. Payment: Enter your payment information. Your payment will not be charged until the very end of this campaign.

 

To solve a serious problem and secure people access to a safe and powerful light source, ThermTech has invented and beautifully designed the Luminiser Lantern.

 
 

The ThermTech team has been working with thermoelectricity for the last 10 years. We have all the necessary skills and know how to make this happen.

ThermTech has been granted 2 United States Utility Patents:

  • US Utility Patent No 8,779,275
  • Thermoelectric generator battery charging and power supply
  • US Utility Patent No 8,404,962
  • Thermoelectric generator for battery charging and power supply
  • The Luminiser - Patent Pending and Design Patents

ThermTech is a small Norwegian company that develops advanced personal scale energy solutions for off-grid communities around the world. Our company serves 3 distinct markets:

  • Developing world families living in energy poverty.
  • Emergency preparedness market.
  • Outdoor enthusiasts seeking to cook, charge, and light their lives away from an outlet.

We address these markets simultaneously and by incubating core technologies that can serve users in all markets, we are able to re-invest near-term revenue to solve long-term, high-impact problems.

 

 

 

Certified Shipping!

  • We are proud to have our fulfillment plan certified by Floship, a leading crowdfunding fulfillment provider.
  • We have calculated the optimal means of shipping Luminiser to all markets in a fast and cost-effective manner.
  • For proof of certification into the fulfillment plan please click here.

Did you like our project? One click goes a long way. Help us reach our goal by sharing on social media :)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

This is our first Kickstarter campaign and we have to learn a lot from this project and the challenges that will come with it. With that in mind, this project has a long runway for fulfillment. This is so that we can create realistic expectations around nailing our timeline. Nobody likes delays, and we’re doing everything we can to deliver on an achievable and responsible schedule.

That said, with a new production partner, we may still have some learning curves ahead of us but our team will be here to communicate along the way.

Another risk we are taking on is offering our campaign to anyone in the world – why is that a risk? Because shipping logistics can get really, really complicated, and very very expensive. We want anyone who wants to have the opportunity to be a backer, and we are doing everything we can to be very upfront about what it takes to get you your Luminiser. We can assure you that we are not making any money on our international shipping fees, only covering a portion of the full charges.

Another risk we are taking on is offering our campaign to anyone in the world – why is that a risk? Because shipping logistics can get really, really complicated, and very very expensive. We want anyone who wants to have the opportunity to be a backer, and we are doing everything we can to be very upfront about what it takes to get you your Luminiser. We can assure you that we are not making any money on our international shipping fees, only covering a portion of the full charges.

story:
What does the MXM PeaceMaker Spinner do?

It's a fidget toy! All you do is fiddle with it. Fiddling can actually help you concentrate. So rather than clicking a pen, or flipping a lighter, or tapping your toe and annoying everyone, you simply place the spinner between your forefinger and your thumb and spin away. Other than the on-point design, the beauty of this spinner, is that it's silent.

My Campaign

I'm Jay Erwin, the founder of Metal X Manufacturing. Ever since I can remember, I've been a fidgeter. I always have to be moving, tinkering, creating, inventing, manufacturing. I'm a true idea man and am proud of the things I have created.

The MXM PeaceMaker campaign is my effort to get support for a common spinner fidget toy that I reinvented, redesigned and handcrafted specifically for avid 2nd Amendment supporters and for those that just need one more spinner to their EDC collection. I've seen spinners out there but wanted to make one with attitude. It shouldn't be only functional, it's gotta have style. I refuse to make anything sub-par, so I pulled out all the stops for this spinner, which I consider one of my greatest masterpieces. 

With your support, I can make this spinner a reality.

What I Need & What You Get

Ok so we spent some up front money to have working prototypes made and not just some drawing or concept. We want to make sure you know what your getting. We are looking to cover material cost and place volume orders with our vendors to offer a high quality spinner at a low cost to you.

You cant go wrong with any Perk from us! Check out the description and pictures below to see what you will receive with each Perk option.

All PeaceMaker are constructed from 304 Stainless Steel (SS) and come in two different finishes. You can choose from our Old School Finish (Perks #1,3,5) or Tac Black (Perks #2,4,6). Every PeaceMaker comes with premium ceramic center bearing. If you are ordering a perk with the shell casings (we use once fired brass) we take 12 casings and cut them down so both sides of the PeaceMaker look the same. NOTE: Depending on the supply of shell casing we can get our hands on you will either get 38 Special or 357 Magnum.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help at this time, I would greatly appreciate it if you would tell all your friends! My customers are the most valuable part of my business.

Thank you so much!

story:
"What They Didn't Teach You about Marketing Yourself"©, has 50 chapters of riveting information about presenting your ideas.

WHAT EVERY CREATIVE PERSON SHOULD KNOW ABOUT CREATING WEBPAGES, MOBILE APPS, PLANNING A MEETING, VIDEO EQUIPMENT, GREEN SCREENS, SOCIAL NETWORKING,  AND HOW TO AVOID GETTING RIPPED OFF!!!!!!! 

  • Mind Mapping and Wire framing Your Idea
  • Creating a Basic Business Plan Profile
  • Writing a Small Book or Ezine
  • Public Speaking
  • The Perfect Agenda
  • Making Handouts for Your Meeting
  • Business Cards
  • Choosing The Best Meeting Location
  • Basic Marketing Equipment and Software
  • Introduction to Web 2.0
  • The Importance of Social Networking
  • Starting and Joining Existing Groups
  • Community Sites
  • Introduction to Blogging
  • RSS Feeds
  • Your Website and Why You Need It
  • Domain Names and Domain Name Systems
  • Web Hosting
  • Online Shopping Carts Fast and Easy
  • Video Blogging
  • QR Codes
  • Making Your First Mobile App

"Remember, IF YOU DON'T KEEP UP YOU GET LEFT BEHIND."

Hi, my name is Rashad Glover and I'm the author of “What They Didn't Teach You About Marketing Yourself”©. Since I graduated from college I have wanted someone to sit me down and show me what steps I needed to take for the various projects I've have done in the past. I was also looking for someone to take me under their wings and show me how to present my ideas and be taken seriously. More importantly, how to complete projects. What I found out was, this person didn't exist and most of the professionals I know struggled with the same issues. These intelligent men and women are 10 to 40 years older than myself, all wondering the same questions. We just wanted road map with easy steps to follow. Here are some of the subjects covered:

 

 

I have encountered business men, web designers, graphic artists, and computer types who have been reluctant to offer help with various projects. Some become uncomfortable when asked about their software and equipment. Does this sound familiar to you? 
 
During 2012, I compiled a list of services, equipment and software. When this list was completed, I condensed it into universal steps that anybody can use regardless of profession.
"What They Didn’t Teach You about Marketing Yourself"©, has 50 chapters of riveting information the professionals don't want you know. In my book, Android app (coming soon) and IPhone app (coming soon), I show you how to draw and map your ideas using free software.
 
 Once the basics are covered, We dive into more topics like the setup of your website, web store, and the use of extremely easy software like the one being used to make my video.  I also talk about conducting organized meetings online and in person, getting over your fear of speaking in public, and setting up various accounts with different community sites to drive traffic towards your projects. Lastly, I show you how to create an iPhone or Android app easily based on everything you already did in the book! All this, with no programming. 
 
This book is for those who are looking for a start. All of these easy steps will save you time and money. This book is designed to be followed step by step to give you a sense of accomplishment from chapter to chapter. This book is also about managing your whole project using very simple tools that a 5th grade child can use. It doesn't matter if you’re an entrepreneur, artist, doctor, or lawyer you're going to need the information in this book. My focus is to help people stay on task and focus on one project at a time. By following each step in my book you will know you covered your bases and have done everything you know to catapult your project to the next level. “What They Didn't Teach You About Marketing Yourself” © is a curriculum for those who want more in life and want to start now. Can you imagine a new business using this information to get the word out about their product or services? I know I can.

"Remember, IF YOU DON'T KEEP UP YOU GET LEFT BEHIND."
Hi, my name is Rashad Glover and I'm the author of “What They Didn't Teach You About Marketing Yourself”©. Since I graduated from college I have wanted someone to sit me down and show me what steps I needed to take for the various projects I've have done in the past. I was also looking for someone to take me under their wings and show me how to present my ideas and be taken seriously. More importantly, how to complete projects. What I found out was, this person didn't exist and most of the professionals I know struggled with the same issues. These intelligent men and women are 10 to 40 years older than myself, all wondering the same questions. We just wanted road map with easy steps to follow. Here are some of the subjects covered:

 
 




I have encountered business men, web designers, graphic artists, and computer types who have been reluctant to offer help with various projects. Some become uncomfortable when asked about their software and equipment. Does this sound familiar to you? 
 

During 2012, I compiled a list of services, equipment and software. When this list was completed, I condensed it into universal steps that anybody can use regardless of profession. "What They Didn’t Teach You about Marketing Yourself"©, has 50 chapters of riveting information the professionals don't want you know. In my book, Android app (coming soon) and IPhone app (coming soon), I show you how to draw and map your ideas using free software.


 
 Once the basics are covered, We dive into more topics like the setup of your website, web store, and the use of extremely easy software like the one being used to make my video.  I also talk about conducting organized meetings online and in person, getting over your fear of speaking in public, and setting up various accounts with different community sites to drive traffic towards your projects. Lastly, I show you how to create an iPhone or Android app easily based on everything you already did in the book! All this, with no programming. 
 
This book is for those who are looking for a start. All of these easy steps will save you time and money. This book is designed to be followed step by step to give you a sense of accomplishment from chapter to chapter. This book is also about managing your whole project using very simple tools that a 5th grade child can use. It doesn't matter if you’re an entrepreneur, artist, doctor, or lawyer you're going to need the information in this book. My focus is to help people stay on task and focus on one project at a time. By following each step in my book you will know you covered your bases and have done everything you know to catapult your project to the next level. “What They Didn't Teach You About Marketing Yourself” © is a curriculum for those who want more in life and want to start now. Can you imagine a new business using this information to get the word out about their product or services? I know I can.

story:
A Social Sharing Platform Where "You" Matter

The world of social network have taken off in the past few years, with sites like Facebook, allowing us to connect with people from our past and always stay connected with existing friends and family around the world.

Discovering things through existing friends are fun, but very limited.  The world is an amazing platform inspired by millions of unique stories and cultures. The problem is, how would you discover those stories and people around the world today?

We need your help to build a web/mobile platform that give everyone a stage to share their stories & start their own trend. 

Let Anyone Discover The World Through Your Eyes

Amazing people with amazing stories, are doing amazing things each and everyday around the world, from little towns to big cities.  With TrendStartr, each content (picture/video) shared will become a data point that allows everyone to see the world through your eyes.  

The world has no boundaries, the only barrier is not having a platform that allows you to discover the world in real time no matter where you are, find people across the globe who share the same interest & topics as you. That's why we need your help to build TrendStartr.  


 

Inspired To Discover :)

Discovering the mass amount of content in social networks today is difficult, redundant, and sometimes lack of purpose. Facebook has sharing with your existing circle of friends and family covered, probably for the next 20 years, but there isn't a platform where it's focused on the person & story behind the content, by doing so that content becomes much more interesting, and inspirational.   

TrendStartr lets you start a trend & see if you can get others to follow, or you can join a trend that you are passionate about.  With TrendStartr, you have a platform to become an influencer in topics that you are interested in, and gain fans who want to follow your story.
 

 

Some Features Planned
 

Send us a message and tell us what features you want to see and would be interested in!  YUP you are all part of this movement! 

Ready To Make A Difference? 

With your help, we can build a web/mobile platform that gives anyone that has a voice, a cause, a story, or talents........... to truly have a chance to share and be discovered by people around the world.    Let it be the first platform that lets you Share. Discover. & Be Discovered. 


Be A TrendStartr (www.TrendStartr.com)


The Only Platform Where Sharing Has Unlimited Possibilities



Thank You From Your Friends,


TrendStartr Team

story:
Much like DUEX, TRIO and TRIO Pro are easy to use with a design that simply magnetizes to the back of any laptop as a solution for the working professionals, gamers, stock traders, entrepreneurs, coders, and students just like you - always on the go.

 

TRIO is an upgraded plug-and-play* solution for a multiple monitor setup while you’re on the go. 

You can opt for a dual screen to the left or right of your laptop monitor, or clip two TRIOs together for a triple screen viewing experience. The possibilities are endless. 

*Driver installation is required

TRIO provides a full 270° rotation, so you can choose your optimum viewing angle for any situation. When using two TRIO’s, rotate them 180° to fold them into a triangle for presentation mode.

Lighter than its predecessor, TRIO has a more compact design for the increased ease and mobility you need to move from workspace to workspace.

 

Simply plug* TRIO into your laptop, and you’re ready to boost your productivity by up to 50%. To make it even easier, TRIO uses only one cable for both power and data.

TRIO is compatible with any Mac, Linux, Chrome and Android device via USB connection.

*Driver installation is required.

 

TRIO’s new geometric patterned design allows you to show off a little more personality, while its 1080p high-resolution display comes with an all-new adjustable brightness, so everything you see is crisp and clear. Plus, it’s designed to reduce battery drain from your laptop.

 

 

While working at Amazon, Mobile Pixels’ co-founder, Jack, was constantly frustrated by the lack of a secondary monitor that could help him work more efficiently. Feeling strangely nostalgic about the work monitor he used at his previous job, he decided to build a laptop monitor from a broken laptop. Soon, everyone in the office wanted one, and our product, DUEX, was born!

DUEX launched on Kickstarter in June 2018 and almost immediately went viral, raising over $1 million on Kickstarter and Indiegogo combined. Since DUEX’s launch, our team has been listening to user feedback and learning from the Kickstarter experience. 

You asked for changes, so we’re giving them to you! We know you’ll love the all new upgraded TRIO.

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make TRIO a reality. We couldn’t do this without you!

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order TRIO, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! 

 

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

story:
We know, everybody has been there.

When I was in High school, I was madly in love with a girl. I never asked her out, and too scared to make a move, the closest I got to her was learning math with her one afternoon.

It wasn't for another few years that I found out that on exactly that day, she told her best friends she really hoped I would kiss her that afternoon. Apparently it was too late, and neither of us read the signs right that the other subtlety hinted.

I cannot say that this story haunted me until now, but I have to say I kept thinking of it quite a bit.

How often do we actually meet a person in real life, like them, but are either too scared to tell them about your feelings, or its just not appropriate to do so. Would you like to walk into an office every day after being turned down? But what if you where missing out on "the one" by not doing anything.

Thats why we created sumtu.

sumtu was made to battle peoples two biggest fears.

So, what would that be? Thats what we figured out:

  • Fear of rejection. Nobody wants to be rejected. If you really care about another person, there is nothing worse than a "no". Well, there is. A "hell no" would be worse. ;)
  • Fear to be alone. How many people actually ENJOY being alone. And we are not talking about the occasional alone walk in the park. We are talking ALONE.
How often did we not talk to that girl at the bar, the guy on the train, plane, your coworkers? Way too often. 

    But is sumtu not just another dating app?

    Its quite the contrary. For years and years there had not been real innovation in the online dating market. How are current dating apps different than old school newspaper ads? You are presented with a bunch of strangers that might or might not match your needs. And who tells you that the hot 20 year old blond chick with this amazing profile is not a 60 year old, overweight bold guy making fun of you?
    With sumtu - you only match people you either know, or who you have seen face to face. No more surprises. And the other one doesnt find out - until they match you too

      How can you match another person?

      There are two ways of matching someone.

      1. Match someone you know. That can be by phone number, email, facebook account name, twitter name, linkedin, or other parameters.
      2. Match someone you just met. We use GPS and iBeacon to determine people using sumtu around you. You can also add your flight details for someone on the same airplane, an event you visited, you even can match someone by car license plate that you´ve seen at the traffic light.

        What do we need the money for?

        We already invested 80.000USD from our own money. So far iOS is rolled out, Android to come within the next few days. So here is what we do with your money:
        • Roll out version 2.0 with a simplified sign up process to increase signups.
        • Add another, still secret, function that will be mind blowing. (Based on current app user feedback).
        • Ramp up marketing to get more users.
        • Pay for servers, recurrent costs.

        Sounds awesome, but I cannot afford to chip in.

        While we of course need every penny to take that to the next level, there is a lot you can actually do to help us.

        • download sumtu, register, spread the word. sumtu will only be successful if enough people use it.
        • tell others about our indiegogo campaign. If you cannot donate, maybe a friend can.
        • share this campaign on your facebook, twitter, in your blog. This will be a real help.
