Download and print these PDF’s:A4 page size | Letter page size

story:
It’s undeniable that we love traveling. All the new sights to see, people to meet and experience to have. It’s our retreat from our busy lives and, if it’s a rewarding trip, our little paradise. Many love to travel in groups, be it friends or families, and just let loose and have a good time together. Yet, there are also those who choose to travel on their own. But with fear of the unknown, the thought of being on their own in a foreign land may be intimidating to some. 

We understand the struggles that go into this and that’s why we came up with Alfred. A travel device that will be your future travel companion.   

 

 

First thing first, having a constant functional internet is undeniably a big plus while travelling. Alfred not only is capable of generating a strong internet, it does so in the most affordable prices possible. Compared to other services, which charge for around USD10 per day, Alfred offers prices as low as USD0.2 per day for selected countries. Even at its most pricey option, the internet will be available at a mere USD1.1 per day. Our plans cover 80+ countries, so now you will be able to enjoy that beautiful scenery and post that Instagram story simultaneously at a low price anywhere! 

 

For more details on the prices, click here. 

You’ll be able to connect with friends and families while you’re away and upload those enticing food photos and breathtaking scenery shots to your social media accounts while being on the spot! And if there’s more people in your trip, Alfred’s hotspot supports multiple connections as well. A high-connectivity mobile hotspot and it’s all your own.

 

Having a solid, actionable plan can make for a smooth, easy and even memorable trip. Yet, it’s often mundane and troublesome to crawl through guidebooks after guidebooks to decide on what to do. It’s even harder when you’re planning on your own. As a travel companion, one of the main features of Alfred is the itinerary function. it will show you a map of recommended tourist spots for you to quickly plan your own day trip. Whenever you’re fussing over what to do or where to go, Alfred will be able to give you a few pointers to get you started. 

 

To help make the process much smoother, Alfred also has a map filled with markers of renowned tourist attractions. Perfect for people who want to know as much as possible before leaving for the day or those adventurous individuals who enjoy spontaneity. With the map, you’ll be able to see all the tourist attractions that are currently around the area you’re in. 

It’s also handy as quick reference in case you wander around too much and got lost among the streets and people. And when you’re feeling peckish, the map also offers locations of restaurants nearby to satisfy that appetite and quench that thirst!   

For people with a zest for learning about the history of places, don’t you worry, Alfred does more than gives you a nice start to your trip. With Alfred, you’re able to learn about the tourist spot you plan to visit while wandering around on the spot! How? With its huge database on tourist spots all over the world, Alfred is able to provide audio tracks containing information and facts about the place. 

 

You are able to pair a bluetooth earphone(s) of your choice or our complimentary one while using the audio guide feature and even during translation! With a built-in high-sensitive mic, our complimentary wireless earphones makes the process of speech translation even more natural and smoother than when done with the device.  

What really makes Alfred shine though, is its efficient translation system. Alfred is capable of translating 108 languages, including accents and dialects. It’s connected to 8 well-known and powerful databases, such as Google, Baidu and Microsoft. 

As each of these databases has their own advantages in terms of accuracy and amount of phrases, Alfred automatically switches between them to produce optimized results. This will ensure that no matter the language Alfred picks up, it will navigate to the right database and pulls up the best translation and audio possible. Furthermore, Alfred also utilizes the AI voice-recognition software of related leading technology companies such as Nuance and iFlytek.

This ensures that no matter how accented the voice is, Alfred will be able to pick up and understand what was being said with a high accuracy. Prepare to break down those communication barriers with Alfred and the days of language miscommunication and misunderstanding is now in the past.

To add to that, Alfred also offers image translation*. So for languages foreign to you, not only will you be able to hear and understand, you’ll also be able to see and comprehend. 

 

Use it to understand road signs, restaurant menus, price descriptions, ticket purchase instructions and any other struggles that may surface due to language barriers. And for people with the courage and will, image translation can help you understand product descriptions, fascinating posters, interesting street signs and more! Ever been inside a restaurant and you can't even understand a word on the menu, so you ordered randomly and ended up with something that you don't enjoy? Discover the joy of gradually understanding an unfamiliar world with the help of Alfred! 

 

Alfred has all the features packed in one place, so it’s easier and more convenient to operate

While traditional phones use directional near field reception for sound input, Alfred uses a far-field voice pickup system for better reception in translation-required scenarios

Your personal mobile phone contains all your private information and messages, so it is relatively inconvenient when doing speech translation. In this case, Alfred will be better suited for this task.

Most translation apps have their own respective local servers, which has their own advantages and disadvantages. On the other hand, Alfred combines and utilizes renowned servers all at once to achieve the optimal translation result.

  • Alfred supports accurate translation of 108 languages
  • With global reception service, Alfred will be usable anywhere
  • With CloudSIM technology, Alfred is capable of global roaming

 

As Alfred will be with you all the time, you may want to take that extra caution to keep it safe and sound from scratches and bumps. With this silicon shock-resistance shell, you can prevent any accidental damages to Alfred and keep it safe from harm’s way. This strong protective case is available at USD9 as an add-on and it will be one worth considering.

For people who pursues audio clarity and quality, this add-on is for you. 

  • Bluetooth 5.0
  • 45H Battery Life
  • IPX7 Water Resistant
  • Touch Control
  • Auto-connect
  • Support iOS/Android/Windows
  • 3500mAh charging case

As a token of appreciation to our backers, simply add USD39 to your pledge to claim them.

We are a team of engineers, developers and designers, our founder Billy has over 20 years of experience in building consumer electronics. Just like everyone, we love to travel, but there are so many things that could ruin the journey, that’s why we came up with an idea to solve all those problems with one device, and that’s how Alfred was born.

Components of Alfred

Manufacturing Planning

Audio Guide: 

 Wifi Hotspot:

 

 Audio Translation:

 Image Translation:

 

Risks and challenges

Regarding this product, there is a fear of market saturation as there is a variety of translators available online. Even though Alfred is technically not classified as a translator, it is undeniable that its potential will be overshadowed because of these other products. Also, translation and travelling apps are readily available worldwide, so this accessibility exerts an immense pressure on this project. 
Yet, after all that, we believe in Alfred’s potential. For translation, its ability to integrate various translation servers provide an edge in terms of efficiency and accuracy over conventional translation methods. And for travelling, its combined audio guide, map and hotspot function makes for a smooth and enjoyable travel experience. All without the worry of risking personal privacy and all done with one device.

story:
Why the MILK App Was Created

With relationships breaking apart, families no longer conversing, experiences being missed and distracted driving wrecks on the rise...we decided to create an app that encourages users to Milk the Moment instead of Miss the Moment.  Through the power of incentives, the MILK App will encourage users to be more present, considerate, intimate, focused and safe.

Why We Need Your Help

In the tech industry, investors like to see how much money you can raise on your own before they get involved in the funding process.  This shows them that people support your product and your mission.  We've developed the beta version of the app with our own money, but in order to add more features, create the final product and deliver it to the public - we really need your help! 

 

How Does It Work?

Free Version of the App:

  • You first must enter into one of our MILK Zones which are geo-fenced hot spots where the app can be activated.
  • You set the timer, press start and lock your phone.
  • The app will begin to accrue points every minute that the phone is not in use
  • Once you have enough points, you can redeem them inside the app for Cash and Gift Cards.  *Gift card choices and features are limited for the free version.

Premium Version of the App:

  • For a premium fee you can Milk the Moment pretty much anywhere you want such as your house, office, vacation rental, favorite cafe, the park, library etc
  • You also have access to our Sponsored Zones which are establishments where you can redeem your points right after your experience. For example, a sponsored restaurant zone may immediately award you with a half off appetizer, $3 discount or a free dessert just for Milking the Moment!
  • Lastly, you are eligible to be selected as a lucky Sweepstakes Winner or Instant Winner.  These are ultimate rewards that are sent through the app to random users.  *Over 25 Gift card choices and unlimited features in the premium version.                          

Upcoming Features

MILK CHALLENGE

  • This feature allows you to challenge your friends to a game of MILK to see who can refrain from using their phone for the longest amount of time while at a social gathering.  The winner will receive special badges, trophies and bonus points.

MILK MEMORIES

  • This a feature allows you to take one quick photo or video inside the app and it launches a countdown to encourage you to hurry back so you can continue milking the moment.

Instant Winner

  • After you're done milking the moment, you may just be the winner of something HUGE!  Every now and then our sponsors will award one lucky user with anything from a free meal to backstage passes.

Impact

Even though the MILK App is currently only available for testing purposes, it is already making an impact around the world.

 

Team

Our team is small but mighty.  The complicated decisions, coding and branding strategies are all made possible because of how well we work together, support each other and celebrate one another.

 

News and Media

Major Magazines, News Papers, Blogs and News Stations are already showing their support for the MILK app.

See the App in Action

 
 

MILK Rewards

There's tons of reward options in the MILK App.  You can redeem your points for gift cards, cash and more!

Current Promotion

Your family can enjoy a Domino's Pizza Dinner on us - once a month for an entire year!  Refer as many friends as possible, because if one of your referrals is a winner: YOU'RE AUTOMATICALLY A WINNER TOO!!!  The MILK App is eager to bring back real life interactions amongst families and friends without the interruption of smartphones.  And what better place to start than at the dinner table.  All you have to do is download the app when we launch and promise to Milk The Moment! Click Here to sign up!  To strengthen your chances of winning, purchase one of our perks!  They all come with extra entries into the Free Pizza Sweepstakes.

 

MILK Can Help Your Business

While MILK is a fun app for users who are trying to kick their pesky cell phone habits its also an amazing marketing tool for businesses.  Become a sponsor of the MILK App or an advertiser and showcase your brand to our MILK users locally or nationwide.

  • Create Banner Ads
  • Full Screen Pop Ups
  • Proximity Marketing Campaigns
  • In-App Messages
  • One time Offers
  • Retargeting Campaigns
  • And Much More!

Our sponsorship opportunities work great for restaurants, entertainment venues, performing artists and event promoters.  While our advertising opportunities are endless.

 

 

Sponsorship Examples

Advertisement Examples

Perk Giveaways

For making a contribution towards our campaign, here are the items you can receive in return.  Receiving these items depends on the Perk Package you select below.

 

Select Your Perk

 

Referral Program

Refer your friends to our Indiegogo Campaign and you could receive your Perks Package before anyone else.  We ship and deliver our perks in the order they are purchased.  Skip ahead of the line when you refer the most friends to our page!! 
 

FAQ's

Is MILK available for Android and iOS?

MILK will only be available for iOS in the Spring...however the Android version will be released later this summer.  So by the time most of you receive your perks, the app will be available in the Google Play Store as well.

What are considered "milk zones" and what if I can't find any near me in order to use the app?

Milk Zones are establishments such as movie theaters, restaurants and entertainment venues.  If you don't see any near you, contact us!  You may live in a small town or just right outside the radius of our technology where the app is having trouble picking up nearby zones.  Give us your zip code and we can fix that issues in seconds.

Is there no limit to how many points I can collect in one setting?

Yes. Depending on what app version you have, your location and other factors--you will be allowed to Milk The Moment between 30 minutes to 4 hours in one setting.  There are also daily limits set in place just to keep things fair.

What happens if I'm Milking the Moment and decide to use my phone anyway?

Any time you pause or step away from the app while Milking the Moment, you lose points.  If you deactivate the app completely before your time is up or step away from the app and never return, you'll have to wait for quite some time before you can Milk the Moment again.  We had to place some consequences in the app or it defeats the purposes if everyone can just continue to use their phones as usual.  When there's a consequence, it helps the user think twice about interrupting their experience and makes it easier to rack up on points.

Why should I upgrade to the Premium Version of the app once it's released?

The Premium version of the app allows you to activate the app almost anywhere you like such as: your home, office, vacation rental, favorite park, the library and more.  This makes it more convenient and easy to collect points.  The Premium version also gives you the option to redeem your points while you're at an establishment that is considered a Sponsored Zone.  So for example, let's say you walk into a Sponsored Restaurant Zone.  You may be able to use your points to get half off on your appetizer, a $3 discount on your bill or a free dessert - right then and there.! Since we are just starting out, we will inform you that there won't be many Sponsored Zones in the beginning but they are definitely on the way.  Lastly, the premium version makes you eligible for sweepstakes and instant win games.  You could literally just get done with Milking the Moment and receive a message in the app that you've just won something HUGE!

Can you use the MILK App in the car?  What about with your GPS?

Next on the agenda is the car version of the MILK App.  We will start the development process on this very soon and once its done, you will be able to upgrade to the car version via the app.  As far as using your GPS, that is totally possible. Before you activate MILK, open your GPS,  setup your address and make sure the app has the voice directions on. Open the MILK App, activate it and lock your phone and begin to drive.  That's it!  Almost all GPS apps have a voice option and even shows you visual directions as the phone is in lock mode, so the MILK App works fine!

What if I want to make a contribution, but I don't want anything in return?

This works for us!  All you have to do is click the BACK IT button.  It will ask you if you want to purchase a Perk Pack or if you only want to make a contribution and get nothing in return.  We appreciate you for your donation.  It means a lot!

When should I expect my perk pack to be completed or delivered?

Some things can be completed very soon such as the social media shout outs, thank you notes and sweepstakes entries.  However, other things that are related to the app must wait until after you've downloaded it and created an account.  Other tangible items take a long time to manufacture, process, ship and reach their destination so just to be safe, we are giving ourselves until mid to late Summer to deliver.  It could be much earlier.

Can I make customized or special requests for my perks pack such as color change, unique size, etc?

We understand that you may want things in a specific size, color or build.  We will try accommodating these requests, but do know there's a possibility that these requests may be difficult to fulfill. For example, most of the cell phone cases are for smartphone models 8 and up. It may be impossible to get a case from our specific manufacturer that fits older smartphones.  We advise that you find a close family member or friend to give your perk to as a gift, just incase this happens.

Im interested in one of your business perks.  Does my business have to be a MILK Zone?

No. You can have any type of business, project, venture or announcement showcased in our app.  The artwork and content will have to be approved.  It must be high quality, non-offensive and in good taste.

How are the gift cards delivered?

If you select a perk pack that has a gift card option included, this gift card will be sent to you in a digital form via your email address.  You can print it or show your phone to a staff member.

How does the Free Pizza 4 a Year Sweepstakes work?

1-2 names will be pulled and those winners will begin to receive a Dominoes Gift card on every last Friday of the month for an entire year.  The gift card will be sent digitally via email.

Risks and Challenges

Every startup company comes with challenges and we aren't afraid to share ours with others.  You may have great ideas and solutions for us. So we're all ears! Please feel free to send us feedback.

  1. Chicken or the Egg Dilemma:  Our biggest challenge is being stuck in the situation where investors, partners and sponsors aren't in a rush to get involved, until they see how many downloads the app has had, how many users are active on a daily basis and at what rate the app is growing.  However, in order to advertise the app, keep users active and grow the company we need investors and partners in place.  So which comes first?  The Chicken or the Egg?  The Users or the Investors/Partners? This is a very common problem for startups and we are constantly trying to create new ways to get around this dilemma and this is one of the reasons we've launched an Indiegogo Campaign.
  2. Bootstrapping:  This term means to find creative ways to fund your startup without investors, rather that be: working a 9-5, using your savings, asking friends and family, taking out a loan or using the sales from your product to go right back into your company expenses.  The great thing about Bootstrapping is - you own majority of your company.  The bad thing is - you run the risk of depleting all the funds that you have in a very short amount of time.  We are currently bootstrapping so this risk haunts us every day.
  3. Small Team:  With the MILK app still being in development and not fully launched, our team has been able to conquer any task.  However, now that we are getting closer and closer to launching the app to the public, we run the risk of being overwhelmed with requests, administrative duties, marketing campaigns, design work and sales tasks.  We are currently looking into temporary staff hires and interns.

The Future of MILK

We have so many plans for the future and we are excited about each and every one of them.  Though we can't share all of them at this time, we have two plans where your feedback is needed.

  • We have been discussing the topic of creating a backend dashboard in the future where regular MILK users can "sponsor" their own zones.  Meaning, people who use the app in your home or any other private address can redeem their points for whatever rewards YOU have placed in your dashboard.  For example, maybe you would like to reward your kids more allowance, a trip to Disney or a later curfew when they do great a great job at Milking the Moment?
  • There's been requests that other digital items are placed in the app as rewards such as mp3's and ebooks.  We will continue to discuss what other rewards our users may want to see inside the MILK App.  Right now, we are currently looking into adding tangible products that could be provided by sponsors.

Thank You And Please Share!

From the bottom of our hearts, Thank You!  If you visited our campaign page, contributed to our startup, asked questions, sent feedback or referred a friend...we appreciate you.  It means more than you know.  Please visit our site for updates on the MILK App and don't hesitate to contact us for any reason. Before you leave our campaign page, PLEASE, PLEASE be sure to share our campaign to your social media pages.  It helps us get the word out twice as fast. Thanks again!

-The MILK Team

 "Be rewarded, For Being Present."

Perk Giveaways

For making a contribution towards our campaign, here are the items you can receive in return.  Receiving these items depends on the Perk Package you select below.








 
Select Your Perk












 
Referral Program

Refer your friends to our Indiegogo Campaign and you could receive your Perks Package before anyone else.  We ship and deliver our perks in the order they are purchased.  Skip ahead of the line when you refer the most friends to our page!! 

 
FAQ's

Is MILK available for Android and iOS?
MILK will only be available for iOS in the Spring...however the Android version will be released later this summer.  So by the time most of you receive your perks, the app will be available in the Google Play Store as well.
What are considered "milk zones" and what if I can't find any near me in order to use the app?
Milk Zones are establishments such as movie theaters, restaurants and entertainment venues.  If you don't see any near you, contact us!  You may live in a small town or just right outside the radius of our technology where the app is having trouble picking up nearby zones.  Give us your zip code and we can fix that issues in seconds.
Is there no limit to how many points I can collect in one setting?
Yes. Depending on what app version you have, your location and other factors--you will be allowed to Milk The Moment between 30 minutes to 4 hours in one setting.  There are also daily limits set in place just to keep things fair.
What happens if I'm Milking the Moment and decide to use my phone anyway?
Any time you pause or step away from the app while Milking the Moment, you lose points.  If you deactivate the app completely before your time is up or step away from the app and never return, you'll have to wait for quite some time before you can Milk the Moment again.  We had to place some consequences in the app or it defeats the purposes if everyone can just continue to use their phones as usual.  When there's a consequence, it helps the user think twice about interrupting their experience and makes it easier to rack up on points.
Why should I upgrade to the Premium Version of the app once it's released?
The Premium version of the app allows you to activate the app almost anywhere you like such as: your home, office, vacation rental, favorite park, the library and more.  This makes it more convenient and easy to collect points.  The Premium version also gives you the option to redeem your points while you're at an establishment that is considered a Sponsored Zone.  So for example, let's say you walk into a Sponsored Restaurant Zone.  You may be able to use your points to get half off on your appetizer, a $3 discount on your bill or a free dessert - right then and there.! Since we are just starting out, we will inform you that there won't be many Sponsored Zones in the beginning but they are definitely on the way.  Lastly, the premium version makes you eligible for sweepstakes and instant win games.  You could literally just get done with Milking the Moment and receive a message in the app that you've just won something HUGE!
Can you use the MILK App in the car?  What about with your GPS?
Next on the agenda is the car version of the MILK App.  We will start the development process on this very soon and once its done, you will be able to upgrade to the car version via the app.  As far as using your GPS, that is totally possible. Before you activate MILK, open your GPS,  setup your address and make sure the app has the voice directions on. Open the MILK App, activate it and lock your phone and begin to drive.  That's it!  Almost all GPS apps have a voice option and even shows you visual directions as the phone is in lock mode, so the MILK App works fine!
What if I want to make a contribution, but I don't want anything in return?
This works for us!  All you have to do is click the BACK IT button.  It will ask you if you want to purchase a Perk Pack or if you only want to make a contribution and get nothing in return.  We appreciate you for your donation.  It means a lot!
When should I expect my perk pack to be completed or delivered?
Some things can be completed very soon such as the social media shout outs, thank you notes and sweepstakes entries.  However, other things that are related to the app must wait until after you've downloaded it and created an account.  Other tangible items take a long time to manufacture, process, ship and reach their destination so just to be safe, we are giving ourselves until mid to late Summer to deliver.  It could be much earlier.
Can I make customized or special requests for my perks pack such as color change, unique size, etc?
We understand that you may want things in a specific size, color or build.  We will try accommodating these requests, but do know there's a possibility that these requests may be difficult to fulfill. For example, most of the cell phone cases are for smartphone models 8 and up. It may be impossible to get a case from our specific manufacturer that fits older smartphones.  We advise that you find a close family member or friend to give your perk to as a gift, just incase this happens.
Im interested in one of your business perks.  Does my business have to be a MILK Zone?
No. You can have any type of business, project, venture or announcement showcased in our app.  The artwork and content will have to be approved.  It must be high quality, non-offensive and in good taste.
How are the gift cards delivered?
If you select a perk pack that has a gift card option included, this gift card will be sent to you in a digital form via your email address.  You can print it or show your phone to a staff member.
How does the Free Pizza 4 a Year Sweepstakes work?
1-2 names will be pulled and those winners will begin to receive a Dominoes Gift card on every last Friday of the month for an entire year.  The gift card will be sent digitally via email.
Risks and Challenges

Every startup company comes with challenges and we aren't afraid to share ours with others.  You may have great ideas and solutions for us. So we're all ears! Please feel free to send us feedback.


Chicken or the Egg Dilemma:  Our biggest challenge is being stuck in the situation where investors, partners and sponsors aren't in a rush to get involved, until they see how many downloads the app has had, how many users are active on a daily basis and at what rate the app is growing.  However, in order to advertise the app, keep users active and grow the company we need investors and partners in place.  So which comes first?  The Chicken or the Egg?  The Users or the Investors/Partners? This is a very common problem for startups and we are constantly trying to create new ways to get around this dilemma and this is one of the reasons we've launched an Indiegogo Campaign.

Bootstrapping:  This term means to find creative ways to fund your startup without investors, rather that be: working a 9-5, using your savings, asking friends and family, taking out a loan or using the sales from your product to go right back into your company expenses.  The great thing about Bootstrapping is - you own majority of your company.  The bad thing is - you run the risk of depleting all the funds that you have in a very short amount of time.  We are currently bootstrapping so this risk haunts us every day.

Small Team:  With the MILK app still being in development and not fully launched, our team has been able to conquer any task.  However, now that we are getting closer and closer to launching the app to the public, we run the risk of being overwhelmed with requests, administrative duties, marketing campaigns, design work and sales tasks.  We are currently looking into temporary staff hires and interns.

The Future of MILK

We have so many plans for the future and we are excited about each and every one of them.  Though we can't share all of them at this time, we have two plans where your feedback is needed.

We have been discussing the topic of creating a backend dashboard in the future where regular MILK users can "sponsor" their own zones.  Meaning, people who use the app in your home or any other private address can redeem their points for whatever rewards YOU have placed in your dashboard.  For example, maybe you would like to reward your kids more allowance, a trip to Disney or a later curfew when they do great a great job at Milking the Moment?
There's been requests that other digital items are placed in the app as rewards such as mp3's and ebooks.  We will continue to discuss what other rewards our users may want to see inside the MILK App.  Right now, we are currently looking into adding tangible products that could be provided by sponsors.

Thank You And Please Share!

From the bottom of our hearts, Thank You!  If you visited our campaign page, contributed to our startup, asked questions, sent feedback or referred a friend...we appreciate you.  It means more than you know.  Please visit our site for updates on the MILK App and don't hesitate to contact us for any reason. Before you leave our campaign page, PLEASE, PLEASE be sure to share our campaign to your social media pages.  It helps us get the word out twice as fast. Thanks again!
-The MILK Team
 "Be rewarded, For Being Present."

story:
IMAGINE . BUILD . SHARE

 communicate and engage, collaborate with ease in 3D, in AR and in 3D printing! ...because understanding & messaging the needs of multiple intelligences require multiple tools...we saw an all-in-one tool was needed..

THAT IS 3D CLICK!

THE WORLD'S FIRST ONLINE TOOL TO EASILY CREATE & SHARE

3D INTERACTIVE MANUALS & PRESENTATIONS WITH AR AND 3D PRINTING CAPABILITIES

3D Click is a disruptive web platform with the sole purpose to easily and intuitively create, acquire, share and discover Multimedia & 3D content.  3D Click is simple to use and enables in-house teams to create their own professional and impressive presentations and manuals at affordable cost with awesome benefits,  such as inclusion & collaboration, better & more accurate insight to products and improved messaging to stakeholders.

Our mission is to empower people to communicate complex ideas in simple ways and to enhance learning & collaboration through: Visualization, 3D and Multimedia content, Online Collaboration / Innovation, Prototyping (3D Printing) and Augmented Reality (AR)

 

FEATURES

---------

MYCLICKS
HOST AND FILE YOUR MULTIMEDIA & 3D FILES
Have you ever wanted to archive  your multimedia files and 3D files online?
Now you can!.., with 3D Click


3D BUILDER

CREATE YOUR MANUAL OR PRESENTATION IN 2D & 3D

Build your Instruction Manual or Presentation in a 3D Environment as if it were a simple powerpoint

Add all the multimedia files you need (image, audio, video, text)

Add as many 3D models as you need

Give permissions to your teammates to co-edit the project 

Easily ANIMATE your 3D models DIRECTLY on 3D Click,

as in the following example:



MARKETPLACE
GET THE 3D MODELS YOU NEED

Get 3D models from your industry sector and interests

Get your optimized, tailor-made 3D models  from 3D Clickers


3D VIEWER

VIEW YOUR MANUAL or PRESENTATION IN 2D & 3D EVERYWHERE

in just one click SHARE your manual or presentation online

in just a copy& paste, EMBED it in your webpage

in just one click turn the presentation into an AUGMENTED REALITY presentation 

in just one click send to 3D PRINT  

COMMUNITY

Our aim is to  foster 3D CLICKERS to:

Become  content contributors
Become  affiliate partners
Sell their 3D models to a target audience 
Create tailor-made 3d models for the customers of 3D Click
Follow the 3D Clickers they like and to let others follow them
Upload their Mulitmedia Files and archive them in 3D Click ( images, audio, 3D files)
Collaborate with their customers by co-editing their presentations or
sending them the project  to print in 3D


3D CLICK IS DESIGNED FOR

Innovation leaders, Learning and Communication specialists such as:
  • Educational Publishers / Publishers of e-learning platforms
  • E-Learning content developers
  • Teaching Staff & Students (in companies, in universities or schools)
  • Product designers & manufacturers
  • Innovation leaders in product-oriented companies
  • Professionals in healthcare education

CASE STUDY 01

Nico is a great designer and a Star Wars freak. He wants to share with all the community, his printable emulation of the Destruction of Death Star..., He designed the lamp, dropped it  into his 3D Click beta account and built up a really simple animation; Then he added some music, some images and annotations to explain how to fix the lamp at home...and that's it! In less than 10 min Nico had the presentation done with an animated 3D view, an AR presentation and the option to let customers directly send the lamp to print in 3D . All this in just 10 minutes!


CASE STUDY 02

This is John the Marketing Head of a well-known Manufacturing Company. He wants to attend an International Trade Fair to demonstrate his products to a growing market segment. But the logistical costs to get there are prohibitively high, and his products are too big for the standard booth dimensions. 
But John is determined … watch what he does to attend & attract new customers at the Trade Fair. -

Click on the Video and see how 3D Click makes the unimaginable real!


TIMELINE


TEAM

The founders, Javier Rial and Débora Alasraki, saw the need for 3D Click  and started working on it already in 2014. Since then, we have built a team with impressive expertise and entrepreneurial drive. Luis, Algirdas, Kévin and Annie  have been designing & developing web platforms, creating software, building interactive and 3D content and consulting in-house in the learning and knowledge management sectors for years.  Our team members bring over 75 years of combined experience to 3D Click! 
Prior to 3D Click, Javier (web designer & BA) worked for different international companies and Débora (architect & MBA) was co-founder and managing partner of her own company creating a range of products - all of them related to visualizing complex things to help decision making (www.urbanmedia3d.com) and build corporate branding & communication for public and private institutions (www.somosurban.com) . Now we have all came together in http://3dclick.click
to let our customers themselves visualize complex things easily, and to make interactive 3D/AR content accessible to enhance communication & collaboration!

PERKS


AFTER INDIEGOGO

Your contribution will make the difference! 

We want 3D Click to be as stable as a stone and as flexible as a bamboo and that's why we need your contribution! 

Over the next 4 months we will work on the stability of the platform and the tool, as well as on the fine tuning of the UX experience and we will add the possibility to download presentations as a video. We will put customer management systems in place, as well as establish intellectual property rights,  and we will develop all kinds of tutorials to enhance even more the easy to use platform. Our main target is to fulfill all perks on time and with the best functionality !

We will also focus on developing relevant content for you and  publish it every fifteen days on the blog and, at the same time , to attract the best 3D modelers to match our customer's needs and build a win-win community.

story:
Good day!

My name is Jacek, I’m most thankful for visiting our Indiegogo campaign.

Not interested in drones? Please support our project with 1$, thank you!

LGE stands for Liquid Gravity Engine. 




Do you like drones? Well we’ve got news for you. LGE takes drones flying to all new level of fun.


The engine is installed inside a waterproof body, there are no moving parts or propellers on the outside. It’s a flying waterproof sphere, not affected by wind* or any kind of weather, fly it in air and feel free to dive underwater* anytime.


There’s a camera eye and connectors on the bottom, beside this… the body is solid, you can paint it or dress it. You can be piloting a disco-ball, a death star, a gigantic eyeball…. Whatever you’re in to. Oh and another thing, flying propeller drones is fun, but flying an LGE is a completely new thing, it’s more like commanding an object to move around space, rather than fighting air to keep up.
* Details in specification.

LGE Drone 1: First drone using LGE engine. Sphere shape, no outside propellers or moving parts.
All weather proof / not affected by wind (up to 6 points bs). Waterproof /can dive up to 1,8 m (5 ft). Bump-proof soft leather-like coating.

Drone equipment:

Live streaming video quality: 720p
Levitate / flight time: 30 - 40 minutes
Max speed: 60 km/h (37 mph)
Max altitude: 122 m as per FAA regulation, user adjustable (400 ft)
Communication: Secure WiFi network, 2.4 GHz
Weight: 1,5 Kg (3.3 lbs) (With dock weight included). Dimensions: Diam 25 cm (10 inch)
Battery charge time: 50 - 65 minutes (6000 mAh version)
Control app requirements: iOS 8.0 or later / Android 4.3 or later
Drone equipment:
- 1 wide angle camera unit 720p
- Ultra-white LED torch
- Bottom docking bay with 2 radio sensors
Also in package:
- Dock with radio sensors
- AC Dock charger 110 / 230 V
- Receiver (no internal storage / SD card expandable)
- AC Receiver charger 110 / 230 V
- Control unit with micro USB mobile phone connector
- Software (Flashdrive or provided download link) + instruction
Before you ask…
- The length of stored recording depends on SD card capability and video settings
- The drone is water / all-weather / wind (up to 6 points) proof
- The dock and charger are not waterproof
- This drone can operate in temperature: from -15 to 45 deg. Celsius / from 5 to 113 deg. Fahrenheit.
- In case of air temperature below -5 C / 23 F docking / charging should take place in place with higher temperature
- In case of air temperature above 30 C /  86 F the dock should be placed / charging take place in shadowed area.
- Drone equipped with a 1/4 inch screw mount bay.*
- Drone is capable of lifting external weight of 0,8 KG (1.7 lbs)*
* In case equipment is installed through mount bay, auto-docking and manual docking is unavailable.

LGE Security Drone description:
Security drone equipped with 3 wide angle cameras (night vision included) and one bottom torch (24 super-white LED).
The drone can be programmed to fly around property (follow programmed path) and stream live video to receiver, once batteries reach 15%, drone automatically returns to dock to charge up. Once battery recharges, drone resumes to follow programmed path. Drone can be programmed to  automatically start programmed patrol on particular weekdays and hours. In case the drone meets any problems (interception, lack of communication) the dock / receiver sounds an alarm.

Drone equipment:
- 3 wide angle camera units 720p with night vision
- 24 LED torch
- Bottom docking bay with 2 radio sensors
Also in package:
- Dock with radio sensors
- AC Dock charger 110 /230 V
- Receiver (no internal storage / SD card expandable)
- AC Receiver charger 110 /230 V
- Control unit with micro USB mobile phone connector
- Software (Flashdrive or download link) and instruction
Before you ask…
- It is easy to set / update drone’s patrol patch and time, thanks to “step by step” instruction and software wizard
- The length of stored patrol recording depends on SD card capability and video settings
- The drone can be operated manually anytime (controlled with the included control unit), without cancelling patrol memory.
- The drone is water / all-weather / wind (up to 6 points) proof
- The dock and charger are not waterproof
- This drone can operate in temperature: from -15 to 45 deg. Celsius / from 5 to 113 deg. Fahrenheit.
In case of air temperature below -5 C / 23 F docking / charging should take place in place with higher temperature
In case of air temperature above 30 C /  86 F the dock should be placed / charging take place in shadowed area.


LGE Show Drone description:
Drone for carrying advertisements, it is not equipped with camera or torch.
The drone can be programed to follow programmed path (for example fly in front of a store), once batteries reach 15%, drone automatically returns to dock to charge up. Once battery recharges, drone resumes to follow programmed path. Drone can be programmed to  automatically start programmed path on particular weekdays and hours. In case the drone meets any problems (interception, lack of communication) the dock / receiver sounds an alarm.
Drone equipment:
- Bottom docking bay with 2 radio sensors
Also in package:
- Dock with radio sensors
- AC Dock charger 110 /230 V
- Receiver (no internal storage)
- AC Receiver charger 110 /230 V
- Control unit with micro USB mobile phone connector
- Software (Flashdrive or download link) and instruction
Before you ask…
- It is easy to set / update drone’s fly patch and time, thanks to “step by step” instruction and software wizard
- The drone can be operated manually anytime (controlled with the included control unit), without cancelling path memory.
- The drone is water / all-weather / wind (up to 6 points) proof
- The dock and charger are not waterproof
- This drone can operate in temperature: from -25 to 55 deg. Celsius / from -13 to 131 deg. Fahrenheit.
In case of air temperature below -15 C / 5 F docking / charging should take place in place with higher temperature
In case of air temperature above 35 C /  95 F the dock should be placed / charging take place in shadowed area.


It all started back in 2012 when me and Pawel came up with and started working on this project, at first it was a chain of fails, but we didn't give up...  it took almost a year to apply corrections and almost another year to create final version the liquid capable of working correctly inside this high pressure engine. Of course both of us have work, families, kids, it was very hard to accord our everyday life with this project. 


On the 3rd of August 2015 the prototype was finally ready, it worked for 9 seconds, it stayed 2 meters above ground, caring weight of 1 KG, for 9 long seconds and... crashed (breaking also the garage door). 9 long seconds, before it broke. We have fixed it, upgraded a little and today- we hold a working unit, a result of a beautiful idea and 3 years of hard work.

We can’t stop now, at this moment our engine is still unstable, and sometimes unpredictable, due to all corrections, fixes, rebuilding, and mistakes we have made from the beginning. We have to complete the new unit, same one but made correctly from the start, with a laser precision, then once all final blueprints are ready- we are ready to order first part of LGE drones (500 - 3000 units, depending on demand). The drones project is completed, missing only final engine.

After presenting our engine at Baltic 2 Expo, we were offered founding, however in each case we would lose rights to all our work, including the patent. We decided to try raising founds ourselves. We have one investor, University of Jagiellonian Professor, who agreed to found a part of the project in return for a part of future shareholding. We are still short, we ask for your help, each dollar counts. Help us build better tomorrow.

Please support our project with 1$, thank you!


How does it work?
Long story - short: The liquid inside opposite rotating wheels produces centrifugal energy, proper distribution of liquid’s mass causes the device to maintain a constant directional pull. The most of the success lies in the liquid’s formula (patent pending), the viscosity, weight, magnetic properties etc. are a result of endless calculations, experiments and tests.


What does it mean to you?
That the whole world will change my friend! The technology opens door for completely new type of engines, one step at a time and we will have flying segways next decade . You always knew that all those levitating devices and flying cars seen in Sci-Fi movies are coming sooner or later, we’ll here’s a real chance to make it come “sooner” than “later”.


Just imagine – a completely “clean” - environmentally friendly, quiet engine that can use any energy (electricity, gas, any type of fuel) to run, sealed - not requiring any maintenance, oil refilling etc., not producing any waste or pollution, capable of working in any environment (underwater, land, air), and… what’s most important – capable of moving any direction, including up and sustaining there. The technology is baby now, but a baby with a great potential, we have the engine itself and drones coming up, but just think what will we have next years…
If you are not interested in ordering a drone, we would appreciate your support of our project: 1$ (please see perks). Thank you.


The money plan, assuming ordering 800 pcs of drones
We need money for...
USD 6 500 is required for completing engine project
USD 800 is required for patent & fees purposes
USD 240 000 is required for manufacturing 800 pcs of drone complete sets
USD 20 000 is required for shipping / duty purposes
USD 2 800 is required for documentation
USD 3 200 is required for ordering professional advertisement clips
Total: USD 273 300.
We have USD 151 000
We need founding: USD 122 300



Please support us with any amount, each dollar counts.


You can order your drone today (please see perks), to be sure that you will receive the drone upon its premiere.
Ordering drone means supporting LGE technology development, the selected drone package will be shipped to you as soon as the final product is ready. 

No additional charges for drone, equipment or it's shipping shall be charged. The provided date of shipping is estimated and can change, the price of drone is estimated, however in case the final product turns out to be more expensive, you will NOT be asked to pay more. In case all required founding is  not received, drones will be sent to those who ordered anyway, only the premiere date can change. The premiere date (drones sending) depends on technology and manufacture success.


Thank you for your interest in our campaign.

Just imagine how much can the world change once LGE engine is ready. We already proved that the engine can carry itself + additional weight of abt 800 grams, of course we would like to tell you that it will be shortly ready carry people and cargo, but it's not that easy. When it comes to propeller engines, the rule is simple - build a bigger propeller so it has more power, in case of LGE engine this does not apply, for each engine size different amount of liquid should be used, depending on this the size and amount of wheels will be different, and each size, weight & amount of wheels must be controlled with a updated control unit, gyroscope and etc. Each LGE engine is designed for a specific size / maximum weight, in case of any change- everything must be recalculated and redesigned.


Karl Johnson, from Tech-News wrote:
(...) The first device using the LGE engine will be a drone. Why a drone not a flying car? The answer is simple, for the moment the company is capable of producing an LGE engine that can lift up itself plus 1 or 2 more pounds only. (...)
Let us disagree, we are capable of producing and LGE capable of flying a car, however in this case we would need a LOT greater money for start. Let's make the drones first.p

Please support us with 1$ or share this campaign, each type of support is much appreciated. 

In case you have any questions, please feel free to write me.
Thank you. Jacek Warchol.
story_txt:
Good day!
My name is Jacek, I’m most thankful for
visiting our Indiegogo campaign.
Not interested in drones? Please support
our project with 1$, thank you!
LGE stands for Liquid Gravity
Engine. 






Do you like drones? Well we’ve got news
for you. LGE takes drones flying to all new level of fun.



The engine is installed inside a
waterproof body, there are no moving parts or propellers on the outside. It’s a flying waterproof sphere, not
affected by wind* or any kind of weather, fly it in air and feel free to dive
underwater* anytime.
There’s a camera eye and connectors on
the bottom, beside this… the body is solid, you can paint it or dress it. You can be piloting a disco-ball, a
death star, a gigantic eyeball…. Whatever you’re in to. Oh and another thing, flying propeller
drones is fun, but flying an LGE is a completely new thing, it’s more like
commanding an object to move around space, rather than fighting air to keep up.* Details in specification.
LGE Drone 1: First drone using LGE engine. Sphere
shape, no outside propellers or moving parts.All weather proof / not affected by wind
(up to 6 points bs). Waterproof /can dive up to 1,8 m (5 ft). Bump-proof soft
leather-like coating.

Drone equipment:

Live streaming video quality: 720pLevitate / flight time: 30 - 40 minutesMax speed: 60 km/h (37 mph)Max altitude: 122 m as per FAA
regulation, user adjustable (400 ft)Communication: Secure WiFi network, 2.4
GHzWeight: 1,5 Kg (3.3 lbs) (With dock
weight included). Dimensions: Diam 25 cm (10 inch)Battery charge time: 50 - 65 minutes
(6000 mAh version)Control app requirements: iOS 8.0 or
later / Android 4.3 or laterDrone equipment:- 1 wide angle camera unit 720p- Ultra-white LED torch- Bottom docking bay with 2 radio
sensorsAlso in package:- Dock with radio sensors- AC Dock charger 110 / 230 V- Receiver (no internal storage / SD
card expandable)- AC Receiver charger 110 / 230 V- Control unit with micro USB mobile
phone connector- Software (Flashdrive or provided
download link) + instruction

Before you ask…- The length of stored recording depends
on SD card capability and video settings- The drone is water / all-weather /
wind (up to 6 points) proof- The dock and charger are not
waterproof- This drone can operate in temperature:
from -15 to 45 deg. Celsius / from 5 to 113 deg. Fahrenheit.- In case of air temperature below -5 C
/ 23 F docking / charging should take place in place with higher temperature- In case of air temperature above 30 C
/  86 F the dock should be placed /
charging take place in shadowed area.- Drone equipped with a 1/4 inch screw
mount bay.*- Drone is capable of lifting external
weight of 0,8 KG (1.7 lbs)** In case equipment is installed through
mount bay, auto-docking and manual docking is unavailable.
LGE Security Drone description:Security drone equipped with 3 wide
angle cameras (night vision included) and one bottom torch (24 super-white
LED).The drone can be programmed to fly
around property (follow programmed path) and stream live video to receiver,
once batteries reach 15%, drone automatically returns to dock to charge up.
Once battery recharges, drone resumes to follow programmed path. Drone can be
programmed to  automatically start
programmed patrol on particular weekdays and hours. In case the drone meets any
problems (interception, lack of communication) the dock / receiver sounds an
alarm.

Drone equipment:- 3 wide angle camera units 720p with
night vision- 24 LED torch- Bottom docking bay with 2 radio
sensorsAlso in package:- Dock with radio sensors- AC Dock charger 110 /230 V- Receiver (no internal storage / SD
card expandable)- AC Receiver charger 110 /230 V- Control unit with micro USB mobile
phone connector- Software (Flashdrive or download link)
and instructionBefore you ask…- It is easy to set / update drone’s
patrol patch and time, thanks to “step by step” instruction and software wizard- The length of stored patrol recording
depends on SD card capability and video settings- The drone can be operated manually
anytime (controlled with the included control unit), without cancelling patrol
memory.- The drone is water / all-weather /
wind (up to 6 points) proof- The dock and charger are not
waterproof- This drone can operate in temperature:
from -15 to 45 deg. Celsius / from 5 to 113 deg. Fahrenheit.In case of air temperature below -5 C /
23 F docking / charging should take place in place with higher temperatureIn case of air temperature above 30 C /  86 F the dock should be placed / charging
take place in shadowed area.


LGE Show Drone description:Drone for carrying advertisements, it is
not equipped with camera or torch.The drone can be programed to follow
programmed path (for example fly in front of a store), once batteries reach
15%, drone automatically returns to dock to charge up. Once battery recharges,
drone resumes to follow programmed path. Drone can be programmed to  automatically start programmed path on
particular weekdays and hours. In case the drone meets any problems
(interception, lack of communication) the dock / receiver sounds an alarm.
Drone equipment:- Bottom docking bay with 2 radio
sensorsAlso in package:- Dock with radio sensors- AC Dock charger 110 /230 V- Receiver (no internal storage)- AC Receiver charger 110 /230 V- Control unit with micro USB mobile
phone connector- Software (Flashdrive or download link)
and instructionBefore you ask…- It is easy to set / update drone’s fly
patch and time, thanks to “step by step” instruction and software wizard- The drone can be operated manually
anytime (controlled with the included control unit), without cancelling path
memory.- The drone is water / all-weather /
wind (up to 6 points) proof- The dock and charger are not
waterproof- This drone can operate in temperature:
from -25 to 55 deg. Celsius / from -13 to 131 deg. Fahrenheit.In case of air temperature below -15 C /
5 F docking / charging should take place in place with higher temperatureIn case of air temperature above 35 C
/  95 F the dock should be placed /
charging take place in shadowed area.














It all started back in 2012 when me and Pawel came up with and started working on this project, at first it was a chain of fails, but we didn't give up...  it took almost a year to apply corrections and almost another year to create final version the liquid capable of working correctly inside this high pressure engine. Of course both of us have work, families, kids, it was very hard to accord our everyday life with this project. 




On the 3rd of August 2015 the prototype was finally ready, it worked for 9 seconds, it stayed 2 meters above ground, caring weight of 1 KG, for 9 long seconds and... crashed (breaking also the garage door). 9 long seconds, before it broke. We have fixed it, upgraded a little and today- we hold a working unit, a result of a beautiful idea and 3 years of hard work.
We can’t stop now, at this moment our engine is still unstable, and sometimes unpredictable, due to all corrections, fixes, rebuilding, and mistakes we have made from the beginning. We have to complete the new unit, same one but made correctly from the start, with a laser precision, then once all final blueprints are ready- we are ready to order first part of LGE drones (500 - 3000 units, depending on demand). The drones project is completed, missing only final engine.
After presenting our engine at Baltic 2 Expo, we were offered founding, however in each case we would lose rights to all our work, including the patent. We decided to try raising founds ourselves. We have one investor, University of Jagiellonian Professor, who agreed to found a part of the project in return for a part of future shareholding. We are still short, we ask for your help, each dollar counts. Help us build better tomorrow.

Please support our project with 1$, thank you!


How does it work?Long story - short: The liquid inside opposite rotating wheels produces centrifugal energy, proper distribution of liquid’s mass causes the device to maintain a constant directional pull. The most of the success lies in the liquid’s formula (patent pending), the viscosity, weight, magnetic properties etc. are a result of endless calculations, experiments and tests.


What does it mean to you?That the whole world will change my friend! The technology opens door for completely new type of engines, one step at a time and we will have flying segways next decade . You always knew that all those levitating devices and flying cars seen in Sci-Fi movies are coming sooner or later, we’ll here’s a real chance to make it come “sooner” than “later”.Just imagine – a completely “clean” - environmentally friendly, quiet engine that can use any energy (electricity, gas, any type of fuel) to run, sealed - not requiring any maintenance, oil refilling etc., not producing any waste or pollution, capable of working in any environment (underwater, land, air), and… what’s most important – capable of moving any direction, including up and sustaining there. The technology is baby now, but a baby with a great potential, we have the engine itself and drones coming up, but just think what will we have next years…If you are not interested in ordering a drone, we would appreciate your support of our project: 1$ (please see perks). Thank you.

The money plan, assuming ordering 800
pcs of dronesWe need money for...USD 6 500 is required for completing
engine projectUSD 800 is required for patent &
fees purposesUSD 240 000 is required for
manufacturing 800 pcs of drone complete setsUSD 20 000 is required for shipping /
duty purposesUSD 2 800 is required for documentationUSD 3 200 is required for ordering
professional advertisement clipsTotal: USD 273 300.We have USD 151 000We need founding: USD 122 300



Please support us with any amount, each
dollar counts.

You can order your drone today (please
see perks), to be sure that you will receive the drone upon its premiere.Ordering drone means supporting LGE
technology development, the selected drone package will be shipped to you as
soon as the final product is ready. 
No additional charges for drone, equipment
or it's shipping shall be charged. The provided date of shipping is estimated
and can change, the price of drone is estimated, however in case the final
product turns out to be more expensive, you will NOT be asked to pay more. In
case all required founding is  not
received, drones will be sent to those who ordered anyway, only the premiere
date can change. The premiere date (drones sending) depends on technology and
manufacture success.
Thank you for your interest in our
campaign.
Just imagine how much can the world
change once LGE engine is ready. We already proved that the engine can carry
itself + additional weight of abt 800 grams, of course we would like to tell
you that it will be shortly ready carry people and cargo, but it's not that
easy. When it comes to propeller engines, the rule is simple - build a bigger
propeller so it has more power, in case of LGE engine this does not apply, for
each engine size different amount of liquid should be used, depending on this
the size and amount of wheels will be different, and each size, weight &
amount of wheels must be controlled with a updated control unit, gyroscope and
etc. Each LGE engine is designed for a specific size / maximum weight, in case
of any change- everything must be recalculated and redesigned.
Karl Johnson, from Tech-News wrote:(...) The first device using the LGE
engine will be a drone. Why a drone not a flying car? The answer is simple, for
the moment the company is capable of producing an LGE engine that can lift up
itself plus 1 or 2 more pounds only. (...)Let us disagree, we are capable of
producing and LGE capable of flying a car, however in this case we would need a
LOT greater money for start. Let's make the drones first.p
Please support us with 1$ or share this
campaign, each type of support is much appreciated. 
In case you have any
questions, please feel free to write me.Thank you. Jacek Warchol.

story:
Flawless video. Crystal clear audio. Instant sharing capabilities. Seamless connection Zingallo is your all-in-one solution for all your live video conferencing. 

 

Advances in technology means that reliable video conferencing has become accessible and affordable, and can easily serve the modern workplace. This has become especially important during the current pandemic. 

Video conferencing has also enabled many businesses to continue to operate by allowing employees to work from home, using conferencing solutions for meetings and updates, as well as general communications. 

Additionally, with increasing concerns about the carbon cost of travel to the environment, it makes sense for companies to seek to continue to communicate face-to-face online rather than indulge in the wasteful cost to the business and environment in having face-to-face meetings in a single location. 

Normal consumer offerings have made video communications a normalised part of the conversation process. The expectation is that businesses will increasingly embrace conferencing and webinar software simply because it offers so many all-round benefits, especially when using the best conference phones to ensure good quality communications. 

 

Just like Smartphones have changed the way we communicate, 

 

 

With more employees working remotely, traveling, and enjoying flexible schedules, the need for more personal conversations can really only be done with video conferencing software. 

With Zingallo, you have an easy way to connect and collaborate seamlessly with others through flawless online video conferencing and web meetings, being the ideal web meeting software for users who want to simply and effectively connect with customers and clients remotely. 

Stay connected with coworkers, friends, and family with the best video conferencing solution on the market. 

 

How Zingallo Online Meetings Work?

 

We engineered our platform to afford you fast and secure video conferencing tools so you can hold professional virtual meetings with confidence.

 

Web App 

 

Making things happen from anywhere starts with seamless HD video and clear audio. Our platform boasts immersive, distraction-free web meetings that engage and feel like face-to-face meet-ups. 

 

 

Zingallo quickly integrates into your favourite web browsers on any device. Plug it in and enjoy the same web meetings’ quality as everywhere else. 

 

Web Dashboard 

 

Get a sneak preview inside Zingallo. A clean dash means you’ll have a distraction-free video conferencing platform for hassle-free meetings. 

With Zingallo, you can connect, collaborate, and create from anywhere right from your favourite web browser. 

 

 

Whether you are on your computer, tablet, or smartphone, you’ll get the same flawless live video conferencing as with the apps.

 

Mobile Apps - Android & iOS 

 

With Zingallo Mobile Apps, holding or joining online meetings is not nearly as overwhelming or complicated as it is everywhere else. 

 

 

You can connect to your meetings in no-time with both your Android & iOS devices. 

 

What we need and what you get 

 

All funds collected will support our further development, final testing, and optimal finalization of the Zingallo platform. While we have already developed and tested our product, we want to ensure that you will only get the very best version and will immediately fall in love with the new way to collaborate virtually, be it at home or for your office. 

 

We will further invest all funds collected to: 

 

1. Marketing to reach 1 million downloads 

2. Developing Windows, Mac, Linux native Apps 

3. Add a lot more new exciting features 

4. Provide a sophisticated server infrastructure to support the growing demand.

story:
Introducing Rate Mom's Nursing Home

Rate Mom’s Nursing Home is a website and app that allows people to find top-quality nursing homes anywhere in the U.S. based on location, a comprehensive rating system, and user-based feedback on their nursing home experiences.

After watching many families struggle with nursing home issues, Jack Halpern, CEO of My Elder Advocate, the leading national elder care services company, conceived of Rate Mom’s Nursing Home as the ultimate nursing home resource.

Why You Need Rate Mom’s Nursing Home

Elder care is a significant decision we all face at some point in life, whether for our loved ones or for ourselves. However, it's a topic that's hardly addressed on a national level; at best, information is presented in a fractured way that makes it difficult to make an informed decision. What material is available is limited and biased, only providing Medicare's assessment. Many people don't know where to begin to do research; when faced with a crisis, they panic because they don't have a plan of action.

Plus, we've all heard nursing home horror stories from talking with peers or in the news. The fact is that nursing home inspections are conducted with limited regulations and minimal standardized requirements. Unfortunately, this means substandard living conditions and elder care abuse are rampant in facilities that have underlying issues like greed, understaffing, overmedication, and unsafe conditions.

All of us have an amazing grandma, father, or friend that we love dearly. We have their best interests at heart, so why would we risk placing them in a poorly run nursing facility? Let's make sure they are happy and treated with dignity and respect as they enter their golden years. Let us help you find the best nursing home scenario for your elder loved ones with Rate Mom’s Nursing Home.

The faces of today's elder generation. Clockwise, from top left, courtesy of Flickr Creative Commons: Dustin J. McClure, Josh Berglund19, MLazarevski-Marjan, Carl Lovén, Bev Sykes, Hey Paul, Marion Doss, Nick Ares. Center: Our creative director with her awesome, beloved grandma "Nana."

How Rate Mom’s Nursing Home Works

Before choosing a nursing home, the resident/family/guardians need a comprehensive resource to easily research the quality of nursing facilities. Rate Mom’s Nursing Home is a web- and mobile app-based solution that will have the following components:

• A web browser-based product that uses ZIP codes or other location requests to identify local nursing homes, review ratings, collect information, and report on them.

• User-submitted reviews are collected and compared to the facilities' Medicare.gov ratings for a deeper, enhanced evaluation of the nursing home. Users can post pictures, video, and audio to enhance their comments.

• Additional feature-rich content that will help users make the best choices.

• A mobile app with geolocation capabilities to identify nursing homes within a specified radius.

Search with geolocation capabilities anywhere in the U.S.


Grandpa can share his nursing home experience. Photo used courtesy of Flickr Creative Commons: Jeremy Bronson

Individual and combined ratings from Medicare.gov, the user (you), and expert opinion source My Elder Advocate.

Rate Mom’s Nursing Home Will Have ALL of these Features:

• Medicare Source
• User-friendly
• Rich Content
• Login-Free View
• Social Networking
• Mobile App
• Geolocation
• Client Ratings and Comments
• Client Photos and Video
• Follow-up Services Available

At best, competitors only have three or four of the above.

How Your Contribution Will Help

We need your help building the website and app for Rate Mom’s Nursing Home. The project will be funded in three phases. Your donation will
go toward:

Phase 1: $25,000

1. Creating the framework for the full website
2. Creating the preliminary iPhone app
3. Collecting and presenting Medicare data
4. Allowing users (you) to enter comments in the Rate Mom’s Nursing Home website & app

Phase 2: $25,000

1. Preliminary geolocation – identifying local nursing homes
2. Adding capability for photo and video entries to Rate Mom’s Nursing Home website & app
3. Adding rich content, blogs, guest articles, and videos

Phase 3: $25,000

1. Integrating with social networking sites, including Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, and other rating sites
2. Creating the Android mobile app

Rate Mom's Nursing Home's Impact

Building Rate Mom’s Nursing Home will benefit a wide spectrum of people, including you, your family, and friends. It will:

• Provide the most extensive resource for researching nursing homes
across the U.S. by merging information into an exclusive comprehensive
rating system.

• Create a community where people can share their positive or negative nursing home experiences, letting families know the quality of a facility before they enter it.

• Allow people to confidently plan ahead, avoiding crises that come from lack of knowledge and qualified information.

• Push nursing homes to adopt and maintain higher standards of care because negative issues will be reported.

Nursing homes may cater to the elderly, but finding a great facility shouldn't be an antiquated process. Let's modernize elder care and make it relevant in the 21st century. Help us make Rate Mom’s Nursing Home a reality.

Who We Are

The Rate Mom's Nursing Home team (L-R): Jack Halpern, CEO; Claudine Halpern, COO; Alex Fefer, Technical Advisor; Wendy Hu, Creative Director; Selena Scola, Marketing and Communications Manager; Beth Silver, PR Consultant.

JACK HALPERN, CEO of Rate Mom's Nursing Home, is a champion of elder care rights and is passionate about fighting for elder care issues, including nursing home abuse and eviction. His mission is to help people navigate the difficult and sometimes confusing pathways of elder care. Jack is the visionary, drawing from his extensive knowledge and experience working with elders to develop the content and direction for Rate Mom’s Nursing Home.

He is also CEO of My Elder Advocate (MEA), the preeminent trusted advisor for elders and their families. MEA's goal is to assist its clients in drafting blueprints for their future. As a result, elders and their families have peace of mind, knowing a plan of action is in place to help them maintain control, preserve their dignity, and protect their independence, finances, property, and rights. Jack's credentials:

• 35-year elder care industry veteran
• Active nursing home administrator for 15+ years
• Founded My Elder Advocate in 2008
• Leading advocate for elder care issues in the US

• Licensed nursing home administrator since 1978
• Masters in Healthcare Administration, CW Post College, 1977
• Senior Care Humanitarian Award, Sephardic Nursing Home, 2011

CLAUDINE HALPERN, COO of Rate Mom's Nursing Home, is the technical driving force behind this company. She will bring her years of experience creating technology solutions for financial services, along with her entrepreneurial spirit and operations experience, to create the best possible ratings website. She co-founded and is COO of My Elder Advocate. In addition, Claudine has an impressive track record that includes:

• 30-year management consulting industry veteran in finance and technology
• Crisis manager of note in the financial services technology business space
• Consultant to nascent entrepreneurial businesses since 2004
• Guest lecturer at Baruch College’s Entrepreneurial program, undergrad
and MBA

ALEX FEFER, Technical Advisor for Rate Mom's Nursing Home, brings to this project a level of technical expertise and a team of developers that will help build a smart, scalable, and intuitive software platform that is a necessary foundation of any modern business.

He earned his bachelor’s degree in mathematics and economics at Baruch College and a master’s degree in economics at Stony Brook.

Alex's career in the corporate world spans 15 years and covers the areas of research, information technology, management, and teaching. In addition to his corporate experience, he founded and ran a small IT consulting firm and real estate development company.

Recently, Alex has managed a number of high-profile IT projects for a European bank and a hedge fund.

WENDY HU, Creative Director of RateMomsNursingHome, oversees all visual and communication aspects of the company. Her role includes creative strategy, brand development, and integrated marketing solutions using web/digital/video/print approaches. Her ability to wear many hats extends to designing graphics, art directing video, and writing copy for the Indiegogo campaign. She will be responsible for the front-end design of Rate Mom’s Nursing Home website and app.

Wendy has 10+ years of experience as an art director/graphic designer and works with a variety of clients, from luxury real estate to ad agencies and entertainment artists. She has a versatile creative voice and aims for fresh, unique approaches that align with each company’s brand.

She understands the value and necessity of Rate Mom’s Nursing Home in the digital age and is excited to be a part of this project.

SELENA SCOLA, Marketing and Communications Manager of Rate Mom’s Nursing Home, is providing her prior successful crowdfunding expertise and online marketing experience to help RMNH become a much-needed solution in nursing home health care. Her responsibilities include consulting and strategy for RMNH’s physical and digital perk rewards, social media management, including content creation, email campaign writing,
and analytics.

Her background includes over a decade of work in marketing and management in such industries as nightlife, entertainment, hospitality, wealth management, mobile, tech, nonprofits, and crowdfunding. Currently, her main focus is helping entrepreneurs and nonprofits have a strong, recognizable voice on- and offline.

She is known for developing competitive, creative yet sensible digital and conventional marketing solutions that are tailored to fit her client’s needs. Social media is one of the many tools that allow her to connect with a brand's target audience. “I use social media to find potential opportunities that clients can use to maximize brand relevance,” she explains.

Selena is thrilled to be part of a team developing a solution to help the elder community live better.

BETH SILVER, PR Consultant for Rate Mom’s Nursing Home. While her role with Rate Mom’s Nursing Home is focused on public relations, Beth believes an integral part of her job is her role as a brand ambassador who enthusiastically communicates Rate Mom’s Nursing Home’s mission. Beth’s perspective on elder care was changed forever when My Elder Advocate served as elder and patient advocate for her grandmother Sylvia Balaban. The experience taught her the importance of a comprehensive elder care resource, and that such a resource can help people across the country better understand the elder care landscape, as they support their parents and grandparents as they move from independent to assisted and nursing
home living.

For almost 20 years, Beth has been helping entrepreneurs leverage their business assets to increase sales, improve customer communications, and maximize brand effectiveness.  Beth’s well-rounded, unique perspective as Managing Director of Doubet Consulting, a marketing and PR firm focused on empowering business owners, has helped companies of all sizes improve how they bring their products and services to market.

Companies Beth has worked with include: Classroom School Uniforms, the Jewish Education Project, the Small Business Summit, WomanCon, the UJA Federation, Global Pet Expo, NY Expo Business & Conference, Sci-Tech Kids, DyslexiaVille, and others.

______________________________________________________________________________

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

Elder Statistics in the U.S.

Source: U.S. Census Bureau 2010 census

• In 2000, there were 35.1 million people over 65; today there are 40 million, a number projected to grow to 71.5 million by 2030.
• 206% population growth over 85 projected between 2000 and 2020
• 449% population growth over 85 projected between 2000 and 2050
• 29% of the population (65.7 million people) are caregivers
• 43.5 million people take care of elderly people
• 14.9 million people take care of people with Alzheimer's

Nursing Home Facts You Should Know

• Nursing homes are inspected no more than once a year, usually closer to once every two years.
• Inspection times are generally known to the nursing homes. This gives substandard facilities an opportunity to upgrade for the short period that inspectors are in place.
• Inspectors use a limited checklist to assess the standards of
nursing homes.
• Nursing home inspections always happen during the day, though most crises happen in nursing homes at night or on weekends.
• Nursing homes are rated on a star system, based on minimal standardized requirements put in place many years ago.
• When giving a tour of a poorly run nursing home, the tour guide will only show a family what they want to be seen.
• There is no platform for people who have a family member in a nursing home to publish their experiences. For this reason, bad experiences in five-star nursing homes, as well as good experiences in two-star nursing homes, are unavailable to the public.
• Nursing home residents are never asked for their opinions; their voices are not heard.
______________________________________________________________________________

You Can Help:

Please help us get the word out and share the Rate Mom’s Nursing Home campaign. You can use the Indiegogo share tools on the top of the page under the video. Help in any form is truly appreciated. Thank you VERY much for supporting us!
