We have their best interests at heart, so why would we risk placing them in a poorly run nursing facility? Let's make sure they are happy and treated with dignity and respect as they enter their golden years. Let us help you find the best nursing home scenario for your elder loved ones with Rate Mom’s Nursing Home. The faces of today's elder generation. Clockwise, from top left, courtesy of Flickr Creative Commons: Dustin J. McClure, Josh Berglund19, MLazarevski-Marjan, Carl Lovén, Bev Sykes, Hey Paul, Marion Doss, Nick Ares. Center: Our creative director with her awesome, beloved grandma "Nana."How Rate Mom’s Nursing Home WorksBefore choosing a nursing home, the resident/family/guardians need a comprehensive resource to easily research the quality of nursing facilities. Rate Mom’s Nursing Home is a web- and mobile app-based solution that will have the following components:• A web browser-based product that uses ZIP codes or other location requests to identify local nursing homes, review ratings, collect information, and report on them.• User-submitted reviews are collected and compared to the facilities' Medicare.gov ratings for a deeper, enhanced evaluation of the nursing home. Users can post pictures, video, and audio to enhance their comments.• Additional feature-rich content that will help users make the best choices.• A mobile app with geolocation capabilities to identify nursing homes within a specified radius.Search with geolocation capabilities anywhere in the U.S. Grandpa can share his nursing home experience. Photo used courtesy of Flickr Creative Commons: Jeremy BronsonIndividual and combined ratings from Medicare.gov, the user (you), and expert opinion source My Elder Advocate.Rate Mom’s Nursing Home Will Have ALL of these Features:• Medicare Source• User-friendly• Rich Content• Login-Free View• Social Networking• Mobile App• Geolocation• Client Ratings and Comments• Client Photos and Video• Follow-up Services AvailableAt best, competitors only have three or four of the above.
 
How Your Contribution Will HelpWe need your help building the website and app for Rate Mom’s Nursing Home. The project will be funded in three phases. Your donation willgo toward:Phase 1: $25,0001. Creating the framework for the full website2. Creating the preliminary iPhone app3. Collecting and presenting Medicare data4. Allowing users (you) to enter comments in the Rate Mom’s Nursing Home website & appPhase 2: $25,0001. Preliminary geolocation – identifying local nursing homes2. Adding capability for photo and video entries to Rate Mom’s Nursing Home website & app3. Adding rich content, blogs, guest articles, and videosPhase 3: $25,0001. Integrating with social networking sites, including Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, and other rating sites2. Creating the Android mobile app Rate Mom's Nursing Home's ImpactBuilding Rate Mom’s Nursing Home will benefit a wide spectrum of people, including you, your family, and friends. It will:• Provide the most extensive resource for researching nursing homesacross the U.S. by merging information into an exclusive comprehensiverating system.• Create a community where people can share their positive or negative nursing home experiences, letting families know the quality of a facility before they enter it.• Allow people to confidently plan ahead, avoiding crises that come from lack of knowledge and qualified information.• Push nursing homes to adopt and maintain higher standards of care because negative issues will be reported.Nursing homes may cater to the elderly, but finding a great facility shouldn't be an antiquated process. Let's modernize elder care and make it relevant in the 21st century. Help us make Rate Mom’s Nursing Home a reality.Who We AreThe Rate Mom's Nursing Home team (L-R): Jack Halpern, CEO; Claudine Halpern, COO; Alex Fefer, Technical Advisor; Wendy Hu, Creative Director; Selena Scola, Marketing and Communications Manager; Beth Silver, PR Consultant.JACK HALPERN, CEO of Rate Mom's Nursing Home, is a champion of elder care rights and is passionate about fighting for elder care issues, including nursing home abuse and eviction. His mission is to help people navigate the difficult and sometimes confusing pathways of elder care. Jack is the visionary, drawing from his extensive knowledge and experience working with elders to develop the content and direction for Rate Mom’s Nursing Home.He is also CEO of My Elder Advocate (MEA), the preeminent trusted advisor for elders and their families. MEA's goal is to assist its clients in drafting blueprints for their future. As a result, elders and their families have peace of mind, knowing a plan of action is in place to help them maintain control, preserve their dignity, and protect their independence, finances, property, and rights. Jack's credentials:• 35-year elder care industry veteran• Active nursing home administrator for 15+ years• Founded My Elder Advocate in 2008• Leading advocate for elder care issues in the US• Licensed nursing home administrator since 1978• Masters in Healthcare Administration, CW Post College, 1977• Senior Care Humanitarian Award, Sephardic Nursing Home, 2011








CLAUDINE HALPERN, COO of Rate Mom's Nursing Home, is the technical driving force behind this company. She will bring her years of experience creating technology solutions for financial services, along with her entrepreneurial spirit and operations experience, to create the best possible ratings website. She co-founded and is COO of My Elder Advocate. In addition, Claudine has an impressive track record that includes:• 30-year management consulting industry veteran in finance and technology• Crisis manager of note in the financial services technology business space• Consultant to nascent entrepreneurial businesses since 2004• Guest lecturer at Baruch College’s Entrepreneurial program, undergradand MBAALEX FEFER, Technical Advisor for Rate Mom's Nursing Home, brings to this project a level of technical expertise and a team of developers that will help build a smart, scalable, and intuitive software platform that is a necessary foundation of any modern business.He earned his bachelor’s degree in mathematics and economics at Baruch College and a master’s degree in economics at Stony Brook.Alex's career in the corporate world spans 15 years and covers the areas of research, information technology, management, and teaching. In addition to his corporate experience, he founded and ran a small IT consulting firm and real estate development company.Recently, Alex has managed a number of high-profile IT projects for a European bank and a hedge fund.WENDY HU, Creative Director of RateMomsNursingHome, oversees all visual and communication aspects of the company. Her role includes creative strategy, brand development, and integrated marketing solutions using web/digital/video/print approaches. Her ability to wear many hats extends to designing graphics, art directing video, and writing copy for the Indiegogo campaign. She will be responsible for the front-end design of Rate Mom’s Nursing Home website and app.Wendy has 10+ years of experience as an art director/graphic designer and works with a variety of clients, from luxury real estate to ad agencies and entertainment artists. She has a versatile creative voice and aims for fresh, unique approaches that align with each company’s brand.She understands the value and necessity of Rate Mom’s Nursing Home in the digital age and is excited to be a part of this project.SELENA SCOLA, Marketing and Communications Manager of Rate Mom’s Nursing Home, is providing her prior successful crowdfunding expertise and online marketing experience to help RMNH become a much-needed solution in nursing home health care. Her responsibilities include consulting and strategy for RMNH’s physical and digital perk rewards, social media management, including content creation, email campaign writing,and analytics.Her background includes over a decade of work in marketing and management in such industries as nightlife, entertainment, hospitality, wealth management, mobile, tech, nonprofits, and crowdfunding. Currently, her main focus is helping entrepreneurs and nonprofits have a strong, recognizable voice on- and offline.She is known for developing competitive, creative yet sensible digital and conventional marketing solutions that are tailored to fit her client’s needs. Social media is one of the many tools that allow her to connect with a brand's target audience. “I use social media to find potential opportunities that clients can use to maximize brand relevance,” she explains.Selena is thrilled to be part of a team developing a solution to help the elder community live better.




BETH SILVER, PR Consultant for Rate Mom’s Nursing Home. While her role with Rate Mom’s Nursing Home is focused on public relations, Beth believes an integral part of her job is her role as a brand ambassador who enthusiastically communicates Rate Mom’s Nursing Home’s mission. Beth’s perspective on elder care was changed forever when My Elder Advocate served as elder and patient advocate for her grandmother Sylvia Balaban. The experience taught her the importance of a comprehensive elder care resource, and that such a resource can help people across the country better understand the elder care landscape, as they support their parents and grandparents as they move from independent to assisted and nursinghome living.For almost 20 years, Beth has been helping entrepreneurs leverage their business assets to increase sales, improve customer communications, and maximize brand effectiveness.  Beth’s well-rounded, unique perspective as Managing Director of Doubet Consulting, a marketing and PR firm focused on empowering business owners, has helped companies of all sizes improve how they bring their products and services to market. Companies Beth has worked with include: Classroom School Uniforms, the Jewish Education Project, the Small Business Summit, WomanCon, the UJA Federation, Global Pet Expo, NY Expo Business & Conference, Sci-Tech Kids, DyslexiaVille, and others.______________________________________________________________________________ADDITIONAL INFORMATIONElder Statistics in the U.S.
Source: U.S. Census Bureau 2010 census • In 2000, there were 35.1 million people over 65; today there are 40 million, a number projected to grow to 71.5 million by 2030.• 206% population growth over 85 projected between 2000 and 2020• 449% population growth over 85 projected between 2000 and 2050• 29% of the population (65.7 million people) are caregivers • 43.5 million people take care of elderly people• 14.9 million people take care of people with Alzheimer'sNursing Home Facts You Should Know
• Nursing homes are inspected no more than once a year, usually closer to once every two years.• Inspection times are generally known to the nursing homes. This gives substandard facilities an opportunity to upgrade for the short period that inspectors are in place.• Inspectors use a limited checklist to assess the standards ofnursing homes.• Nursing home inspections always happen during the day, though most crises happen in nursing homes at night or on weekends.• Nursing homes are rated on a star system, based on minimal standardized requirements put in place many years ago.• When giving a tour of a poorly run nursing home, the tour guide will only show a family what they want to be seen.• There is no platform for people who have a family member in a nursing home to publish their experiences. For this reason, bad experiences in five-star nursing homes, as well as good experiences in two-star nursing homes, are unavailable to the public.• Nursing home residents are never asked for their opinions; their voices are not heard.______________________________________________________________________________You Can Help:Please help us get the word out and share the Rate Mom’s Nursing Home campaign. You can use the Indiegogo share tools on the top of the page under the video. Help in any form is truly appreciated. Thank you VERY much for supporting us!

story:
Short Summary

My goal is to do much of the legwork for my clients.  If everything works well, I am looking to generate about 3-6% more conversions than typical market advertising. Please contact me at gerald.k.kollath@gmail.com for details or if you are interested in using my services for your business. Getting this funding means I will be able to get back on my feet.  My goal is to be on my own and self-sustaining. 

I am a US Army Airborne Infantry vet with 10 years of service. I terminated service due to type1 diabetes. In 03/2017, I had two strokes because of it.  I spent about the next month in a coma and two more weeks in a rehabilitation hospital. I am nearly 90% recovered. I have physical and cognitive deficits that prevent me from returning to teaching.  I used to be a teacher of US and World History. I lost extensive language capacity. I used to speak other languages as a result of my time in the Army. I thankfully retained English but lost the others.   I no longer remember names and faces easily.  It takes me several meetings to connect names and faces.  I also lost cognitive filters, and have difficulty following multiple people in conversations in large groups. These deficits reasonably prevent me from teaching, and I need to start a new business that will let me be self-sufficient and on my own.  I have been told that I am too recovered to qualify for disability, and I really would rather work than not. My physical deficits are also minor to others but affect me greatly.  I have lost use my little and ring fingers on both hands. I have diminished grip strength, and have lost the normal range of motion in both wrists.  Feel free to email me with any questions regarding my business plan and expected expenses, or if you need more details about me.  Also, if you are interested, let me know if you want to use my services.

What I Need & What You Get

All money I raise will go to funding this business startup. I am looking to do this as a full-time job and career. If I raise my goal, I will start with that money and I can hit the ground running and running hard. If I exceed my goal, I will expand my use of technology and marketing. I will also be able to advertise for new clients.  If for some reason, I don’t reach my funding goals, I will still start this business with the money raised, it will just be proportionally limited.

My goal is to be on my own and self-sustaining.  I can no longer teach because of my deficits.  I am getting assistance from the VA for all my medical needs; if they are successful in treating me, I would be able to look for a teaching position in a couple of years.  I need to do something now and I really don’t want to languish that long.

I really don’t have any perks per se. I can tell you, that I am 100% loyal in the way only a veteran can be. If I get this up and running successfully, I would not forget those who helped.  It might be some small token, But I plan on making sure to thank everyone who helped.

ALL money raised for this will go to this. If I don’t reach my goal, I will simply start in some diminished manner.

The Impact

I am not ‘reinventing the wheel’ in any way. What I am doing is trying to come up with a marketing program that will provide lists of interested and motivated potential buyers of services and goods.  Typically for every 1000 names on a list, fewer than 10 of them become paying clients.  What I plan to do is to increase that number from about 1% to closer to 3 or 4%,  or more.  I plan on spreading my expenses over the same types of markets, but to have differing levels or segments as clients to best make use of the results I get.   I do have some understanding of insurance law from experience.  I know that there are restrictions that cross state lines and that there are restrictions how captive brokers, wealth and asset managers, and financial traders can advertise.  I know how to navigate those laws from experience. I therefore also become an arm’s length provider of interested and potential customers for my clients to call and market.  I will not make those sales. I will provide lists of interested potential customers to my clients so that those clients can improve their respective businesses.

The monies I raise here will help get access to new computers and monitors, sales and marketing programs, software that will help me generate interest, software to better organize data and transmit that data to my new clients, pay for marketing campaigns, pay for advertising and help me acquire new business.  I successfully did similar marketing ideas and campaigns for new members when I ran a Boy Scout Venture Crew. Since then, It has become easier to do using social media and email platforms. Now I will be doing this professionally and will be looking to make an income using this methodology.

Risks & Challenges

I am in no way a ‘new and unique’ method of advertising.  This industry is populated with large and small competitors.  I can compete because I have low operating requirements once I am in motion.  There is a risk of loss.  I believe that others have successfully done this in other areas of the country and my own experiences show that the potential is both real and attainable for success.  The hardest part will be getting the numbers of clients I can service.

I will start developing insurance and stock trading leads as soon as I can. As I do that, I will also start looking for clients. I will look to start in NJ first.  As soon as I get a second client in NJ, I will start looking for clients in NY as well.  I will focus on those 2 areas until I have either exhausted my potential client base or retained about 4 clients in each state. From there, I will look to add CT and then PA after.  My goal is 4 insurance brokers in each state, 2-4 wealth managers or investors in each state and then I will look to expand to other types of potential clients.

I will use the same tools used to generate leads and interest to generate clients for myself. In each case, I will look to sit down with each potential client to best understand their specific target markets.  Then I will create the campaigns needed to generate the leads for each of my clients.

Other Ways You Can Help

I need all the help I can get.

If you can’t help, but know someone who might, please connect them to my page. Let me know you do that via email at gerald.k.kollath@gmail.com.  Until I am up and running, I can’t promise any perks, but I hope to be successful enough that I will make everyone know I appreciate the help. 

Don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Bitcoin Cockpit

Mein Name ist Frank Gutacker und ich arbeite seit über 20 Jahren mit Computern, ihren Skript- und Programmiersprachen und den gängigen Kreativanwendungen. Von mir wurden Webseiten entwickelt und Spiele programmiert. 

Getreu dem Motto "mine the miners" möchte ich die noch unbekannte Nische der Bitcoin-Applikationen ein bisschen aufmischen und für frischen Wind in dieser Sparte sorgen. Mein letztes "Baby" in dieser Hinsicht ist die App "Bitcoin Cockpit", welche bei Google und Amazon verfügbar ist und sich steigender Downloads erfreut.

Ziel

Da das Potenzial dieser Anwendung erkennbar ist, möchte ich sie weiterentwickeln und auch für iOS-Geräte verfügbar machen. Die dafür benötigten Kosten möchte ich über diese Kampagne einbringen.

Im ersten Schritt würde ich gern eine englische Version der App entwickeln und eventuell noch ein Point & Figure-Modul einbinden, mit dem eine spezielle Form der Kursanalyse möglich wird. Des Weiteren müssen die Programme nach iOS portiert werden.

Im Idealfall brauche ich vier Dinge:

1. Einen Entwickler-Account bei Apple, der 99 US-Dollar pro Jahr kostet

2. Ein MacBook Air, welches 1249 Euro kostet

3. Einen iPod Touch für 199 Euro

4. Ein iPhone 6 für 699 Euro

Sollte das Funding-Ziel nicht erreicht werden, werde ich Posten von dieser Liste streichen, bzw. mich auf Gebrauchtware beschränken.

Bitcoin

In meinen Augen stellt die Digitalwährung Bitcoin eine riesengroße Revolution dar. Auch wenn es immer wieder so aussieht, als sei dieses System am Ende, bin ich davon überzeugt, dass sich seine Vorteile durchsetzen werden. Am Anfang wird vor allem der spekulative Reiz Nutzer anlocken. Doch nach und nach wird sich zeigen, dass man mit Bitcoins sehr viel mehr machen kann, als sie nur über Internetbörsen zu handeln.

Herausforderungen

Als unabhängiger Entwickler kann man natürlich nicht mit den Ressourcen eines Entwicklungsunternehmens aufwarten. Auch beschränkt sich das Marketing auf Guerilla-Aktionen und man eckt leicht mit potenziellen Konkurrenten an.

Dennoch sehe ich mich diesen Herausforderungen gewachsen. Zumal ich die nötige Erfahrung mitbringe und eine gute Rechtsschutzversicherung habe. ;)

Erzählt es weiter

Falls ihr die App jetzt schon unterstützen wollt, dann seid ihr herzlich eingeladen, den Link zu teilen.

English

Hi guys,

I want to transform my Android app "Bitcoin Cockpit" to iOS, and place it in Apple's app store. Another milestone to reach is a completely new module called "Point & Figure" to analyze the Bitcoin charge in that manner. Also I want to localize the app.

This campaign was set up to ensure my equipment with the necessary Apple gear.

Thanks in advance.

With all the best!

Frank

Thanks in advance.
With all the best!
Frank

story:
Your 3D designs deserve a better printer; a modular design printer comes in transformable industrial-grade parts, no fragile or plastic gears and allows you to effortlessly transform to meet your 3D printing needs.

MOOZ, the most promising and affordable all-in-one 3D printer with interchangeable heads for 3D printing, laser engraving and CNC carving. No matter you are an amateur or professional designer, its rock-solid frame delivers you the precise and stable performance. With MOOZ, your creativity will always take center stage. 

Third Party Review of Mooz Doing 3D Printing, CNC Carving & Laser Engraving From Thomas Workshop

 

Third Party Review of Mooz Doing 3D Printing, CNC Carving & Laser Engraving From ProjectTube

 

 

 

 

 

 

Stability, durability, precision & accuracy is what the Mooz can offer, don’t settle for less when you can have Mooz as your companion on your maker journey!

 

 

With Mooz-3 mix-color nozzle, it can mix colors together to create multi-color 3D printing, giving your design a colorful life.

 

The Mooz comes with super easy-to-use software, all you need to do is drag your design and drop to the software, then the Mooz will take care of the rest! With Mooz software, your stunning design will turn into reality in just a few clicks.

 

There are a lot of software supported by Mooz, including Cura, Slic3r, Printrun etc. You can easily start printing your work once you have your hands on Mooz!

Mooz-1 Printing

 Mooz-2 Printing

Mooz-3 Printing 

 

 

CNC is what we can do best, with the adjustable depth of 0-5mm, your CNC work will be fascinating like never before. You can start carving artwork as you want. Nice and clean!

 

 

With Mooz, you can use the powerful laser engraving head. No matter it is printing logo on a certain object, or simply print some words, Mooz will get you covered! You can showcase your creativity on wood, corks or even food engraving.

 

 

 

Unlike other fragile plastic 3D printers, Mooz is made with premium aluminum, the alloys CNC body delivers a great stability. Since the sturdy metal frame boosts the stability of the printer, as a result, precise and reliable performance is guaranteed.

 

 

Mooz Industrial-grade linear guideway with accurate positioning capability, it keeps vibrations to a minimum when printing. The Linear Parallelism is only 0.01mm/100mm, in other words, when the slide block on the Guideway moves 100 mm, the parallel deviation barely at 0.01mm. 

 

The precision of stepper motor is the crucial factor for 3D printing. Mooz empowered by a high-accurate motor with Control Precision up to 0.005mm, it satisfies the fullness of your printing requirements.

 

Due to the industrial components make Mooz so stable and accurate, the printing precision of Mooz is up to 0.02mm. It satisfies your printing requirements to the fullness.

 First time the number of Micrometer is 0.047mm and later the number comes back to 0.047mm, it means two times the position of Mooz’s body is at the same position, it proves Mooz's position precision.

With the interchangeable industrial components and heads, you can convert MOOZ into three forms of creative tools to bring your designs to vivid life.

 

 

Thanks to the modular design of Mooz, DIY and quickly assembling is possible. It only takes 10 minutes to put everything together, no hassles anymore!

 

Comes with a complimentary laser protective shield box and a pair of safety glasses for the purchase of the laser kit. You can have 100% security from making direct contact with the machine！

 

Mooz supports a wide range of materials including PLA, ABS, PC, FLEX etc., so you can use Mooz today to get innovated and let your 3D printing dream run free!

 3D Printer Comparison

 Linear Guide Comparison

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are a group of ambitious and experienced team who aimed to solve the problem that has existed for a long time. An affordable but precise 3D printer that allows home manufacturing and innovations for everyone, and at the same time that can do CNC carving and laser engraving more efficiently without the need of investing extract machines!

About Shipment

The price showing in our Indiegogo page is including product cost plus shipping cost, not including local customs & duty tax occurred. Please make sure whether your local customs will charge you at high taxtes.
story_txt:
Your 3D designs deserve a better printer; a modular design printer comes in transformable industrial-grade parts, no fragile or plastic gears and allows you to effortlessly transform to meet your 3D printing needs.MOOZ, the most promising and affordable all-in-one 3D printer with interchangeable heads for 3D printing, laser engraving and CNC carving. No matter you are an amateur or professional designer, its rock-solid frame delivers you the precise and stable performance. With MOOZ, your creativity will always take center stage. Third Party Review of Mooz Doing 3D Printing, CNC Carving & Laser Engraving From Thomas Workshop  Third Party Review of Mooz Doing 3D Printing, CNC Carving & Laser Engraving From ProjectTube       Stability, durability, precision & accuracy is what the Mooz can offer, don’t settle for less when you can have Mooz as your companion on your maker journey!  With Mooz-3 mix-color nozzle, it can mix colors together to create multi-color 3D printing, giving your design a colorful life. The Mooz comes with super easy-to-use software, all you need to do is drag your design and drop to the software, then the Mooz will take care of the rest! With Mooz software, your stunning design will turn into reality in just a few clicks.

 

There are a lot of software supported by Mooz, including Cura, Slic3r, Printrun etc. You can easily start printing your work once you have your hands on Mooz!
Mooz-1 Printing

Replay with sound

 Mooz-2 Printing

Mooz-3 Printing

CNC is what we can do best, with the adjustable depth of 0-5mm, your CNC work will be fascinating like never before. You can start carving artwork as you want. Nice and clean!

 Play

 
Replay with sound

With Mooz, you can use the powerful laser engraving head. No matter it is printing logo on a certain object, or simply print some words, Mooz will get you covered! You can showcase your creativity on wood, corks or even food engraving.
 

 

 

Unlike other fragile plastic 3D printers, Mooz is made with premium aluminum, the alloys CNC body delivers a great stability. Since the sturdy metal frame boosts the stability of the printer, as a result, precise and reliable performance is guaranteed.

 

 

Mooz Industrial-grade linear guideway with accurate positioning capability, it keeps vibrations to a minimum when printing. The Linear Parallelism is only 0.01mm/100mm, in other words, when the slide block on the Guideway moves 100 mm, the parallel deviation barely at 0.01mm. 

 

The precision of stepper motor is the crucial factor for 3D printing. Mooz empowered by a high-accurate motor with Control Precision up to 0.005mm, it satisfies the fullness of your printing requirements.

 

Due to the industrial components make Mooz so stable and accurate, the printing precision of Mooz is up to 0.02mm. It satisfies your printing requirements to the fullness.

 First time the number of Micrometer is 0.047mm and later the number comes back to 0.047mm, it means two times the position of Mooz’s body is at the same position, it proves Mooz's position precision.

With the interchangeable industrial components and heads, you can convert MOOZ into three forms of creative tools to bring your designs to vivid life.

 

 

Thanks to the modular design of Mooz, DIY and quickly assembling is possible. It only takes 10 minutes to put everything together, no hassles anymore!


 

Comes with a complimentary laser protective shield box and a pair of safety glasses for the purchase of the laser kit. You can have 100% security from making direct contact with the machine！

 

Mooz supports a wide range of materials including PLA, ABS, PC, FLEX etc., so you can use Mooz today to get innovated and let your 3D printing dream run free!

 Linear Guide Comparison

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   

 

 

 

About the shipping date, according to our current productivity, we might move the shipping date to March, 2018. Thanks for your understanding.
 

 

We are a group of ambitious and experienced team who aimed to solve the problem that has existed for a long time. An affordable but precise 3D printer that allows home manufacturing and innovations for everyone, and at the same time that can do CNC carving and laser engraving more efficiently without the need of investing extract machines!

story:
Lagio Features

Power Bank and Internal Storage

 
 
Cup Holder, Post-it Tray & Bluetooth Stereo Speakers
 
 
Cable Management
 
 
 
Concealable & Extendable Legs
 
 
 
LED Light - Up to 3 LED Lights Simultaneously
 
 
 

  

 

  

 

  

 

Lagio’s ergonomic design sits comfortably on your lap or propped up on any surface such as a couch, bed or chair. 

The desk itself features a large space for writing or for your laptop up to 19”, tablet or smartphone, mouse, a removable cup holder and Post-It™ note tray, as well as the options for Bluetooth speaker and LED light add-ons.

The Lagio storage compartment opens up to reveal a holding area for papers, cords, portable batteries, pens, styluses and other items.

Portable and rechargeable power banks inside Lagio charge your tablets, cell phones, LED lights as well as most laptops and any other electronic. 

The integral cable management feature allows for tight storage without unsightly and inconvenient cords.

Lagio’s legs can be easily adjusted to fit the height of your workspace for improved comfort, posture and health. They can also be folded into a compartment for storage when they’re not needed.

 

Lagio offers numerous unique add-ons, including heat dissipation comfort webbing, a Bluetooth speaker system and USB connected LED lights, to fit your specific uses and comfort needs. 

The future optional webbing, made from your choice of leather, lamb skin or faux fur, can clip into four attachment points on the bottom of your Lagio for additional comfort and cooling.

 

 

 

 

 

Marketing Partners

                    

 

The name Lagio comes from two Italian words, lavorare (meaning work) and giocare (meaning play) which is exactly why we created Lagio. We saw the need to create luxurious products that support our highly functional, digital lifestyles, yet still incorporate great design and aesthetics.

The Aeon Gold team brings diverse backgrounds from a variety of industries and technologies, but what all of our team members share is a mutual frustration with the cheap, inelegant design of products we use every day.

With shared incentive, we began developing a series of ideas, identifying a variety of items that fit our criteria for design. We came to the conclusion that a highly functional and elegant lap desk which significantly improves the style and capacity of a laptops, tablets, phones and other digital devices, would be our first project, and Lagio was born.

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Lagio a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Lagio, if you’re a supporter of Lagio, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! 

Risks and challenges

There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. The Aeon Gold Lagio management team has extraordinary talent with many years of designing, manufacturing, fulfilling and supporting products around the world. We have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfilment companies to ensure the highest quality, performance and support for your Lagio lap desk. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring the Aeon Gold Lagio collection to your homes, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

IMPORTANT NOTICE TO OUR INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: 

Please note that YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CUSTOMS FEE, DUTIES, VAT, IMPORT TAXES, SPECIAL DELIVERY FEES ADMINISTERED BY YOUR GOVERNMENT, AND HANDLING FEES.  These are not included in the cost of shipping or handling of your rewards, and we are unable to estimate those fees for you.

story:
Hello! My name is Takhir Belosan and I am 20 years old student. I live in a city called Bishkek, in Kyrgyzstan. I and my friend, Dastan Salibekov, are young entrepreneurs. We want to start production of popcorn at the highest professional level, using the best quality grain, oil, and natural supplements.

A little background

When my friend Dastan was in USA last year, he discovered many interesting products which don't exist in our local market. The one of those products was popcorn. We would like to bring some features of American market trends into our community. That's why we decided to develop a small popcorn campaign which, we hope, will be successfull  with your help.
Right now, we start producing only three types of popcorn:
1) Caramel popcorn  

2) Salty popcorn

3) Sugar popcorn


Our mission

Our mission is to produce only natural and delicious popcorn for children, adults, and amicable company for a good pastime.
Because popcorn industry is not developed so much in our state, we decided to occupy this niche and bring to our community one of the popular american snacks. We'd like to make popcorn be affordable for all kind of customers, from children to elders.
Right now, we have only three different tastes of popcorn: salty, sugary and caramel. Later on, we plan to extend our assortiment and produce new types of popcorn.


What We Need & What You Get

First of all, because of fund issues we do not have enough resources to implement our idea. You can greatly help us with monetary donations.
Here is our probable accounting:

  1. 2 Popcorn machines  $ 400 (200+200)
  2. Packages and stickers  $ 85
  3. Transportation  $ 100
  4. Marketing/Promotion $ 500
  5. Rent $ 200 (per mounth)
  6. Labor $ 300
  7. Packing machine $ 250
  8. Flavoring $ 120
 Even if the entire goal is not reached, the project will be scaled proportionately to the money collected.  Funds that exceed our Goal will go to charity.

If you help us, we will be glad to see you in Kyrgyzstan and will try to show you our country.

The Impact

Why popcorn?

Popcorn is a quite useful product, because it is rich in fiber and low in fat. It is recommended to complete the daily diet for adults and children, because popcorn helps to normalize motor function of the intestine.


If you're donating a dollar or sharing us on Facebook, at work, or with your friends at school, you are helping us get closer to reaching our goal.

However you help, thank you so much. We will always be grateful!

story:
Our crowdfunding campaign is ended, to buy SIGMO please sign up here: SIGMO.CO

As Featured In:

  

 

Meet SIGMO

SIGMO – is a voice translating device that will revolutionise the way you are able to communicate and understand other languages.

  • Would you like to communicate with foreigners without any problems during vacations, business trips or wherever you are?
  • All these things become possible with the help of SIGMO!

Forget about bulky dictionaries and awkward, slow translations on your mobile. Now with SIGMO at the touch of a button you can instantly translate the words you need into any chosen language and hear the results of your translation instantly! Contemporary design, intuitive and portable SIGMO will be a must have for any traveler.

Aluminum Sigmo:

Touch Buttons Stretch Goal $200 000:

Sigmo Innovative Technologies

Beside the development of our translation device that allows people to communicate we also have 2 important aims that we're working on:

1. Offline Translation. We are working on offline translation service that will give people an ability to download vocabularies into mobile and to communicate with others without internet connection. No one can do that right now and we want to be first among the others who will provide such function to our consumers.

2. Smart Translating Technology. It will allow to get not just an ordinary translation, but to translate the meaning the phrase you said. That is a unique technology that will make a huge step in translating and international communication. 

All updates, improvements and innovative technologies that will be introduced overtime will be absolutely free of charge for all Sigmo users. All you will need is just to update the App in mobile.

You need SIGMO

  • Forget about the language barrier

SIGMO allows real-time translating of 25 languages. It has two modes of voice translation. You just simply set your native language, then the language to translate to. By pressing the first button and speaking your phrase SIGMO in turn will instantly translate and pronounce it in a language you have selected. By pressing second button, SIGMO will translate speech from the foreign language, then instantly speak in your native language! All at the press of a button!

  • Portable

Because of its small, light size, you will be able to take “SIGMO” without any problems on any trip, hanging it around your neck, attaching it to your clothes, belt or strap on your arm with its own special attachment.

Ideal for:

  • Vacations abroad
  • Business negotiations with foreigners
  • Personal meetings
  • Business trips
  • Foreign language learning 
  • Any other situation

  • Additional Sigmo features:

1. You can use Sigmo as handsfree. As it has the microphone and the speaker you can set incoming calls to Sigmo. It's so easy as using an ordinary bluetooth garniture.

2. Siri Voice Assistant. You can activate Siri on your iPhone or iPad for managing, making calls, writing sms and using other additional Siri functions. For activating Siri you just need to hold the repeat button on Sigmo device.

For more information about Siri services visit: http://www.apple.com/ios/siri/

3. Sigmo has 3.5 mm minijack port for earphones and speakers. Now, with the help of earphones you'll be able to learn foreign languages or listen to the foreign speech without disturbing anyone. Plug Sigmo to the speakers and communicate in foreign languages with the big audience. (Will be available after reaching #2 Stretch Goal $50000).

How does it work?

  •  Speech translation process

SIGMO operates utilizing your existing mobile phone running Android or IOS operating system (We are planning to add other operating systems). SIGMO connects to the phone with Bluetooth. The translation itself is made through already existing voice translator services (like Google translate). With the help of our free of charge app on your phone, you will be able to change languages for SIGMO. Adjust the volume via app to suit your location, ambient noise levels.

  • Languages

English (US), English (UK), English (Australia), English (Canada), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (United States), Spanish (Mexico), French (France), French (Canada), Finish, German, Italian, Japanese, Chinese (China), Mandarin and Cantonese(Taiwan / Hong Kong), Catalan, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish, Portuguese (Portugal), Portuguese (Brazil), Polish, Russian, Arabic, Indonesian, Hebrew, Czech, Turkish, African, Malay, Croatian, Thai, Greek, Bulgarian, Turkish, Slovak, Hungarian, Ukranian, Hindi.  

Voice translating services are always updating, so the list of languages in SIGMO App will update automatically for free.

  • Internet connection

All you need is a data connection for “SIGMO” on you mobile phone. “SIGMO” does not require a high speed data connection. Utilising mobile internet with minimal use of traffic. Currently we are working on our biggest barrier - ensuring a possibility of downloading a voice vocabulary and using it in off-line mode.

!!!We believe that our biggest aim is ensuring a possibility of downloading a voice vocabulary and using it in off-line mode!!!

  • Battery saving

As SIGMO is connected to your mobile phone via Bluetooth which can drain a mobile phones limited battery, so SIGMO app will run in the background mode greatly increasing the batteries life. Battery consumption of your mobile is very low. We estimate the battery life of SIGMO operates 300 hours in stand-by mode and 8 hours in conversation mode. Specifications are not finalised. Technical characteristics may vary during production testing of the final prototype. 

  • Size and materials

 SIGMO’s case is made from eco-friendly and safe materials.

  • Translation mistakes

Since voice translators are not always perfect with many accents, they are continually striving to perfect speak recognition software which is constantly improving with every language. But even in this case, though with mistakes, but the meaning of translated speech will remain clear.

REWARDS

Sigmo Set in Black/White/Green: Includes - Black/White/Green Sigmo, Stainless Steel Clip, Neck Strap, Wrist Bracelet, Carrying Bag.

Aluminum Sigmo Set in Silver/Gold: Includes - Silver or Gold Aluminum Sigmo, Stainless Steel Clip, Neck Strap, Wrist Bracelet, Carrying Bag.

To order more than 1 Aluminum Set :

  1. Choose the Perk with multiple Sigmo Sets.
  2. Add $15 for every Aluminum version.

For example: You've ordered 5 Sigmo Sets and your pledge is $180. You want to get 2 ordinary Sigmo sets and 3 Aluminum Sigmo sets. So you have to add 3*$15 = $45 to your existing pledge.

How we invented SIGMO?

We travel a lot and understand frequent language barriers. It is very inconvenient to carry a large translation books and type out constant words to communicate. Therefore we have developed such voice translation device that becomes more useful! No need for expensive translation services anymore. Portable, intuitive to use and functional. We just need your assistance now in realising our idea and getting SIGMO into production and profitability!

First sketches

Our final design

What do we need funds for? 

Today we have developed several options, prototypes and promotional videos to present the latest version of our working prototype. We still have to improve an application through which SIGMO will operate with your mobile device and finalize the model of SIGMO in order to put it into mass production.

Schedule of execution phase (if our project will succeed):

1st month – finalizing the phone application, integration testing of final prototype versions

2nd month – development/testing of first production versions.

3rd month – final tests and product certification

4th month – manufacture the first batch for mass production.

5th month – delivery of SIGMO to you our backers.

Schedule of execution phase is set with reserve, because we do not want to let down our backers and eliminate possibility of delay on every stage.

We expect to launch SIGMO into mass production and our backers will be able to get new device much earlier and cheaper than those who will want to buy it in future.

Our functional prototype does everything the final SIGMO version will do.

Who we are?

David Barnett and Marti Karrer are friends from childhood. Whilst on vacation, we got an idea to create SIGMO. So now we are working full time on this project after resigning our jobs to commit our entire time to our business.

Marti – is a technology design-engineer who has already created some key advances in electronics and software engineering. Constantly involved in development and innovation over the past 3 years. David – is an entrepreneur with the experience in international trade and development. We have united our efforts to create a product, which will really assist people quickly, cheaply and accurately. Katarina Rauche – is a person full of creativity and inexhaustible energy. She is the one who designed SIGMO’s case and was engaged in our video and photo production.

Risks and Challenges

While working in the field of international trade, design and engineering, beside experience in managing business, we have also established close relations with suppliers and manufacturers whom we will need for implementation of our project. During cooperation with them, we became sure about their competence and professionalism. They, as well as we, will do everything to ensure timely development and delivery of “SIGMO”.
We have relations with a company involved in global deliveries and having storage facilities all over the world, which will make it possible for us deliver “SIGMO” to our backers to any place in the world within established time.
We believe that the biggest barrier is ensuring a possibility of downloading a voice vocabulary and using it in off-line mode. We want to be as open to our backers as possible and we will inform them about each step on the way towards realization of the project.

THANK YOU!

We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Share our concept of translation of SIGMO amongst friends and relatives in Facebook and Twitter and together we will bring SIGMO to life!

If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at info@buysigmo.com 

If you have problems with payments, please contact payments@buysigmo.com

For Press Inquiries contact press@buysigmo.com 

Press-Kit

English (US), English (UK), English (Australia), English (Canada), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (United States), Spanish (Mexico), French (France), French (Canada), Finish, German, Italian, Japanese, Chinese (China), Mandarin and Cantonese(Taiwan / Hong Kong), Catalan, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish, Portuguese (Portugal), Portuguese (Brazil), Polish, Russian, Arabic, Indonesian, Hebrew, Czech, Turkish, African, Malay, Croatian, Thai, Greek, Bulgarian, Turkish, Slovak, Hungarian, Ukranian, Hindi.  
Voice translating services are always updating, so the list of languages in SIGMO App will update automatically for free.





Internet connection

All you need is a data connection for “SIGMO” on you mobile phone. “SIGMO” does not require a high speed data connection. Utilising mobile internet with minimal use of traffic. Currently we are working on our biggest barrier - ensuring a possibility of downloading a voice vocabulary and using it in off-line mode.
!!!We believe that our biggest aim is ensuring a possibility of downloading a voice vocabulary and using it in off-line mode!!!



Battery saving

As SIGMO is connected to your mobile phone via Bluetooth which can drain a mobile phones limited battery, so SIGMO app will run in the background mode greatly increasing the batteries life. Battery consumption of your mobile is very low. We estimate the battery life of SIGMO operates 300 hours in stand-by mode and 8 hours in conversation mode. Specifications are not finalised. Technical characteristics may vary during production testing of the final prototype. 


Size and materials

 SIGMO’s case is made from eco-friendly and safe materials.


Translation mistakes

Since voice translators are not always perfect with many accents, they are continually striving to perfect speak recognition software which is constantly improving with every language. But even in this case, though with mistakes, but the meaning of translated speech will remain clear.
REWARDS
Sigmo Set in Black/White/Green: Includes - Black/White/Green Sigmo, Stainless Steel Clip, Neck Strap, Wrist Bracelet, Carrying Bag.


Aluminum Sigmo Set in Silver/Gold: Includes - Silver or Gold Aluminum Sigmo, Stainless Steel Clip, Neck Strap, Wrist Bracelet, Carrying Bag.



To order more than 1 Aluminum Set :



Choose the Perk with multiple Sigmo Sets.


Add $15 for every Aluminum version.



For example: You've ordered 5 Sigmo Sets and your pledge is $180. You want to get 2 ordinary Sigmo sets and 3 Aluminum Sigmo sets. So you have to add 3*$15 = $45 to your existing pledge.






How we invented SIGMO?
We travel a lot and understand frequent language barriers. It is very inconvenient to carry a large translation books and type out constant words to communicate. Therefore we have developed such voice translation device that becomes more useful! No need for expensive translation services anymore. Portable, intuitive to use and functional. We just need your assistance now in realising our idea and getting SIGMO into production and profitability!
First sketches



Our final design
What do we need funds for? 
Today we have developed several options, prototypes and promotional videos to present the latest version of our working prototype. We still have to improve an application through which SIGMO will operate with your mobile device and finalize the model of SIGMO in order to put it into mass production.
Schedule of execution phase (if our project will succeed):
1st month – finalizing the phone application, integration testing of final prototype versions
2nd month – development/testing of first production versions.
3rd month – final tests and product certification
4th month – manufacture the first batch for mass production.
5th month – delivery of SIGMO to you our backers.
Schedule of execution phase is set with reserve, because we do not want to let down our backers and eliminate possibility of delay on every stage.
We expect to launch SIGMO into mass production and our backers will be able to get new device much earlier and cheaper than those who will want to buy it in future.
Our functional prototype does everything the final SIGMO version will do.




Who we are?
David Barnett and Marti Karrer are friends from childhood. Whilst on vacation, we got an idea to create SIGMO. So now we are working full time on this project after resigning our jobs to commit our entire time to our business.
Marti – is a technology design-engineer who has already created some key advances in electronics and software engineering. Constantly involved in development and innovation over the past 3 years. David – is an entrepreneur with the experience in international trade and development. We have united our efforts to create a product, which will really assist people quickly, cheaply and accurately. Katarina Rauche – is a person full of creativity and inexhaustible energy. She is the one who designed SIGMO’s case and was engaged in our video and photo production.
Risks and Challenges
While working in the field of international trade, design and engineering, beside experience in managing business, we have also established close relations with suppliers and manufacturers whom we will need for implementation of our project. During cooperation with them, we became sure about their competence and professionalism. They, as well as we, will do everything to ensure timely development and delivery of “SIGMO”. We have relations with a company involved in global deliveries and having storage facilities all over the world, which will make it possible for us deliver “SIGMO” to our backers to any place in the world within established time. We believe that the biggest barrier is ensuring a possibility of downloading a voice vocabulary and using it in off-line mode. We want to be as open to our backers as possible and we will inform them about each step on the way towards realization of the project.
THANK YOU!
We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Share our concept of translation of SIGMO amongst friends and relatives in Facebook and Twitter and together we will bring SIGMO to life!
If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at info@buysigmo.com 
If you have problems with payments, please contact payments@buysigmo.com
For Press Inquiries contact press@buysigmo.com 
Press-Kit

story:
Heading: Small Business - Entrepreneurial

Fluffy Stone division of Proud Foundation, a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit LLC

What are Fluffy Stones?

  • Fluffy Stones are pet memorialization & remembrance stones
  • Fluffy Stones purpose:
    • Help people in the grieving process whose companion pets have passed on
    • Each person interacts “one-on-one” with a personal Fluffy Stone counselor throughout the grieving process
  • Join the Fluffy Stone blog to share your grieving process with others
  • Each Fluffy Stone is unique and can be custom crafted within your budget. (e.g. your pet’s cremated remains can be placed in a cored hole in the Fluffy Stone).

Who needs a Fluffy Stone?

The loss of a companion pet is a traumatic experience – for youngest child to the elderly

The elderly become very attached to their pets, sharing an unconditional love spanning many years. For many people, a Fluffy Stone, and the process of acquiring their personal Fluffy Stone, helps them through the grieving process

  • Helps the beginning of the healing process
  • Recognizing the pain and sudden loss family members feel due to the loss of a pet companion, especially elderly family members. This loss may be mediated by acquiring a Fluffy Stone on their behalf

How it works - Your personal counselor

Your personal counselor will guide you through each stage of getting your personalized Fluffy Stone. It is a statement befitting the unconditional love shared between yourself and your pet

Your personal counselor “has been there,” and relates to your experience due to the recent loss of a loved one

Lifetime membership: we anticipate adding membership benefits in the future

We treat you like family - your grieving process may be complicated and confusing but you are not alone!

For most of us our pet is truly a lost family member

The grieving process for the young and old is traumatic

Your one-on-one Fluffy Stone counselor understands this - your counselor has experienced the loss of a loved one 

Who We Are:

  • The Proud Family has been interacting with people in the memorializion and remembrance process for their loved ones since 1992
  • The grieving process is unique; hence, your Fluffy Stone is a very personal statement
  • We have been helping those who have lost loved ones for over 20 years– whether this loss is a human or a pet companion
  • We understand and feel your pain
  • We have gathered a core group of counselors who sympathize with your loss
  • We have a network of experienced Fluffy Stone craft people - from selection of natural granite stones to customizing to meet your personal requirements

The use of the Funds

  • Marketing & expansion, building personal counselor teams, office and support staff, communications
  • Computer network and data systems
  • Acquiring a cross section of inventory
  • Handling & value adding equipment, coring machine, etching equipment
  • Warehousing, distribution
  • Expand the network base for related services addressing personal needs

The Plan:

  • The market area is North America
  • Expand the initial core team and councilors

The Perks:

Donate what you can - every little bit helps. We welcome your charitable contributions 

All contributors become members of the Proud Foundation Family and can share in future opportunities and benefits.

  • A $25 contribution receives a Fluffy Stone certificate.
    • Each $25 certificate is “one assignment”
    • Assignments may be applied as a deposit for a future Fluffy Stone; or may be given (assigned) as a gift to a family member or friend
  • A $100 contribution receives a Fluffy Stone
  • A $1000 contribution receives an engraved Fluffy Stone with the pet's name

story:
Our main web site is up and running now! Please, check it out! 

www.ZeGoRobotics.com


The ZeGo bot is multifunction delta robot. And it is one of the fastest ways to get involved in DIY  robotics and 3D printing.  The ZeGo classic assembly kit comes with all of the hardware, electronics, tools and software that you need, to assemble and operate your ZeGo bot, right out  the box, including one attachment of your choice to expand the functionality of this versatile tool. Right now we have 5 different attachments and applications developed for the ZeGo bot. 

Attachments/Toolheads

PLOTTER - A drawing device for paper or a LCD sketchpad.

 WOOD BURNER - hot end device for drawing graphics on various materials.


ENGRAVER/PCB MILL -  a desktop CNC milling  attachment for  engraving PCB boards and other materials.


 PICK&PLACE - a vacuum head  an entry level “pick and place” attachment that adds a fourth rotational axis for positioning small parts and electronic components.


The combination of the PCB mill and the pick and place machine, allows you to do the electronic prototyping in house. Using these two attachments together would allow you to cut turn around time tremendously when prototyping compared to sending an order away to a fabricator. Instead you could do it all here with one robot in just a few hours time, compared to few days or even weeks time going through a shop. 

3D PRINTING ATTACHMENT . One of the most interesting applications for the ZeGo bot is the 3D printer attachment. The 3D printer is based on “FFF” technology, fused filament fabrication.It uses a filament driver that pushes the filament to the extruder which has a hot end at 185C for PLA. It extrudes through a 400 micron orifice. The printer extrudes plastic in small quantities layer by layer until your physical object is fabricated. 


So why crowd funding? We would not be able to build the community we wish to form around ZEGO robot by working alone. We need your help. The goal of our crowdfunding campaign is to foster a community around this open source fabrication tool. 


Technical Specifications

 Working volume resembles hexagonal column. Height of the column slightly varies depends on the toolhead but approx. is 230mm.  Hexagon base dimensions are illustrated below.

Build platform is made from GPO-3 fiberglass (approx 4.5mm thickness). Bed is not heated. We ensure part adhesion for 3D printing to the ground plane by applying thin layer of PVA (wood glue).

ZeGo Classic outside dimensions are: 700mm H X 345mm W X 295mm D

Top Travel Speed (mm/s):  220mm/s

Min Layer Resolution (micron):  70 microns

Positioning Precision (micron):   100 micron


Free Educational Workshops

One of the the biggest benifits of owning a ZeGo bot is access to educational workshops. As part of the campaign, we are providing free online workshops with our ZeGo classic assembly kits for our fellow TechShop members nationwide.   Each workshop is divided into four sections, lasting two hours each.  

Online workshops use multiple cameras, remote control access software and continuous guidance by our expert instructors to help you build, use and learn about your new ZeGo bot.   The four workshops are:

1) Mechanical assembly

2) Introduction to Arduino, and configuration of firmware.

3) Introduction to Gcode and the software toolchain used to operate the ZeGo robot.

4) Calibration of the machine, assembly of the 3D printer attachment, and the software toolchain for 3D printing.  

The workshops are one of the fastest ways to get involved in DIY  robotics and 3D printing.

ZEGO UBËR FAN KIT items

This items are included with each assembly kit. 

They are what make workshop experience easy and awesome.

ZeGo Keys. These hex keys are all  of the tools needed for mechanical assembly.


ZeGo Stick. Powder-coated and laser engraved thumb drive. Loaded with a Live linux distro. This system is preloaded with arduino IDE and other awesome and extremely useful opensource software. Just boot your computer from this drive and program away.


ZeGo T-Shirts


Show off your ZeGo pride and your awesomeness. Designs will be picked by you,  ZeGo community.

Graphic design done by Selocke. 


Graphic design done by Jordan Patton 


Shipping policy

Shipping fee is not included. Shipping prices vary by location and country.Unfortunately, international shipping is not as easy or inexpensive as we would like it to be. Prices vary by country and what taxes and other regulations your government has. If you order a ZeGo package to be delivered outside the USA, we ask that you assume responsibility for all these charges. After our campaign is over and we are ready to start shipping, you'll receive an invitation to go to our website and enter your shipping information to pay the appropriate amount.

Risks and challenges

We have worked out many of the logistics challenges and problems.   Most of our manufacturers and vendors are local and a large part of our fabrication is done in house. 

We are confident in this campaign and our ability to deliver.

Mishaps and setback are part of any product, but we pledge to keep you updated about any and all potential delays.


Acknowledgements.

The ZeGo was based on Rostock opensource design and co-developed with Billy Zelsnack. 

Staff at TechShop Pittsburgh.


We believe in you, the makers, innovators and early adopters. 

Thank you.

-ZeGo Robotics Team.

story:
The QUICK and DIRTY

We're making an open-source* Internet Political Database - think IMDb, but for politics instead of movies. We've already accomplished much, but we need your help to finish it.

* This is a recent decision, and will take a bit of time to impliment. Check back next week.

Check out our Legislative Word Clouds, read about what they are, then connect with us - we really want to hear from you!
(twitter, facebook, tumblr)

Here's an example Legislative Word Cloud:

You can see that, among many other topics, Huffman is concerned with water, recycling, and marijuana.

This is just the beginning!

We need money to hire people so we can do more, better, faster - and that's where you come in.

The DETAILS

WHAT IS IT, EXACTLY?

We're making a database-as-a-platform that aims to collect, collate, and link the reams of data produced by those governing our nation. Then we'll whip up some APIs, drum up some developers (both in-house and freelance), and start making sense of it.

In practice, this is has resulted in a mostly-complete database of California legislators  and legislation since 1993, and that has resulted in those "Legislative Word Clouds". We think they're really cool. Surprisingly cool, actually - they turned out way more interesting than we expected.

We've also got most of the elected positions in California back to 1996, but we need a designer to show it off, and we need the rest of the data.

So far, we've only been going after the "low-hanging fruit' - and not even all of it. To get all the fruit - which, to drop the metaphor - first means all the election information of California - we need more people.

WE NEED...

Designers, interns, and programmers - We need money to hire or donated services.

Designers to show off the data. The word clouds are beautiful, but they're just the tip of the iceberg. Our greatest need is for a great website front-end, to show the as-yet-unseen contents of the IPDb. We also need a logo!

Interns will add to the database. This involves a lot of phone calls, but thankfully, not a lot of typing - we've got some great in-house tools to turn gathered records into database data - we know exactly what needs to be done, we just need the people to do it.

Programmers because everything else is is easier, faster, and usually only possible after the engineers have gotten to it. APIs, better tools, faster code, new data pipelines...

Journalists, politicians, analysts and the public - We need your interest and your curiosity!

You are our customers. We're building a mountain of answers, but that doesn't mean we know which questions to ask. That's where you come in.

We want to know what you're curious about. We want to know what answers we should go looking for. We want your special view point on what people should pay attention to.

Vote with your money here, and with your interest on the social web. Connect with us, share what we've done with others, and share with us what you'd like us to do. We're listening.

We also need your help getting the word out!

LET'S TALK ABOUT THE REWARDS

Everything will be delivered as soon as possible - depending on which part of the earth is facing the sun, that can mean within the hour. The larger rewards will, of course, take longer, but that's our aim.

Raw data has no DRM and no license - Do with it what you will.

Raw data has all the data - ALL the words (not just those on the clouds), and can be "normalized" or the raw average. Available in many plain-text formats.

Sponsorship credit goes on like a watermark - Name, web address, sentiment - it'll go just above the "POWERED BY IPDb.US".

Dev Blog Complexity - Sponsored analytics are limited based on development and processing time, but there are no "hard and fast" rules. If your questions is too hard or too easy, we'll work it out with you - generally, more questions, different questions, or, a delay while we improve our tools.

We have more ideas, but aren't ready for them yet!

THANK YOU, AND PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD!

Thank you so very much for coming and seeing what we've got going! This is the culmination of a lot of work, and we're really proud of what we've got.

story:
About

This is a fully automatic Minigun, constructed according to the Gatling Machine Gun Principle. The body is made from wood cut out on the CNC machine. Its ammo consists of 144 shots of rubber bands. With this Rubber Band Minigun anyone can feel like Rambo, launching a rubber storm, and throwing over a pound of rubber bands at the opponent!

 

We have prepared 2 versions of the minigun - Assembled and KIT. They are also available in 2 colors.

 

If you are tearing straight into battle, then this version is for you! Assembled Minigun is ready for action. After all, there is no time for hitches on the office battlefield!

This version is painted in several layers with black water-based acrylic paint which has no smell, is not harmful in any way and is used to paint toys. All parts are painted with spray guns by professional painters.

 

 

Do you like to assemble things yourself or do you know such a person who always crafts something? We share your passion! Therefore, we developed the KIT version of the Mingun.

 

 

 

This is the best and most affordable Rubber Band Minigun on the market. Its main feature is a specially designed mechanism that allows you to charge it in a matter of minutes. You can assemble it with kids, use it as cosplay, and it's an ultimate gift.

The most advanced mechanism on the market that will allow you to quickly load your Minigun.

How to load? Put. Stretch. Click. That's it!

The design of the Rubber Band Minigun allows you to rotate the drum idle (even without loaded rubber bands) which allows you to impress others. Press the trigger to rotate the drum, and then press pusher to release rubber bands in flight. You can shoot single shots, saving ammunition and conduct aimed fire, or release an entire flurry of rubber bands at your opponent.
story_txt:
About



This is a fully automatic Minigun, constructed according to the Gatling Machine Gun Principle. The body is made from wood cut out on the CNC machine. Its ammo consists of 144 shots of rubber bands. With this Rubber Band Minigun anyone can feel like Rambo, launching a rubber storm, and throwing over a pound of rubber bands at the opponent!
 

 
We have prepared 2 versions of the minigun - Assembled and KIT. They are also available in 2 colors.
 
 
 
If you are tearing straight into battle, then this version is for you! Assembled Minigun is ready for action. After all, there is no time for hitches on the office battlefield!

story:
Summary

Everybody has a story to tell but not everyone gets a chance to share it.

We are a collection of artists, teachers, creative thinkers, and social justice advocates looking to provide spaces for the youth of St. Paul to tell their story.

We want to create a space where eight, St. Paul youth, can realize their talent, potential, and influence through the act of digital storytelling. This is why we are hosting a FREE two week digital storytelling camp where local artists mentor local youth and develop the skills necessary to showcase their voice in creative ways.

We are creating this program as an alternative to mainstream media, where we can work together to showcase media that increases the power of youth voices.

We welcome and strive to be accessible to all youth; especially low income youth, youth of color, new immigrant youth, differently-abled youth, GLBTQI youth and youth from other marginalized communities.


If you are a youth interested in being part of this camp, APPLY TODAY!


What We Need & What You Get

All of this can't be done without your generous contributions...

Here is what we need:

In order to ensure that this program remains accessible to all youth, we hope to be able to provide food, transportation, as well as access to the best equipment; all at ZERO cost to our participants. The money we receive will go to the following:

If we reach:
Our goal of $350.00, we can cover:
*Program Logistics: Rentals, Supplies and Equipment

Our goal of $550.00, we can also cover:
*Daily lunches for our youth and volunteers during our workshops portion of the program for one week.

Our goal of $850.00, we can cover:
*Fees for local artists and speakers to come present to our youth; to further inspire them to do great things.
*Miscellaneous expenses: Extra transportation passes, postage and administration fees.

If our $1,000 goal is met, we will not only be able to cover all costs and provide this camp for FREE, but we would also be able to purchase equipment that all participants can keep, in addition to the laptops they will receive. This ensures that their artistic journey can continue even when the program ends. 

We would purchase products such as:

*GoPro Cameras and Basic Audio/Video Software

We have a variety of some pretty amazing perks to choose from in return for your generous donations. 

Updated May 21, 2015

******NEW****** You also get an additional pack of 3 Dinosaur Laptop Decals starting from donations of $20!!

Here is what you will get:

For a donation of $1, you will get positive vibes coming your way!

For a donation of $5, you will get an E-card of Thanks!

For a donation of $10, you will get a Handmade Postcard created by our youth!

For a donation of $20, you will get a DVD with the completed projects! PLUS- 3-Pack of Dinasour Laptop Decals

For a donation of $50, you will get two tickets to the Science Museum of Minnesota! PLUS- 3-Pack of Dinasour Laptop Decals

For a donation of $75, you will get the Super Star Package. This includes: a DVD and a booklet of the completed projects. PLUS- 3-Pack of Dinasour Laptop Decals

For a donation of $100, you will get the Ultimate Package. This includes: a DVD, a booklet of the completed projects, and an invitation to attend the Project Showcase! PLUS- 3-Pack of Dinasour Laptop Decals

We are also sponsored by SPNN (St. Paul Neighborhood Network), a certified 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, which means most of your donations are tax deductible.

Partnerships:

Since we have started this amazing journey, to provide a quality program for our youth, we have had many organizations jump on board to help make this a successful program. Here are some of the donations we have received so far:

  • 8 Laptops have been donated courtesy of MN Computers for Schools

  • Bus passes have been donated courtesy Saint Paul Neighborhood Network

  • 20 SMM tickets have been donated courtesy of Science Museum of Minnesota
  • $75 gift certificate courtesy of Punch Pizza in St. Paul, MN

Challenges:

The only challenge we will be facing during our Digital Storytelling Initiative, is that this is our first year creating a program of this kind. At this point, we do not have a structure to work off of when creating this opportunity, but we are ready for the challenge. We have been planning since November to make this vision a reality and with all of the support and help we have been receiving, we have no doubt that this will be an incredibly successful project.

Other Ways You Can Help

    We welcome all community members to join our collective by:

    • Donating food, technology, or other supplies (also tax deductible)

    • Join us in the planning process (contact.dsi.group@gmail.com)

    • Becoming a mentor

    • Like our FaceBook page

    • Sharing our link and our story with friends and family! (http://igg.me/at/dsi) 

Thank you all for your generous contributions! We appreciate every single one of you and your efforts to make this the incredible experience we know it can be!
