story:
-- See more on Facebook and Instagram! --

 

Everyone has a gift they can share or dream they’d like to bring to life. What’s yours?  

In our hectic modern world, personal organization and productivity are a struggle. We often feel busy, but are we really productive? Finding time for you and your projects can feel nearly impossible. Fortunately, we have a tool to help you do exactly that. 

Introducing the Magna Planner, a one-of-a-kind goal planner to give life to your dream and keep you motivated along the way. 

 

 

The Magna Planner’s unique structure keenly balances daily life with long-term intentions so that goal-setting and day-planning become systematic. 

This isn’t just another generic personal organizer.  Inspired by great achievers, supported by tested methods, and built to counteract today’s distractions, the Magna Planner is a tool to help you stay focused, cultivate self-awareness, and develop a lifestyle of growing personally and living intentionally.

Writing in a paper planner engages the memory and leads you to plan more mindfully. Research shows that writing things down by hand helps you retain information better, especially when you're not relying on a phone notification to remind you of a deadline or appointment. You can keep everything in one place, rather than opening and closing multiple apps, fighting the constant temptation of distracting notifications.

 

 

 

 

Our meticulously designed system is built to keep your goal at the forefront of your mind, making sure you always stay on task. 

  •  A paper planner - Writing in a paper planner engages the memory, limits technology distractions, and holds you accountable. 
  •  Undated and Quarterly  - Each planner includes three undated months so you can start anytime. At less than 11 ounces, it's easy to carry with you. 
  •  Quick Start Guide - Get a crash course on the whole system so you can jump in right away. 
  •  Comprehensive Instructional Guide - Learn more about the best ways to apply each element, ensuring you get the most out of your planner. 
  •  Goal Mapping Workbook Section - Clearly defining your goals is key to realizing your dream. You have to know what you want before you can have it!  Breaking your project down into specific, actionable steps will help get you there sooner by giving you a clear roadmap to follow. 
  •  4 Month Calendar Views (In case you start your planner in the middle of a month) - Plan trips, track events and holidays. See your Magna Goal timeline for the quarter. 
  •  13 Weekly Spreads  - With 6 pages for every week, there's plenty of space to plan and reflect, but not so much that you spend too much time planning and not enough time acting. (Details below)
  •  Praxis Discipline Building - Praxis is the practical application of an idea. Learn to build foundational habits and routines that last to support your goals.
  •  Quarterly Review - Continually calibrate your goals and learn from yourself. Ensure you are challenging yourself just the right amount. 
  •  Extra Notes Pages -  Collect spur of the moment insights, flesh out ideas, or curate long-term lists without carrying around a second journal. 

 

Each Magna Planner is made from high-quality and environmentally-friendly materials for on-the-go planning, ensuring it will last until your project is complete. Our Manufacturer is also a proud sponsor of Trees for the Future. 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

After months of in-depth research, brainstorming sessions, and testing, we’ve broken our system down into four key pillars:  1) Dream with Purpose, 2) Plan with Flexibility, 3) Act with Resolve, 4) Reflect with Humility 

These pillars orient the elements of our system and lay the foundation for your future success and development. 

Over the course of numerous projects, we’ve seen the same issues cropping up again and again. The Magna Planner is designed to specifically address each of these, providing longterm solutions for frequent problems:

 

Problem: Lack of discernible growth or progress

Solution: Routine Building and Regular Assessments

 

 

Track progress on personal disciplines and your Magna Goal. Be intentional about self-improvement by discovering your key motivators, because sometimes, willpower needs good planning.  Praxis is the practical application of an idea. Build sustainable and foundational habits and routines that support your goal. Even our best intentions to follow daily routines and weekly rhythms can fall flat without the right logistics in place. Each quarter you'll choose habits to focus on and apply appropriate incentives or challenges to keep them going. 

 

 

Large-scale projects can take a while to come to fruition and distant goals can sometimes seem like a fantasy. In the interim, it’s easy to get discouraged. An improperly set goal can zap motivation, leaving you listless or scattered, ensuring you never reach your dreams. 

The Magna Planner counters this with frequent self-assessment, based on the highly regarded OKR (Objectives and Key Results) system. Thanks to daily, weekly, and quarterly reviews, you can more easily track your achievements and find that sense of accomplishment that will keep you going. The review system is also intentionally designed to help you discover how you work best, making you more productive over the longterm. Continually recalibrate and realign your mission and make sure you're operating in your Magna Zone, feeling capable and challenged. 

Regular reflection makes you more aware of your own habits and helps you learn from yourself, cultivating discipline and breeding success. 

 

 

Problem: Losing sight of your driving goal

Solution: Weekly Task Lists

 

 

With big projects, it’s easy to get caught up in the details. You can quickly find yourself spending too much time on something insignificant and falling behind schedule. Even worse, your motivation gets lost in the shuffle. If you have ever found yourself in this situation, it’s possible you may need to reprioritize.

The Magna Planner is unique in how it divides your main goal into weekly organized tasks. It’s structured to help you build a habit of making consistent progress every day. This way, you never lose sight of your dream because it’s a part of your daily life. 

Track all your actionable items and measure your progress in one comprehensive spread. 

 

Problem: Planning down to the minute

Solution: Time Blocking  

 

 

No one likes to be micromanaged, so why do we do it with our time? Some productivity tips out there recommend you plan your day in one hour, fifteen, and even five-minute increments. It doesn’t work. You spend more time making plans than you do executing them.

With the Magna Planner’s unique system of time blocking, planning should not take longer than a few minutes. This leaves your day more open and flexible in order to better address daily responsibilities or unforeseen circumstances.

 

Problem: Lack of direction or motivation

Solution: Mission Statement

 

 

We’ve all felt directionless after graduating from school, shifting careers, or entering new life phases like marriage or parenting. The sense of purpose and security you once had is gone. You find yourself with atypical amounts of time and without a clear path forward.

The Magna Planner's workbook section leads you through creating a mission-driven goal that guides your day to day routine. By clearly defining your dreams, you can more easily identify precise goals, flesh out the details, and form an effective plan of attack. This will allow you to focus on the impact of your success, helping you stay motivated and avoid excuses. 

 

 

We’re Gilbert and Cassandra Cardenas, a husband and wife entrepreneurial team passionate about encouraging others to share their gifts. After spending hundreds of hours studying different theories and trying out various organizers, we found nothing quite fit our needs. So, we created our own.

Using the Magna Planner, we’ve taken control of our lives - launching new projects, creating better daily routines, and finding a thriving work-life balance. After our success, we decided to share our method.

No one should have to delay their dreams. You can make progress and there’s no reason you have to keep feeling stuck. It’s time to stop waiting for other people to give you permission and blaze your own trail. We're here to help and cheer you on, because your gifts are meant to be given. 

 

 

GIVING BACK

 

After 6 years of active service, transitioning out of the military was extremely difficult. I had to find my identity again. I needed to relearn to structure my life around different expectations and realities. I needed another mission to get me motivated and back on track.

The Magna Life Giving Program will donate a planner to veterans in need of a new mission. A purpose-driven mission is so important, and no one understands that more than servicemen and women. We hope the Magna Planner can help empower veterans to develop their own structure and purpose. When they embark on their new mission, then we have accomplished ours. 

If you would like to personally donate a planner to a veteran, please email us at hello@magnalife.co and we will provide you with more details. 

 

 

All funds raised will go towards fulfilling pledges, shipping fees, startup costs, and providing the most efficient service possible. We are currently in the process of manufacturing and fulfilling current pledges. 

If you’re ready to jumpstart your dreams, develop better habits, and create a more ideal lifestyle for yourself then we’d love for you to join us. Become a part of the Magna Planner team by signing up as a backer and checking out our website at: https://magnalife.co.

 

Whether or not you can contribute, help us spread the word so we can help as many people as possible with the Magna Planner. 

Share our project on social media, email us a message titled “SHARED!” to hello@magnalife.co with a screenshot or link where you shared it, and we'll send you a free PDF Bundle including the Dream with Purpose chapter excerpt, Mission Statement Worksheet, and Weekly Layout Pages.

 

  -- See more on Facebook and Instagram! --

 

REWARD TIERS

 

Free Domestic Shipping for all Rewards!*

 

*International shipping is available for several countries on select reward tiers. If you don't see your country listed, send us a message and we'll be happy to add it for you. 

 

TIMELINE

 

Risks and challenges

 

Our number one goal is to get your planner to you as soon as possible. The biggest risks from crowdfunding are usually manufacturing and shipping. The good news is we already have planners in production and are testing shipping with a small test batch. 

We want the Magna Planner to be the most effective, simplest tool for the job and our delivery should reflect that.

Please note that pledges received from InDemand are submitted to us every 4 weeks.

The good news is we already have planners in production and are testing shipping with a small test batch. We want the Magna Planner to be the most effective, simplest tool for the job and our delivery should reflect that.Please note that pledges received from InDemand are submitted to us every 4 weeks.

story:
Features


The board uses MT7621 high performance router SoC, supports open source  OpenWRT OS. The board's dimension is relatively small 16cm x 10cm, about three credit card in a row.

The key features are:

  • MT7621A Dual-Core 880Mhz (4 threads)
  • 256MB Memory (up to 512MB)
  • 2.4G WiFi (supports IEEE 802.11b/g/n, up to 300Mbps)
  • 5G WiFi (supports IEEE 802.11a/n/ac, up to 867Mbps)
  • WAN port x2, LAN port x4(both are 1000Mbps)
  • SATA 3.0  x2(supports 3.5 inch HDD)
  • USB3.0 x1
  • microSD x1
  • RTC battery for storage application
  • 30 Expansion Ports(Including USB, I2S, JTAG, UART, GPIO)
  • 16MB SPI NOR Flash(Optional for bigger size Nand Flash)
  • 4-pins serial debug port
  • RF Antenna Connector x4
  • WPS/GPIO Key  x1，Reset Key  x1
  • Power LED x1, SATA LED x 1, WiFi LED x 2, LAN LED x4

Why did we decide to develop the WiTi board?

    I hope to be able to deploy a reliable and low-power storage server, which is used to host the company’s CMS and git code repositories  instead of the heavy, high energy consumption PC server. Similarly, I also hope that families have their own storage server to share their beautiful music and wonderful pictures and videos anywhere at any time. I have used some of the other storage products before. Although some of them are very good, but none of them can meet my needs. I need a product which can meet my needs and at the same time I can freely modify it . When I saw the specification of MT7621,I felt very excited. I believe I can build a team to develop such an open platform. So people with similar ideas can concentrate on developing the real final products without wasting too much time!


What's the status of the board?

    We have manufactured the WiTi board  twice  10pcs for each before the campaign begin. 


Now, We use our WiTi board as router in office everyday(I'm so proud!). 



    We need some funds to do a massive production, design our own cases, software, etc. The hardware and firmware are all ready and carefully tested. We create our official forum discussing our products. We will open source our software and schematics, some of them already published at our own ftp server. You can even make your firmware right now! We will keep improving our docs & Wikis.

What can be done on the WiTi platform?


    Of course, this board can be used as a good performance router. With the two SATA3 ports on board, we can easily create Soft-Raid1 by mdadm tools. After installing Samba service and NFS service, the board turns into a reliable storage server. We can also install CMS or git code repositories on the board. Wow! This board can provide all functions I need, and the consumption of electricity is very low. 
    What’s more, WiTi has 30 expansion ports(including USB, JTAG, UART, I2S, GPIO..). We can connect to Arduino by USB extension, so that WiTi can connect to thousands of sensors; we can make WiTi as a nice wireless HiFi with the I2S extension; we can also use the GPIO extension to control electric light, Motor, and so on.


What will you get?


Transparent Acrylic Case x1

When will we start shipping?

Within one month after this campaign, and the exact time will be announced on the website(http://mqmaker.com)

Where to get technical support?

E-Mail: support@mqmaker.com
Community: http://forum.mqmaker.com
Twitter: @mqmaker
Facebook: @mqmaker
G+: @mqmaker
I hope there will be a lot of geeks loving this platform, a lot of fun application will be born here.

Thanks you!


Disclaimer: ‘Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.’

story:
CHUWI UBook Pro In Mass Production Now!

 

 
 
 




Join Our Group For The Latest News of UBook Pro

Our official UBook Pro Discussion Group is now open for backers! We sincerely invite all of our UBook Pro backers to hang out with us there and ask questions/troubleshoot with other fellow backers. Your voice will be a great help in making our products better and reshaping our vision.


UBook Pro is a compact, lightweight, portable 2-in-1 Windows tablet that outperforms traditional mid-range laptops. It comes with a 12.3-inch multitouch screen and a unique u-shaped kickstand. Additionally, UBook Pro also has a large battery for a whole working day and runs the versatile Windows 10 operating system. UBook Pro will be your trusted work/life companion.



 

Work



Portable



Entainment



 








After the widely praised UBook 2-in-1 tablet that we launched in early 2019, there was a demand for a successor to the UBook series. We created exactly what consumers wanted, the fully refined UBook Pro. Utilizing all the benefits of the previous model, we greatly improved UBook in all aspects, rethinking the traditional price/performance ratio of 2-in-1 tablets.

1. Breakthrough Performance Improvements

We created the UBook to breeze through daily office work while also handling some moderate Adobe programs with high efficiency. With this in mind we decided to adopt the latest generation of Intel’s Core M processors, the m3-8100Y which is the best solution for the UBook Pro. This means we can create a product that not only runs cool, but does so silently with a fanless design.



2. Follow The Classic U-shaped Kickstand

UBook Pro utilizes a new lighter, yet sturdy u-shaped kickstand. This saves space internally, allowing a larger battery and better cooling system, leading to better performance.



3. A Screen Built For Productivity

Microsoft started the 3:2 aspect ratio trend with their Surface Pro series, since then few companies have followed Microsoft’s lead. We find this to be a shame as we believe 3:2 to be the superior format when it comes to productivity on laptops. Compared to 16:9, 3:2 provides a more desirable reading environment, it’s not hard to see the benefits.



4. The Ports You Need

UBook Pro is equipped with a vast I/O, featuring 1* DC prot for charing, 2* USB-A, 1* USB-C with support for PD charging, 1* Micro HDMI, 1* 3.5mm headphone jack and a DC input for charging. Additionally, you’ll find a TF card reader and a docking connector. No dongles, no hassle!








 

  • Remarkable Portability & Lightweight Design

At just 9mm thick and weighing in at only 780g, you can effortlessly take UBook Pro anywhere you go with absolute ease. The precision CNC milled housing not only makes UBook beautiful, it also fits comfortably in your hands.

 

  • The Unique “U-Shaped” kickstand

We went to extreme lengths to ensure the UBook Pro would be comfortable and convenient to use while providing an iconic, timeless design. The flexible, ultra-slim U-shaped kickstand allowed us to free up internal space, giving us the ability to install the extremely high performance hardware.

With a full 145 degrees of motion, the angled kickstand allows you to switch between laptop, tablet or workstation mode, giving you full control of your workflow.

 

  • First-class Typing

The redesigned keyboard is treated with a high-performance polyurethane coating to resist spills. In addition, the keyboard is designed with optimal key spacing for fast and fluid typing and a larger glass trackpad for precision control.

 

 

  • An Head-turning Display

Equipped with a 12.3 inch IPS FHD display, UBook Pro provides a sharper contrast and gives natural, delicate colors. iPads use a 4:3 aspect ratio, which we found to be too square. MacBooks use 16:10, which we found to be too wide. After much thought and deliberation, we decided to adopt a 3:2 aspect ratio which is far superior and appropriate for use on the Windows operating system.

 

  • Amazing Fully Laminated Technology

Featuring a fully laminated LCD display which can greatly reduce glare to make your pictures even more transparent and colorful - perfect for indoor and outdoor use.

 

  • 2048 Levels Of Pressure Sensitivity

Accompanied with the 2048 levels of pressure sensitivity, the HiPen H5 will supercharge your creativity. With palm blocking technology, it has been carefully designed to bring you a truly natural writing experience.

 

  • Ready For Optimal Performance with an Intel core Processor

The incredible Intel Core m3-8100Y processor is produced with 14nm technology, offering 2 cores, 4 threads and a 3.4GHz turbo frequency, it is the best choice for a 2-in-1 convertible device. Backed by the powerful Intel UHD Graphics 615, it can easily support 4K videos and run some 3D games.

No matter the task, UBook pro handles it all with ease.

 

  • Fanless Silent Design

Thanks to the excellent hardware layout and Intel’s high performance processor with low power consumption, UBook Pro doesn’t need fans to stay cool, meaning it stays perfectly silent. No more whirring!

 

 

  • Fast Running, Large Capacity

With 8GB of LPDDR3 Ram onboard, the UBook Pro offers seamless multitasking and lag free switching between multiple resource hungry program.

The 256GB M.2 SATA solid state drive (SSD) performs up to 5 times faster than a traditional hard drive (HDD). This enables rapid boot times, apps launch instantly and larger files open at blazing speeds.

 

  • All The Ports You Need

Despite the body of UBook Pro being so small, we have never compromised on I/O. The two full sized USB-A ports allow you to connect most peripherals. In addition, connecting to a TV or monitor has never been easier with the inclusion of a micro HDMI port, ideal for presentations, galleries and spreadsheets.

To provide a completely future-proof experience, we also included a fully functional USB-C 3.0, capable of 5 gbps transfer speeds that also doubles up as a secondary charging port. What’s more, you can easily connect it to a projector or a hub.

 

  • Always Stay Powered & Last for 8 hours

Endurance is the strength of UBook Pro. The remarkable battery life is achieved with a 38Wh high-density Li-polymer battery and the ultra efficient processor, providing more than 8 hours of battery life; it will never let you down.


*Battery test data was obtained from CHUWI Labs. The actual electricity consumption is determined by the workload.




 

Tell a friend - and help us to help you! You can make a difference in growing the CHUWIUBook Pro online community. If you like the Chuwi UBook Pro, please hit one of the buttons below and tag your friends or colleagues who need this!






Established in 2004 and located in Shenzhen of China, CHUWI has built a reputation for creating great tablet devices in our home country over the past fifteen years. We are always committed to designing and producing products that meet our customers’ requirements, allowing our supporters to enjoy our products in a new way.

Although the UBook project was successfully launched at the beginning of this year, we never gave up on the exploration of our users needs. We carefully listen to the recommendations made by each backer and test its feasibility.

In order to achieve such an excellent product, our engineers have worked tirelessly to trial and test each aspect of the UBook Pro; from the earliest concept sketch to 3D printed models and structural design, through to today where we have a completed prototype. Now we need your support to bring this product to the masses, all funds raised during this campaign will go directly to the production of UBook Pro, allowing us to bring this fantastic product to you! We look forward to your support and engagement throughout this campaign.

Let's do this together!







  • About the delay

We aim to provide rewards as scheduled, however, please understand that delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues. Including:

▲Certification delays
▲Production delays
▲Quality control problem
▲Suppliers are unable to provide accessories on time

We’ve done our best to forecast demand and we’ve learned a lot from past projects. However,sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark.If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem to ensure you are with us every step of the way. We know that some crowdfunders have ended badly in the past - but never from CHUWI - we’ll always keep in touch with you, and welcome messages from you too!

  • About the product

Product specifications may change to ensure that the product is made as best as possible. If any changes occur, we will notify users in the “UPDATES” area of the crowdfunding page.

  • About the price

If the number of backers exceeds expectations or the exchange rate fluctuates significantly, the regular selling price may be lower than the planned selling price.

Since this is a crowdfunding project, please understand the above matters in advance.
Please, do not hesitate to contact us at crowdfunding@chuwi.com. We are looking forward to answer any of your questions. Thank you

story:
Please visit holdaforum.com for more information.

 

Problems when presenting.

We've all been there—every presenter knows that panicked feeling while setting-up for a meeting.  How many times have you fumbled over the projector? Can’t locate the right dongle? Or can't figure out the Wi-Fi password?

The same technology that was supposed to make presenting a snap, has gotten in the way and become a complex mess.

Don’t you think it should be easier by now to present in person? We agree. It’s why we created Forum.

What is Forum?

Forum™ is a software solution that eliminates the technological problems experienced when presenting in person. By using the most common technologies available (Wi-Fi & browser), Forum unifies all the varying devices, platforms and connectors so you can focus on connecting with your audience.

Who needs a Forum?

We think everyone needs a Forum, but it's really great for any professional who simply wants to share a presentation, and wants to do it with ease. 

  • Sales executives 
  • Professional keynote speakers 
  • Road-warrior business execs 
  • Professors & teachers
  • Coaches & traveling teams

story:
Hello beautiful people, how many of you 3D artists wish you could easily show others what you do but had to say "oh, it won't load on my phone", "I don't have wifi", "wish I had a computer so you can see it better"? We're in 2017, how is this still happening?? Not anymore!

I'm a 3D generalist and technical artist and I'd been waiting for an app that would let me show my work easily without internet and anywhere anytime but it never came, not like I wanted it anyways. So I decided that I must create one myself, one that catters to all my needs and that would let me show off my work in the best way possible, and in the process of thinking about it I thought that I'm probably not the only 3D artist that would love this so I'm making it for all of us. It still needs some work though and even though I love working on this I'm a human that needs to eat and a place to live in order to keep working on it so here I am.

You can use it as of now at this very moment

The alpha version is up in Google Play here. If this gets funded by mid-may then I will be able to have the finished version (with updates to add new features still coming) by end of June.

Features  

As it is right now, the features are:  

  • Import pre-triangulated objs
  • Import fbxs
  • Import Unity Asset Bundles (with animations)
  • Automatically import textures using Unity Standard shader material (except normal maps for now, they need a special treatment)
  • Change shader using JMO's shader pack with matcaps
  • Change skybox
  • Blur / sharpen skybox with a slider
  • See the model's wireframe and change it's color (it doesn't follow the animation yet)
  • Show/hide a cylindrical base
  • Rotate, pan and zoom camera

To load the files you just ned to put them in a folder that the app creates inside your phones internal memory and run the app. I'm going to implement faster and more practical ways of getting the files there rather than do it manually, but this is how it works at the moment.

Features next on the list (to be done before launch):  

  • Import your own skyboxes
  • Read normal maps
  • Better skyboxes than the ones you see in the video
  • Improve camera controls (they're a bit janky right now but functional)
  • Light presets  
  • Improve UI (a lot, it'll be way prettier, I promise)
  • Improve optimization  
  • The wireframe should follow the animation (as it is right now it instances two models, they should be playing the same frame of animation at all times)
  • Darken / illuminate skybox  
  • Be able to save what shader is applied to each model  

Other neat features that'll be added later on [NOT included with the free version]:   

  • Be able to download directly from the app from Dropbox or Google Drive
  • Be able to create your own light presets in-app 
  • VR compatibilty  
  • Other cool shaders from JMO  
  • Scan your bussiness card with a QR code to load your model  with AR (thanks TeriyakiStyle)
  • Your suggestion, maybe ?  
  • A lighter less robust version if people want it ?

Right now to import your stuff you have to put it in a specific folder in your phone, but I'm going to add a way so that when you plug your phone to your computer you can just right click the items you want to transfer and it'll automatically send them to the correct folder, and something similar for when you download them directly from your phone to avoid having to put them there manually.

It's going to be freeee with no ads - $5 for eternal updates

The app is going to be free with no ads, all the features and a limitation of 4 model slots as it is for launch. To get updates and unlimited slots you'll need to get the $5 version. I'll still update the free version with bug fixes and stuff but no new features.

The more this campaign is funded the more features I can add to the free version. I want to make it accessible for everyone but I need to eat and get a roof over my head. If you're a student or can't spare $5 then you can get the full version for free if you message me, but if you can afford the $5 fee then I would really appreciate it and you'll be supporting a hungry dev :)

I need testers. And you can try it out right now

Besides having to meet my needs as a human, I also need testers, so even if you cannot help me with money you can help me test it, all testers that do get back to me with feedback about it will get the pro version for free. To become a tester or try it out you just need to get in here (or just download it and send me a message with your feedback) :D

What do testers do? You just install the app and use it, then tell me all you see wrong with it, that's it.  

I have iOS / Windows phone, what about me? :(  

I'm focusing first in making it work for the Android platform since that's the one I have, but I plan to make it available for iOS and Windows phone in the future if I have the opportunity, once everything is working great on Android. Sorryyy

Open for suggestions, would love to hear your feedback

If you would like to see something in the app then please let me know. This doesn't mean that it'll be added, but I'll certainly consider it.

Feedback about the app and campaign are welcomed and encouraged.

Why do I need funding?

I need funding because I need to eat and pay rent so I can mantain myself and work in the app. I'm in Canada, graduated this last December and have no work permit so I cannot work locally, I'm a freelancer (I don't need a work permit as long as I'm not competing with the local job market). So I cannot work on this as much as I would like because I need to focus on other things as well (to cover living expenses and debt), I still am but slower than what I would like be.

The idea of having the perks set like this is so that you can see how your investment is being spent.

One dollar helps, it does make a difference. 1 + 1 + 1 + 1 + 1 + 1 ... it adds up. I set the app free because I want it to be accessible to everyone but if you have one dollar to spare and you think it's a cool app then I would really appreciate it if you help me backing the project.

1 CAD = 
14.5 MEX
0.74 USD
0.7 EUR

*When you get to the page where you input your info it says you can pay with credit card only, but it should accept debit card as well.

If you don't want to have to create an Indiegogo campaign or rather use Paypal then you can through here (just make sure to include your email so I can contact you). You'll still get the perks and I'll update here every time someone backs through there :)
 

Sharing is caring

Please share, one of the best ways to help me out for free is to share this, it only takes a minute and it helps way more than you would think.

Risks and challenges

The main risk I see right now is that the testing phase takes a little bit more time than what I'm expecting it to, but to address this I'm being honest with you and letting you know that it might take me until June to be able to launch if things don't go the way I'm planning them to.

One of the main risks was being able to import FBXs but that's been covered, you can import FBXs now! :D

I might or might not be able to include particle systems, depends on Unity's limitations, but I think it's very possible. I'm not sure yet though, they imported once in the editor and then it stopped working so I don't know yet, that's why it's in this section.

tl;dr

Cool app for 3D artists to show their work while offline on mobile, I need funding to survive while making it, it's gonna be free and dope. Please share :)

 

*I modelled, textured, rigged and animated the models you see in the video (except the Mariachi's texture)
story_txt:
Hello beautiful people, how many of you 3D artists wish you could easily show others what you do but had to say "oh, it won't load on my phone", "I don't have wifi", "wish I had a computer so you can see it better"? We're in 2017, how is this still happening?? Not anymore!I'm a 3D generalist and technical artist and I'd been waiting for an app that would let me show my work easily without internet and anywhere anytime but it never came, not like I wanted it anyways. So I decided that I must create one myself, one that catters to all my needs and that would let me show off my work in the best way possible, and in the process of thinking about it I thought that I'm probably not the only 3D artist that would love this so I'm making it for all of us. It still needs some work though and even though I love working on this I'm a human that needs to eat and a place to live in order to keep working on it so here I am.You can use it as of now at this very momentThe alpha version is up in Google Play here. If this gets funded by mid-may then I will be able to have the finished version (with updates to add new features still coming) by end of June.Features  As it is right now, the features are:  
Import pre-triangulated objs
Import fbxs
Import Unity Asset Bundles (with animations)
Automatically import textures using Unity Standard shader material (except normal maps for now, they need a special treatment)
Change shader using JMO's shader pack with matcaps

Change skybox
Blur / sharpen skybox with a slider
See the model's wireframe and change it's color (it doesn't follow the animation yet)
Show/hide a cylindrical base
Rotate, pan and zoom camera
To load the files you just ned to put them in a folder that the app creates inside your phones internal memory and run the app. I'm going to implement faster and more practical ways of getting the files there rather than do it manually, but this is how it works at the moment.Features next on the list (to be done before launch):  
Import your own skyboxes
Read normal maps
Better skyboxes than the ones you see in the video
Improve camera controls (they're a bit janky right now but functional)
Light presets  
Improve UI (a lot, it'll be way prettier, I promise)
Improve optimization  
The wireframe should follow the animation (as it is right now it instances two models, they should be playing the same frame of animation at all times)
Darken / illuminate skybox  
Be able to save what shader is applied to each model  
Other neat features that'll be added later on [NOT included with the free version]:   
Be able to download directly from the app from Dropbox or Google Drive
Be able to create your own light presets in-app 
VR compatibilty  
Other cool shaders from JMO  
Scan your bussiness card with a QR code to load your model  with AR (thanks TeriyakiStyle)
Your suggestion, maybe ?  
A lighter less robust version if people want it ?
Right now to import your stuff you have to put it in a specific folder in your phone, but I'm going to add a way so that when you plug your phone to your computer you can just right click the items you want to transfer and it'll automatically send them to the correct folder, and something similar for when you download them directly from your phone to avoid having to put them there manually.It's going to be freeee with no ads - $5 for eternal updatesThe app is going to be free with no ads, all the features and a limitation of 4 model slots as it is for launch. To get updates and unlimited slots you'll need to get the $5 version. I'll still update the free version with bug fixes and stuff but no new features.The more this campaign is funded the more features I can add to the free version. I want to make it accessible for everyone but I need to eat and get a roof over my head. If you're a student or can't spare $5 then you can get the full version for free if you message me, but if you can afford the $5 fee then I would really appreciate it and you'll be supporting a hungry dev :)I need testers. And you can try it out right nowBesides having to meet my needs as a human, I also need testers, so even if you cannot help me with money you can help me test it, all testers that do get back to me with feedback about it will get the pro version for free. story:
FOLDABLEOFFICE  is by far the simplest yet most practical folded object ever conceived by the WOOD-SKIN team. With a clever design, it transforms in just a few steps, from workstation to space divider. It is realised with beautiful materials, in Italy, via WOOD-SKIN®’s patented manufacturing process.

WORKSTATION MODE - Beautiful, easy and practical, in a few steps you can have your work space set up. Pens, pencils and notebooks always within reach. A dedicated space for everything, from your smartphone to the ever essential post-it note.

 

 

FUNCTIONAL DIVIDER MODE - It is rather normal to live with other people in the house or having to share your desk at the office. FOLDABLEOFFICE  provides you with a solution to find your focus, thanks to a comfortable corner made with acoustic felt which offers a computer stand, pin-board, and more.

 

 


 

 

Elevate your laptop to avoid overheating and improve posture. Healthier posture for a better life.

 

LAPTOP STAND FLAPS - The flaps are an important key feature, giving you the comfort of keeping your laptop secure and in place whilst also allowing the FOLDABLE OFFICE to hold  laptops of varying sizes.

FOLDABLEOFFICE will make moving between meetings, or from one room to another a pleasure. Find your privacy bringing everything with you with ease thanks to the handles on the side and the tray inspired design.

 

 

                   

             

 

At home  

Working from home with all the necessary.

 

If you don't feel sharing dinner with the rest of the family.

 

At the office 

Find your space in an open desk or move with ease during a back to back meeting day.

 

Erika on the right is keeping her back straight and her desk tidy, can't say the same of Sirio in front of her…That walnut veneer on the blue desk! Looking great

 

We know the future is going to be different, at WOOD-SKIN we believe the most important thing it is to empower everyone with the right tools to excel, and find your very own perfect balance between work/life/study.

Bookstand

 

With mouse and keyboard 

Comfortably working with your mouse and keyboard.

 

The FOLDABLEOFFICE is made with premium materials ideal to be clean frequently, keep it at home to create your own super-productive workspace, or bring it at home to make sure you can move easily between meetings with all your stuff. The teenager homeschooling, the freelancer spending the day in a cafe, or the mom finally taking that french class she wanted to for a long time. The FOLDABLEOFFICE  has been designed with an open mind and for open use. Super intuitive use, designed for all ages.

 

It really just takes SECONDS, the WOOD-SKIN® technology allows us to embed very resistant textile hinges within the rigid materials so to offer a sturdy design that you can fold thousands of times.

 

 

Custom sized bag

We have created a custom carry canvas bag in organic cotton to take your own FOLDABLEOFFICE with you wherever you go. With a weight of 2,2 kg and its ultra-slim design, it is very easy to walk to the office with it or put it in the car for a week of remote working.

 

You can choose among Indian Rosewood/Planked Oak/Smoke Grey/Cherry Blush veneers and Black laminate finishes with a touch of yellow/green/blue MDF base material.

The interior layer uses a thick grey recycled synthetic felt providing comfortable acoustic properties.

 

 

Indestructible

We had fun testing it first with beta users and friends, here you can see an angry stress test of the final version with weights well above 3kg (more than double a normal laptop).

 

We are glad to give you the possibility to customise your FOLDABLEOFFICE.  Add a personal touch or a special message with a free of charge engraving for Double, Business, and Enterprise packs. We will produce and engrave personally your piece in our factory near Milan.

Purchase of a double-pack allows you name engraving.

Purchase of a business-pack allows you logo engraving with text/name in two different spots:

The large area on the left will be more visible in the FUNCTIONAL DIVIDER MODE while the smaller engraving spot on the right will be the only one visible with the FOLDABLEOFFICE  in WORKSTATION MODE.

 

 

The WOOD-SKIN INSIDE team is a group of talented designers within our company, this thinks thank job it is to help brands easily integrate the WOOD-SKIN® signature textile hinge into their products. From years of experience developing origami products with top firms such as Zaha Hadid Architects, the MIT self-assembly lab, BMW, Pininfarina, and more we have decided to come up with a product for everybody, starting from our own needs during the recent forced periods of working from home we developed a solution able to help you juggle this fluid and ever-changing work life.

Thanks to our in-house built software, we can control seamlessly 3D complex surfaces and their direct 2D transposition.

 

WOOD-SKIN®

WOOD-SKIN® was founded in 2013 in Milan to help architects and designers around the world bridge the gap between digital representation and architectural feasibility. The patented WOOD-SKIN® process makes rigid surfaces flexible and flat surfaces three-dimensional, giving volume, dynamism and "soul" to a multitude of materials that industry and technology have traditionally relegated to the two-dimensional state. We are a heterogeneous company made up of architects, designers and engineers united by a shared passion and a particular attention to materials, details, digital manufacturing and software.

Visit: wood-skin.com

 

MATEREA.INDUSTRIES

A flexible factory for developing custom products and manufacturing processes with new tools for companies that want to catch up with the present and anticipate the future.

Thanks to our technological resources and cross-disciplinary know-how, Materea is able to unlock the potential of Business 4.0 in every company. 

Visit: materea.industries

FOLDABLE OFFICE is currently in production phase.

After a successful campaign on Kickstarter we have started producing the first pieces. We are really proud that we are keeping faith to our production plan and that our first pieces are turning out great

 

We have undergone extensive product comparison work with the current market, listing the important features where FOLDABLEOFFICE excels to enable you to make the best choice:

 

 

 

GET YOURS NOW!

 

 

 

Visit our website: https://www.foldableoffice.xyz/

 

The FOLDABLEOFFICE is at a very advanced stage of development. The current prototypes, at their third iteration, are fully working in all the required features. Onto of that, every single component of the FOLDABLEOFFICE is made in-house and through a process that has been already performed numerous times by the WOOD-SKIN® team.

Long-lasting design

Materials are carefully picked from trusted and sustainable suppliers. These materials are made for the furnishing industry making FOLDABLEOFFICE a durable, and long-lasting object. The signature WOOD-SKIN® textile hinge makes the FOLDABLEOFFICE a hardware-free object which therefore avoids the annoying brakes and dysfunctions. Ultimately, the design has been conceived as flat and compact, making it easy to store and when you move and change lifestyle.

 

Reusability and recyclability

The design has been conceived as flat and compact to go around effortlessly in the house or office. Additionally, during the initial testing of the product, we already discovered more possible uses than the advertised one (such as book holder, mouse pad, etc...) making the object's life longer and customisable.

 

Sustainable materials

Materials are very carefully picked from sustainable partners, often using recycled materials such as the coloured MDF or the ALPI wood veneer.

 

Environmentally friendly factories

Our factory is located in the north of Italy where laws about environmental processes are strict and very much taken into consideration by us. Our production process is very lean and compact making the footprint minimal. The WOOD-SKIN® digital manufacturing process allows us to have minimal production waste which, when present, is used to heat up the factory for the winter. We have always valued the beauty of natural materials and we make sure that our wood comes from certified forests. Since January 2020 we have joined the long list of FSC®-certified Italian companies (FSC® C154721). The materials we use for the creation of WOOD-SKIN® composite come from forests where natural diversity is protected and preserved and the rights of workers and local communities are respected. Contact us to receive the updated list of FSC® materials. The Forest Stewardship Council® is an international nongovernmental organisation that promotes environmentally appropriate, socially beneficial, and economically viable management of the world’s forests. To learn more, visit www.fsc.org

 

Sustainable Distribution

We prioritise shipping companies with solid environmental plans, choosing to package exclusively in recycled materials.

 

We started a collaboration with an Italian firm, supporting farmers who want to plant fruit trees, financing their work in the early years, when the trees are not yet productive. Thanks to Treedom, we already have a tiny forest composed of 400 trees, that will grow with us and our projects in the years to come. We have committed to planting 1 tree for every 10m2 of WOOD-SKIN® produced for each project.

story:
A better search engine.

Most search engines use you as the product to be sold to advertisers. Your personal data is harvested for their benefit and your screen is filled with ads they want you to click. Better Internet Search is different.

  • You are the customer - not the product.
  • We are 100% ad-free
  • We preserve your privacy.

The company was set up in 2019 by a successful technology entrepreneur with the support from the Next Generation Internet Trust. The aim was simple, to use a different business model for search so the focus could shift to delivering the best results for the user rather than catering for the advertiser.

Why are we crowdfunding?

Some people told us that a small start-up could not possibly build their own search engine - it wouldn't work, it would take many years, it would cost tens of millions ... some have even laughed out loud at the idea!  However, we worked exclusively with people that believe in us, and we have been able to create a better search engine that is ready to be shared. This crowdfunding is not really about raising money, it is about building a foundation of users that believe in us and our vision. From this foundation we aim to build a business with global impact.

By participating in this crowdfunding you are demonstrating your support for us, as well as contributing to the operational costs of running the platform for our first users. In return for your support we will give you access to our unique search engine and you can be proud of being one of our very first users and supporters.

We care about the future of the internet and have signed the  Contract for the Web pioneered by Tim Berners-Lee. The Web belongs to all of us and should not be controlled by the commercial agendas of large corporations as it is today. If you are the type of person that cares about data privacy and the future of the internet, and would like to see a more user focussed search engine flourish,  then you are the type of customer we want.

What rewards do we offer?

  • Full access to our ad-free privacy-preserving search engine.
  • For as little as £10 you can have many months of ad-free searching.
  • For as little as £50 you, your family and friends can share the equivalent of up to a year* of ad-free searching (*based on single user when not shared).
  • You will have full access to our web, news, images and video searches.
  • We provide you with search tokens that automatically power the search engine
  • You can use our search engine on your desktop, laptop, tablet and smartphone.
  • You won't see any ads so you can avoid those impulse buy.

Risks & challenges

The search engine completed its beta phase and has been tested with over 100 users. The feedback was excellent and so we have decided to launch to a small number of users this year (i.e. before Christmas) via this Indiegogo campaign. The first live commercial users are now onboard, however we have not fully tested the scaleability of our technology for much larger user numbers and so we aim to expand subscriber numbers slowly and monitor the stress levels on our platform. We have had two small service outages during beta testing but we are confident we have fixed these problems. However, we are a small team with limited support resources and cannot guarantee 24/7 support should a problem arise - but will always use our best efforts to fix any service problems. 

During 2021 we aim to roll-out new methods to top-up tokens at no direct cost to the user. However, we do not wish to set dates (or expectations) as these are new business models with with some technical challenges that are currently being addressed. We can, however, guarantee that low-cost top-up tokens will be available for purchase at any time.

Other ways you can help

As well as becoming a supporter and user, there are other ways you can help us.

  • Please tell your friends and colleagues, get the word out and make some noise.
  • Follow us on social media, like, comment and share our content to help spread the word.
  • There are Indiegogo tools available to help raise our profile
  • Please give us any feedback (good or bad) as this helps us continuously improve the product.
story_txt:
A better search engine.
Most search engines use you as the product to be sold to advertisers. Your personal data is harvested for their benefit and your screen is filled with ads they want you to click. Better Internet Search is different.

You are the customer - not the product.
We are 100% ad-free
We preserve your privacy.

The company was set up in 2019 by a successful technology entrepreneur with the support from the Next Generation Internet Trust. The aim was simple, to use a different business model for search so the focus could shift to delivering the best results for the user rather than catering for the advertiser.
Why are we crowdfunding?
Some people told us that a small start-up could not possibly build their own search engine - it wouldn't work, it would take many years, it would cost tens of millions ... some have even laughed out loud at the idea!  However, we worked exclusively with people that believe in us, and we have been able to create a better search engine that is ready to be shared. This crowdfunding is not really about raising money, it is about building a foundation of users that believe in us and our vision. From this foundation we aim to build a business with global impact.
By participating in this crowdfunding you are demonstrating your support for us, as well as contributing to the operational costs of running the platform for our first users. In return for your support we will give you access to our unique search engine and you can be proud of being one of our very first users and supporters.
We care about the future of the internet and have signed the  Contract for the Web pioneered by Tim Berners-Lee. The Web belongs to all of us and should not be controlled by the commercial agendas of large corporations as it is today. If you are the type of person that cares about data privacy and the future of the internet, and would like to see a more user focussed search engine flourish,  then you are the type of customer we want.
What rewards do we offer?

Full access to our ad-free privacy-preserving search engine.
For as little as £10 you can have many months of ad-free searching.
For as little as £50 you, your family and friends can share the equivalent of up to a year* of ad-free searching (*based on single user when not shared).
You will have full access to our web, news, images and video searches.
We provide you with search tokens that automatically power the search engine
You can use our search engine on your desktop, laptop, tablet and smartphone.
You won't see any ads so you can avoid those impulse buy.


Risks & challenges
The search engine completed its beta phase and has been tested with over 100 users. The feedback was excellent and so we have decided to launch to a small number of users this year (i.e. before Christmas) via this Indiegogo campaign. The first live commercial users are now onboard, however we have not fully tested the scaleability of our technology for much larger user numbers and so we aim to expand subscriber numbers slowly and monitor the stress levels on our platform. We have had two small service outages during beta testing but we are confident we have fixed these problems. However, we are a small team with limited support resources and cannot guarantee 24/7 support should a problem arise - but will always use our best efforts to fix any service problems. 
During 2021 we aim to roll-out new methods to top-up tokens at no direct cost to the user. However, we do not wish to set dates (or expectations) as these are new business models with with some technical challenges that are currently being addressed. We can, however, guarantee that low-cost top-up tokens will be available for purchase at any time.

Other ways you can help
As well as becoming a supporter and user, there are other ways you can help us.

Please tell your friends and colleagues, get the word out and make some noise.
Follow us on social media, like, comment and share our content to help spread the word.
There are Indiegogo tools available to help raise our profile
Please give us any feedback (good or bad) as this helps us continuously improve the product.

story:
Short Summary

Utter.io is an Open Source software platform which uses cryptocurrency technologies to allow users to buy and provision virtual servers.  The platform also enables OpenStack operators to form compute cooperatives using a virtual appliance, allowing fast scaling and sharing of excess compute resources between trusted entities. This concept may be one possible solution to the challenges associated with achieving a globally federated cloud.

Virtual servers for sale are advertised by the appliances on a compute pool. Purchases are done by sending Bitcoin to an address that corresponds to the size and type of instance needed by the user. The screenshot below shows a BItcoin payment address corresponding to an instance ready to be started by an Utter.io virtual appliance running on an account on HPCloud's Las Vegas datacenter.

The StackMonkey pool is the first of many cooperatives, and is intended to be the Wild West of compute pools. The pool is built for use by hackers, crackers, security researchers, developers, do-it-yourselfers, and the communities and technologies developed from their use of the system.

Users wishing to launch decentralized software services such as DarkMail, OpenBazaar, Freenet, Tor, MaidSafe, Ethereum and more can start instances with pseudonymity on the coop's deployments, or smaller privately run cloud deployments. No accounts are needed to launch instances!

All code providing basic infrastructure services to the project will be Open Source and will be licensed under the MIT License.

Learn More About the Vision

If you are interested in learning more about the Utter.io vision, check out the longer-winded video below. I go through the history and future of the cloud, talk about the trust the blockchain brings us and how a computed trust based cloud gives us a path to a globally federated cloud anyone can use by simply clicking and paying.

The distributed cloud paper I refer to in the video can be found here.


Now you know why I had to build my own teleprompter for the 3 minute version: I talk a lot.

Also, be sure to read Code of Trust, a blog post I wrote last year. It explains why our trust in cloud technologies remains a challenge for infrastructure architecture today.

If you are interested in seeing the technology in action, check out the video my daughter Lily and I did doing a demo of Utter.io's features on StackMonkey.


If we are successfully funded, a non-profit foundation will be established to manage the project and help establish a user-centric community for raising awareness and continued project development.

Development Timeline

The project is currently in beta, hosted on hosted on Github and is 100% Open Source. An instance of the pool controller is currently running at StackMonkey, and is hosted on Google AppEngine. The beta launched in October.

The appliance is generally available for use by following simple instructions to install from Github. 

Users can set prices for the compute they wish to sell by configuring their local copy of the appliance. The image below demonstrates the setup of the appliance.

Development over the next two quarters will focus on the decentralization of key services inside the framework, including:

  • alternative platforms for hosting advertisement pools
  • a flexible and reliable blockchain payment monitoring tool
  • payment instances to manage auto-payments for deployments
  • server/service authentication via bitcoin keys using bitauth/bitid
  • decentralized SSL tunnel hosted on appliances for instance access 
  • numerous features related to security and reliability

Support will also continue to be provided via community driven content, email support and contract work for entities wishing to deploy federated compute on their infrastructures.  New feature requests will be considered for special deployments.

With funding, Utter.io sets a goal of adding over 100 providers in 30 countries to the StackMonkey pool next year.

Rewards

Physical rewards like stickers and t-shirts will be shipped using economy class shipping. We'll need to collect things like shipping address and shirt sizes from you.

Account rewards like priority support and early access features will be done via a tokenized page on the website.  Please note that verifying your identity will be required when you collect the rewards!  If you are privacy sensitive, you may wish to simply contribute a custom amount to the project at the lowest reward level.

The developer off-site is intended for developers only.  Ideally you are skilled in a wide array of infrastructure technologies and can contribute through architecture and/or coding.  If you'd like to purchase the development offsite for someone who might be interested, but can't afford it, we're more than happy to make arrangements for them.

Post Funding

If we are funded, StackMonkey and the Utter.io framework will have their IP assigned to a non-profit foundation to encourage continued innovation in development and expansion of network services.

The minimum viable funding for the project has been determined to be US$49,000. This amount will allow for the two existing full time developers to continue working on the project for the next six months. 

If funding is over-goal, or we manage to raise more funding in another manner, I will use the amount to help forecast a budget for the foundation to use to hire additional developers.  Ideally we'd like a team of 6-7 people working on this full time, with a minimum of a year's burn available.  That puts the funds needed for payroll at about US$1M, given they were located in the Bay (assuming they worked on a discount, sadly enough).

Given we're looking for efficiencies, we have decided it would be good idea to decentralize the team. This lowers living costs, allows for a wider range of skill choices, and provides a good life/work balance for the developers. We're planning on doing a foundation offsite every 4 months or so to ensure good execution on planning and helping build relationships.

Opportunities are likely to exist in the future for raising venture capital for offerings based on top of the framework. After the foundation is well established, other developers and I may choose to become a part of efforts to produce commercial opportunities from the platform/network.  

There may also be an opportunity to do a crypto IPO for the project, which would eclipse the need to do a traditional fund raise for a commercial offering.

Foundation Basics

The foundation will raise money for development through a variety of means, including well defined and transparent corporate sponsored donations, conferences, schwag, feature bounties and more.

The Utter.io Foundation will be self-governed and driven exclusively by user and developer participation.  Corporate interests will remain important, especially when considering their contribution to compute resources, but their impact and relationship with the system must remain transparent at all times. Remember, infrastructure was meant to be open, transparent and trustworthy!

The Team

Kord Campbell

I'm originally from Oklahoma. I love creating obscure branding memes and frequently dream about the future of compute. I'm dedicated to developer-centric approaches to marketing products, as I am a developer myself. I code in Python and JavaScript, but I've also been known to write C code for my Arduino.


I exited Grub to LookSmart in 2003 (my first visit to the Bay) and did a few other startups before moving back and becoming the Chief Evangelist at Splunk in 2007, where I founded the first Splunk devops conference. In 2009, I founded Loggly and served as the CEO there until 2012. I left the company after coming to an impasse with the board about its future.

I'm thankful for the time I've had over the last 2 1/2 years. I've spent most of it focusing on improving my coding skills, doing a bit of OpenStack consulting and thinking about how to apply cryptocurrency trust to the cloud. I also authored and maintain a set of install scripts which have helped about 15K people install OpenStack for evaluation purposes.

There is more information about me in my profile and on LinkedIn.  You can find me on Twitter,Github and a couple of blogs I scribble in from time to time.

I confess that I wore a pair of house shoes while filming the main video. :)

Mauro Stettler

Mauro is from Switzerland and travels the world while working. He's a programmer and an OpenStack expert, skilled at building out high availability clusters.  He's on Twitter, Github andLinkedIn as well.


Mauro has spent the last year working on Kili, a public cloud deployment of OpenStack in Kenya. He started helping with Utter.io back in August of 2014.

"The main reason why I prefer working on Open Source infrastructure is because I don't need to rely on documentation or support to understand and solve issues.  The best documentation is always the code!"

Advisors

We have a few advisors helping us. They come out of companies like Redhat, Cisco, Rackspace, and Microsoft. Their infrastructure experience and grey hairs are helpful in guiding us when it comes to strategy, market positioning and future features.

Resources

There is a list of current security related features available on Github. Security remains an important risk and challenge to the project.

Risks & Challenges

The risks involved in the project include meeting developmental deadlines within budget, adequately addressing security issues (link just above this section), maintaining stability of the infrastructure we run for others (like on HPCloud) and a wealth of other software development related issues.

There's also the matter of setting up the foundation in a way that is acceptable to all parties involved, including backers, developers, users and providers. Finding a good balance to the foundation's 'knobs' will be critical to the future success of the project.

If we run into issues at lower funding levels, the software may not be able completed to everyone's satisfaction. We may need to find alternatives to funding and completing the codebase. Given the project is Open Source, the risk of the project going away completely is greatly minimized.

I'd like to thank you if you've read this far. Have you watched the main video all the way through to the end? The last 30 seconds or so of the video is actually the beginning.

story:
Our vision is to change the way you think about tools.

What is 3DSimo mini better in compared to other 3D pens: Not only is it smaller and smarter, but thanks to interchangeable extensions it also allows the user to use more features. Look at all the benefits below.

Be the ultimate creator. Create jewelry, figures,accessories, decorations, artwork and so much more. You can even fix any plastic items. As in classic 3D printer technology, molten plastic is extruded from the die and cools down rapidly. It is therefore possible to draw solid structures in the air. There are no material limitations due to adjustable temperature and speed.


Become an acclaimed artist. Express your creativity and start to change things around. Want to decorate a wooden cutting board, spoon or rolling pin? No problem! Turn an old belt, pair of shoes, or jacket into unique fashion piece with your personal touch. Transform it into a unique fashion accessory. You may even start an online shop with custom-made accessories! This extension can also be used for the treatment of 3D printed models and their smoothing, making your creations truly flawless.


For the engineer within you. You no longer need to buy an expensive adjustable soldering station. 3DSimo mini handles this function, heating up the tip under 10 seconds to an incredible 490°C, while still being safe to handle. Now you yourself can repair a torn USB cable, damaged earphones, or start creating your own electrical equipment.


Shape out anything you want. With this extension, your imagination becomes the limit. Intended primarily for designers, modelers and architects, you can now create functional RC models (aircraft, boats, cars), buildings, art objects and so much more. If you own a 3D printer, you know how difficult it is to remove the support, and 3DSimo mini will help you with this as well. Create them from polystyrene, plexiglas, balsa wood or foam.


The 3DSimo mobile app gives you control over the temperature and speed so you can work with different and sometimes totally new materials. The FREE Android,Windows and iOS app connects to your Mini via Bluetooth. The 3DSimo app allows you to adjust the temperature, speed and different material profiles with precision. The app will also provide you with instructional videos, templates to print and regular software updates.

Power pack - 3DSimo mini can be used via an adapter with a cable included in the basic package. But when you head for the countryside or don't want to be limited by a cable, connect the power pack. The power pack is a battery with electronics for the proper powering of the 3DSimo mini.  

What if your glasses break in nature, the tent tears, or you're simply not able to light a fire? The 3DSimo mini with connected power pack will help you. You can also charge a cell phone, MP3 or flashlight anywhere. The power pack can continuously power the 3DSimo mini for 60 to 90 min.

It all began a year ago with our first product 3DSimo which we managed to put on the market despite very limited financial resources. This gave us a clearer idea and a valuable experience on the steps between a simple idea and the finished commercial product. Learning from our last experience, we decided to cooperate with experienced graphic designers, mechanical engineers, electronic engineers, IT professionals and programmers to help us refine and develop the 3DSimo Mini.

3Dsimo is assembled in our factory in Czech Republic, in the very hearth of Europe. Here are a few photos of the original 3Dsimo, which we have been manufacturing for more than one year now. And though manufacturing the same thing over and over again helped us to perfect the process, we believe it’s time for a change. With your help, we will be able to start assembling 3Dsimo mini in few months.

Thanks to adjustable speed and temperature, you are not limited by the material you use. You can choose different materials and actually use materials that will come to the market in the future! Makers can use any standard 1.75 mm filament.

Skilled, passionate and sometimes both. We are a group of 3Dprinting enthusiasts, engineers, artists.

3Dsimo mini is fully functional and ready for mass production. During the campaign we will keep you updated on the progress. After the campaign we will start with the implementation of the injection mold and the prototype testing. We will also publish the awarded certificates (eg: ROSH, CE mark…).

The original video for backers of the first 3DSimo pen.

Risks and challenges

Our previous experience with the 3Dsimo gave us a good idea of the time and financial requirements to place such a product in the market worldwide. The financing will help cover the costs for:

- Injection mold 
- Electronic templates 
- Graphical design for both the pen and the packaging 
- Templates for the 3DSimo mini packaging 
- Logistics 
- Certificates (industrial design, CE, ROSH, recycling of electronic waste…)

Due to the miniature size of the components we have to use an injection molding technology of plastic into steel. Its implementation takes about 60 days and represents our biggest financial expense. However before we begin we must be absolutely sure of the effectiveness of the design as errors are very difficult to correct, therefore we use 3D technology SLA and DMSL for the fabrication of foundation models of the relevant parts. Suppliers All our suppliers are certified, reliable and have been accompanying us throughout the whole journey since our first product, 3DSimo. Our aim is to create a device that helps you bring to life all your ideas and allows you to express yourself. Thank you in advance for all your support.

Its implementation takes about 60 days and represents our biggest financial expense. However before we begin we must be absolutely sure of the effectiveness of the design as errors are very difficult to correct, therefore we use 3D technology SLA and DMSL for the fabrication of foundation models of the relevant parts. Suppliers All our suppliers are certified, reliable and have been accompanying us throughout the whole journey since our first product, 3DSimo. Our aim is to create a device that helps you bring to life all your ideas and allows you to express yourself. Thank you in advance for all your support.

story:
SafeRides US provides the dispatch and organizational software platform for SafeRides groups around the country and it's all for free.  Currently we have 66 active groups that use our system including colleges, universities and high schools.

Now we need to develop an app for iPhone and Android that will expand our capabilities making everything from volunteer scheduling to dispatching to calling for rides easier than before.

We've spoken with developers about the project and we have a team that can do the job as soon as we get funded.

 We need to grow the SafeRides organization around the country.  Your donations will go to building this app and to save many lives.

Thank you for your support!

Isaac Levi & Amiel Dabush

SafeRides US

"SafeRides Saves Lives"
