story:
Colorado HEMP Company focuses on HEMP...period.  We are a group of individuals,
revivalists and artisans who have come together to regenerate HEMP as a sustainable commodity for Colorado industry.  Colorado HEMP Company is the source of all things HEMP and we are here to help you find the right information and the right connection for all your HEMP needs.

Our message is simple...HEMP is one of the best, most natural and renewable resources on the planet.  From environmental and farming, to health and wellness products, biofuel and textiles, building materials, papers and plastics, and so much more, HEMP is alive and thriving world-wide.

HEMP is an astounding plant; one that needs full disclosure and renewed awareness to the public for what it actually is, and what it can do to help improve our society, economy, health and most importantly, our environment.  There are an estimated 25,000 different products that can be made from HEMP.  From stalk to seed, every part of the plant and its fibers can be used. For over 10,000 years of history, HEMP has been used by societies spanning the globe.  It's time to bring back this unsurpassed, sustainable industry to Colorado and to the U.S.A.

         

  
Support for Colorado HEMP Company is Support for a Sustainable HEMP Industry
Your support will help advance the Colorado HEMP Company vision.  Your contribution through Indiegogo will:
**assist in producing multiple designs for our HempGear apparel label.
**assist in the development of nutritional food recipes for our HempSun label.
**assist in creating a fully function Colorado HEMP Company online web store. 
**assist in our continuous advocacy campaign for ALL THINGS HEMP.

Additionally, we are searching for investor relationships beyond the scope of this campaign, so please feel free to contact us for expanded information regarding our business plan @ hemp@coloradohempcompany.com

Supporting Colorado HEMP Company will renew brand awareness to established HEMP brands we currently represent.  These include Hempy’s, Hempmania, and Wicked Hemp Footwear. It will also allow for new products to be created.  Along with the availability of HEMP products to the general public, you can be an essential part of the industrial HEMP movement as it relates to Colorado, the United States and the entire planet.

Should Colorado HEMP Company not reach it's funding goal, all monies received will still impact the initial development of HEMP products while continuously building the foundation of the Company with strong support for the industry as a whole.

The perks listed in the right-hand column, and pictured at the bottom of this page, were chosen with your contribution in mind. From $1 up to $10,000, Colorado Hemp Company guarantees the quality of the products that you'll receive for your donation. 

Who is the CoHempCo Crew?
Morris Beegle, founder of Colorado HEMP Company, has a 25+ year background in music and entertainment marketing, production, merchandising, management, and promotion.  He has focused on green packaging solutions for the entertainment industry utilizing FSC recycled paper stocks, vegatable inks, waterless printing technology, and wind powered partners.  Morris has been a HEMP advocate since 1995 when he learned the ropes at Hemporer's New Clothes in Fort Collins, a prominent HEMP products store that was open for more than a decade before the aftermath of 911 unfortunately caused the doors to close.  Morris conceived the Colorado HEMP Company concept during early 2012 as the push for Amendment 64 in Colorado launched and also included an industrial HEMP clause.  His knowledge and experience means Colorado HEMP Company is poised for success.

Elizabeth Knight, co-founder of Colorado HEMP Company, brings dedication and passion to the HEMP industry by way of her strong belief in HEMP products.  Her financial and creative marketing skills, along with event planning and brand management expertise, will help provide awareness of all things HEMP.  Together, the two partners are committed to the mission and belief that HEMP is the industry of our future.

Kat Ellinger has a 25+ year background in marketing, research, copywriting for agencies such as Tracy Locke/Pepsi.  She has also played in Denver bands for over 20 years and is a proponent of local music.  Kat believes HEMP can make a true difference in our planet's health and is exicited to be part of the the Colorado HEMP Company team.

Other ways you can help.
If you cannot afford to donate to the cause, help us spread the word by passing this along to family and friends.  Share via facebook, twitter, or drop an email to someone you know.

Check out the Perks!!!

  $1 - Every Dollar Helps and We THANK You!

  $5 - Hemp Book Marker and Hemp Lizard Download

  $10 - Amparo by Ben Wright 11x17 Full Color Hemp Poster

  $15 - 100% Hemp Coin Pouch

  $20 - 100% Hemp iPhone/iPod Case

  $25 - 100% Hemp Trifold Utility Wallet

  $30 - Hemp/Cotton Blend Beanie

  $30 - Hemp/Cotton Blend ballcap with CoHempCo logo

  $30 - Hemp/Cotton Men's T w/CoHempCo Design

  $30 - Hemp/Cotton Men's T w/Hemp Rocks Design

  $30 - Hemp/Cotton Women's T w/CoHempCo Design

  $30 - Hemp/Cotton Women's T w/Mindfullness Design

  $40 - 100% Hemp Flag

  $60 - 100% Hemp Travel Bag


We also have a $100 Combo Package, and Custom Hemp Gear Packages for $500, $1000, $2500, $5000 and $10,000.  See the descriptions in the Perks column.

On the Shirts Perks, please include your shirt size(small-XXL) when you make your contribution.  If you have questions about any of the options please send us a message through Indiegogo or email us direct at hemp@coloradohempcompany.com
story_txt:
Colorado HEMP Company focuses on HEMP...period.  We are a group of individuals,revivalists and artisans who have come together to regenerate HEMP as a sustainable commodity for Colorado industry.  Colorado HEMP Company is the source of all things HEMP and we are here to help you find the right information and the right connection for all your HEMP needs.Our message is simple...HEMP is one of the best, most natural and renewable resources on the planet.  From environmental and farming, to health and wellness products, biofuel and textiles, building materials, papers and plastics, and so much more, HEMP is alive and thriving world-wide.HEMP is an astounding plant; one that needs full disclosure and renewed awareness to the public for what it actually is, and what it can do to help improve our society, economy, health and most importantly, our environment.  There are an estimated 25,000 different products that can be made from HEMP.  From stalk to seed, every part of the plant and its fibers can be used. For over 10,000 years of history, HEMP has been used by societies spanning the globe.  It's time to bring back this unsurpassed, sustainable industry to Colorado and to the U.S.A.             Support for Colorado HEMP Company is Support for a Sustainable HEMP IndustryYour support will help advance the Colorado HEMP Company vision.  Your contribution through Indiegogo will:**assist in producing multiple designs for our HempGear apparel label.**assist in the development of nutritional food recipes for our HempSun label.**assist in creating a fully function Colorado HEMP Company online web store.  **assist in our continuous advocacy campaign for ALL THINGS HEMP.Additionally, we are searching for investor relationships beyond the scope of this campaign, so please feel free to contact us for expanded information regarding our business plan @ hemp@coloradohempcompany.comSupporting Colorado HEMP Company will renew brand awareness to established HEMP brands we currently represent.  These include Hempy’s, Hempmania, and Wicked Hemp Footwear. It will also allow for new products to be created.  Along with the availability of HEMP products to the general public, you can be an essential part of the industrial HEMP movement as it relates to Colorado, the United States and the entire planet.Should Colorado HEMP Company not reach it's funding goal, all monies received will still impact the initial development of HEMP products while continuously building the foundation of the Company with strong support for the industry as a whole.The perks listed in the right-hand column, and pictured at the bottom of this page, were chosen with your contribution in mind. story:
Search Engine: A Black Hole For Web Traffic

Currently, when new bloggers and webmasters aren’t getting enough visitors to their sites, they turn to SEO (Search Engine Optimization) to generate traffic through Google, Bing, and Yahoo. Soon, instead of focusing on their core passions, many find themselves consumed by SEO, adding keywords, submitting to search engines, posting on other blogs, and they may even consider hiring SEO experts to get noticed in the big three search engines. Within a few months, most bloggers and startups abandon their online efforts and nobody ever knows what unique products, services, or insights they had to offer.

Thumbar will empower creative and entrepreneurial people on the Internet with the exposure their efforts deserve, by providing an alternative to conquering search engines with SEO. Bloggers and entrepreneurs will be free to focus 100% of their time and energy on their passions, rather than on promoting them, while enabling their content to directly attract visitors through social feedback.

Thumbar Attracts Free Traffic Socially

A Thumbar is a rating plugin that collects and summarizes visitor feedback and then enhances exposure for a blog or website by establishing a mirrored copy of itself at Thumbar.com, a socially networked gateway. There, the better its ratings, the higher its chance of getting noticed and attracting visitors.

                                                   

How it Works

When the first vote is cast at a website, a message containing a copy of the plugin, a snippet of content, and a link back to the site, is instantly popped into Thumbar.com, where the copy is then kept in sync with the plugin at the source site. At Thumbar.com, people can search, sort, and follow messages and their creators, and click on them to get redirected to the websites where the content originates, making Thumbar.com a gateway for helping websites get discovered and trending.

   


There's no more mystery, expense, waiting, or hoping for search engines to find your blog or website. Thumbar replaces their site scraping and secret sauce sorcery with an open system of human ratings that provide merit as the basis of drawing attention.

How the Funds Will be Used

The project will advance in stages, as each funding milestone is reached. Each stage includes all previous milestones, with the first stage completing in April 2014 and the last in December 2014:

$25,000 - builds the plugin, browser client, and core back end platform

$35,000 - adds hardening against malware and hacking

$40,000 - makes the plugin customizable

$100,000 - adds slim mobile clients for iPhone and Android

$150,000 - core back end re-written for modular distribution across server farm

$200,000 - re-locate server farm internally

$300,000 - add second server farm in different location for fault tolerance

$350,000 - adds Akamai to withstand partial Internet outages and support re-routing

Thumbar's Impact

Even as Internet usage is increasing, content distribution is contracting and centralizing into social silos like Facebook and Twitter and media silos like YouTube and Tumblr. By contrast, Thumbar is a starting point, not an end point for finding content. It is a social platform that drives outward interaction, helping websites everywhere get discovered.

The Team

Thumbar was designed and founded by Steve Jazic. To help complete the first milestone, Thumbar will create a technical team with the addition of two Web 2.0 developers with social networking expertise in real-time messaging and a Redis NoSQL data guru. The team will continue growing to build and add the upgrades at each milestone level.

If you like what we're doing, but can't afford to pledge, we understand. You can still help us by getting the word out on Twitter, Facebook, and other social media and that will be appreciated enormously!

We'd love to hear from you, so if you have any questions or suggestions please contact us at indiegogo@thumbar.com

Thanks for checking us out!

Thumbar Team

story:
If you are managing a business marketing department, or running a business, the pressure is on—you are either shrinking or growing. We’ve designed a tool that helps you increase sales by multiplying your marketing resources 10 to 1. MyBrand combines big-agency talent with Digital Asset Management (DAM), and Brand Asset Management (BAM) so anyone can instantly create branded marketing collateral for print or web publishing.


We assess your brand and develop a strategy that works for you. You get custom branded formats for a fraction of what it would cost to hire a high-caliber marketing or branding agency. And there’s no learning curve. MyBrand is an easy-to-use, cloud-based platform so there’s no need to learn expensive design programs or coding.
  • MyBrand is all-inclusive
  • Reduces your marketing overhead by 90 percent
  • Provides tools to customize marketing materials in real-time
  • Becomes more cost-effective with every use
  • Re-use these assets as many times as you want
We are excited to offer you MyBrand, so you can benefit from the strategic thinking, technology, and consistent messaging enjoyed by top brands. If you help us to complete our software development, we are offering several Perks based on your level of support, including the full MyBrand service at a one-time only reduced rate.

The development timeline is 12 weeks after launch. If we receive more support than our goal, we will use the funds to enhance our software functionality (more on that below).

How it Works

MyBrand includes five steps and special features to support your marketing and branding needs. First is the Brand Review, followed by the creation of your Custom Branded Formats. Third, we save all of your brand assets and formats to the cloud. Then you become the creative guru, and create your collateral within Brand Central. And last, you can print or publish online. The Custom Branded Map feature lets you create maps that are integrated with your corporate identity. Take a look at these simple steps below -


MyBrand Packages and Credits

- Purchase Additional Formats

The MyBrand Basic, Plus, and Elite packages come with all of the above services and features. The differences between the packages are the Digital Asset Management storage space and number of credits to exchange for format creation. You can buy additional credits for $750 per credit.


What we'll do if we get more than we are asking for.

We hope you will partner with us to make MyBrand a success!, Here are our stretch goals to add even more functionality to MyBrand if we raise more than that $25,000.

Risks & Challenges

Our team has mitigated risk by approaching MyBrand with the knowledge gained in creating a map branding software as well as a print format system for a global logistics company. We have partnered with a top software development firm to help us achieve our objectives in creating a product with robust capabilities and improving ease of use.

story:
Short Version

We have developed a web application trufice.com, which lets you share and discuss your thoughts with coworkers, anonymously.

We are asking for funds to add more features and market it.

Long Version

Over 70% of employees in the US are unhappy. 

We talked to lot of people and found that most people believe in the company they work for. They care about what they are doing and would like to do better. 

But then, what makes them unhappy? 

We found that most people do not ask questions. When someone makes a poor decision at work or something is happening that they do not believe in, they want to ask questions but they don't. Even if someone does, they do not get any support from other teammates.

Why?

It is human nature to worry.

People are worried that they will sound stupid. They are worried that their teammates would judge them. They worry that if they oppose their manager, they will get penalized during reviews.

When we talked to managers about it, we found that they would love to get real feedback and want people to ask questions. They encourage people to ask questions.

What is the solution then?

Let people ask questions anonymously in their company. 

Anonymity enables people to be truthful in their opinions, and allows merit of the discussion to be based on what is said rather than who said it.

We have developed a web application which lets you ask tough questions and share your honest opinions with coworkers. It is called trufice.com

With trufice.com, we take a number of measures to protect your identity and data.

  • When you register, we randomly generate a unique name for you. This is what gets displayed to other users when you post, comment etc. We never send your email address to anyone.
  • Only people with a verified company email address can join your company network.
  • Our website traffic runs entirely over encrypted SSL (https).

Hmm, aren't there multiple apps which lets you be anonymous?

Yes. But you can't connect with your coworkers using the same. Even if you can, other people might see what you are posting. With trufice.com only people with a verified company email address can join your company network.

How can I get involved?

trufice.com is live, but is in early stages of development. There are just lot of things to do. To start with, we are planning to do the following:

  • Release iOS and Android apps.
  • Add ability to delete posts or mark them as inappropriate.
  • Add support for #tags.
  • Make it faster.
  • Marketing.

We are asking for the bare minimum that would give us confidence to continue working on it. If we can raise more, it would be easier to hire people and bring features faster.

Risk and Challenges

1. We might not get enough users. Out of everything, this is a biggest challenge that we could have. To tackle the same, we need to make sure that we are building a useful product with features and quality that appeal to users.

2. Ability to raise funds. We are quickly reaching the amount of work that cannot be handled part time. Soon, we'll have to look for more funding and work on it full time.

Image Credits 

This campaign would not have happened without the project pic. Credit goes to:

Artist: https://www.flickr.com/people/equinoxefr/ 

Image: https://flic.kr/p/brWrfZ

Image is used under license: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/

Awesome man. Keep up the good work.

story:
Solideer.Org: An Online Community that Connects Volunteers with Solidarity Work around the World


Imagine a world where at the push of a button, millions of everyday individuals could create or search for customizable solidarity projects (from a onetime act of kindness to a larger scale project over the span of weeks or months). This will be possible through the Solideer App! Solideer will take money, religion and political agendas out of the equation, and make it possible for just about anyone to do good in this world by using social technology to connect, organize and carry out Solideer projects.

Whether it's traveling half way across the world to deliver clothing collected from their community to an orphanage in China, or helping repair a veteran's home in their own home town on the weekends; Solideer will empower individuals to take action and change the world, one small act at a time. 

Solideer wants to build a global community of active individuals who can put their time, resources and skills to work for a cause they deem worthy, and who wish to do so on their own time and under their directive, while still being able to work under the safety and cohesion of a larger group.

Solideer will target individuals ages 22-44 who are interested in solution oriented news, by partnering with ad services to introduce unique algorithms that will help these individuals find specific projects that provide a direct solution for the problem or tragedy the article covers. 

 Some of the features of the Solideer app include:

*Comprehensive communication platform with a user friendly interface that allows peer to peer communications, group messaging, group chat, etc., enabling the creation and execution of projects; which will cover an ever increasing spectrum as more users join the online community.

*Team building and networking features to enable peer to peer engagement and the systematic planning of specific solidarity missions, similar to LinkedIn, as well as the former Yelp achievement medals feature, which will unlock as the user successfully carries out projects or engages in existing projects. 

*Streamlined fundraising features to enable individuals and organizations to quickly raise funds to fulfill immediate needs  for Micro-Solidarity activities such as the purchase of needed aid, transportation of the aid to the place in need, travel expenses for volunteers, etc. Transparency and leanness will be a strong aspect of how fundraising is done, with customization features that make it possible for donors to assign funds to very specific uses within each campaign.

*Extensive user profile creation for individuals, "expeditions", grassroots groups and formal non-profits. Functions similar to those used by dating sites like Tinder and Match.com will help individuals connect within the community around specific missions and projects, collaborate and team up. A feature similar to LinkedIn will also enable users to connect with real-world users, build their reputation around solidarity work and interact.

*Customizable platforms for large organizations that would like to engage large groups of volunteers and rally them around specific causes.

Solideer will become the largest online community of solidarity oriented individuals looking to start or collaborate on Solidarity projects and connect with other like-minded individuals. 

WHY?

Traditional public charities can often be cumbersome, inefficient and reactive by nature. A human crisis erupts somewhere in the world; they pass the hat for donations. Weeks or months later they send people to help and material aid, based on how much money they raised. Solideer will change the current status quo by putting the power of change and action in the hands of individuals, not large organizations and by taking money and politics out of the equation. This not only eliminates overhead (an appealing prospect for the every increasing population of jaded, tech savvy millennials interested in global change but frustrated by the inefficacy of large NGOs), but also empowers millions of people to do good on a casual basis. Imagine a world where millions of charitable deeds are done daily, without financial restraints and enabled by technology already available to us!

Solideer will shift the focus from pooling funds for charity into pooling human resources instead. By taking money almost completely out of the equation, solidarity work will be possible on a global scale. 


What Will it Take to Build Solideer.Org?

To make Solideer a global Micro-Solidarity platform on the scale of other peer to peer apps such as Uber and Airbnb, we will need a startup company model made up of a team of 5 dedicated IT and administrative staff. Solideer is currently looking for technical co-founders. 

The cheaper option is to build it ourselves from scratch, and I strongly believe that with the right team, we can achieve a first stage platform design with approximately $120,000 in seed funding . 


Other Ways You Can Help

Solideer is currently looking for venture capital and is open to  being a sponsored platform, so long as it retains its structure and model. It will be a free app available to the public on a global scale. If you are insterested in more information, please contact me at mamabebeblog [at] gmail.com
story_txt:
Solideer.Org: An Online Community that Connects Volunteers with Solidarity Work around the World


Imagine a world where at the push of a button, millions of
everyday individuals could create or search for customizable solidarity
projects (from a onetime act of kindness to a larger scale project over the
span of weeks or months). This will be possible through the Solideer App!
Solideer will take money, religion and political agendas out of the equation,
and make it possible for just about anyone to do good in this world by using
social technology to connect, organize and carry out Solideer projects.
Whether it's traveling half way across the world to deliver clothing collected from their community to an orphanage in China, or helping repair a veteran's home in their own home town on the weekends; Solideer will empower individuals to take action and change the world, one small act at a time. 
Solideer wants to build a global community of active individuals who can put their time, resources and skills to work for a cause they deem worthy, and who wish to do so on their own time and under their directive, while still being able to work under the safety and cohesion of a larger group.
Solideer will target individuals ages 22-44 who are interested in solution oriented news, by partnering with ad services to introduce unique algorithms that will help these individuals find specific projects that provide a direct solution for the problem or tragedy the article covers. 
 Some of the features of the Solideer app include:
*Comprehensive communication platform with a user friendly interface that allows peer to peer communications, group messaging, group chat, etc., enabling the creation and execution of projects; which will cover an ever increasing spectrum as more users join the online community.
*Team building and networking features to enable peer to peer engagement and the systematic planning of specific solidarity missions, similar to LinkedIn, as well as the former Yelp achievement medals feature, which will unlock as the user successfully carries out projects or engages in existing projects. 
*Streamlined fundraising features to enable individuals and organizations to quickly raise funds to fulfill immediate needs  for Micro-Solidarity activities such as the purchase of needed aid, transportation of the aid to the place in need, travel expenses for volunteers, etc. Transparency and leanness will be a strong aspect of how fundraising is done, with customization features that make it possible for donors to assign funds to very specific uses within each campaign.
*Extensive user profile creation for individuals, "expeditions", grassroots groups and formal non-profits. Functions similar to those used by dating sites like Tinder and Match.com will help individuals connect within the community around specific missions and projects, collaborate and team up. A feature similar to LinkedIn will also enable users to connect with real-world users, build their reputation around solidarity work and interact.
*Customizable platforms for large organizations that would like to engage large groups of volunteers and rally them around specific causes.
Solideer will become the largest online community of solidarity oriented individuals looking to start or collaborate on Solidarity projects and connect with other like-minded individuals. 
WHY?
Traditional public charities can often be cumbersome, inefficient and reactive by nature. A human crisis erupts somewhere in the world; they pass the hat for donations.
